00301  * any questions? joker
00302  */

00529       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // HANDPOS,
00530       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // SECONDHANDPOS
00531       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // BIGPOCK1
00532       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // BIGPOCK2
00533       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // BIGPOCK3
00534       TRUE,       INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,           BIG_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,          0,    0,                // BIGPOCK4
00535       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK1
00536       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK2
00537       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK3
00538       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK4
00539       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK5
00540       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK6
00541       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0,                // SMALLPOCK7
00542       FALSE,            INV_BAR_DX,       INV_BAR_DY,       SM_INV_SLOT_WIDTH,            SM_INV_SLOT_HEIGHT,                 0,    0                       // SMALLPOCK8
00543 };
00544 
00545 
00546 typedef struct
00547 {
00548       UINT32      uiTotalAmount;
00549       UINT32      uiMoneyRemaining;
00550       UINT32      uiMoneyRemoving;
00551 
00552 } REMOVE_MONEY;
00553 REMOVE_MONEY gRemoveMoney;
00554 
00555 MOUSE_REGION            gSMInvRegion[ NUM_INV_SLOTS ];
00556 MOUSE_REGION            gKeyRingPanel;
00557 MOUSE_REGION            gSMInvCamoRegion;
00558 INT8                                gbCompatibleAmmo[ NUM_INV_SLOTS ]; 
00559 INT8                                gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ NUM_INV_SLOTS ]; 
00560 UINT16                              us16BPPItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ 20 ];
00561 // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Increase this from 4-2 to 5-2
00562 UINT32                              guiBodyInvVO[ 5 ][ 2 ];
00563 UINT32                              guiGoldKeyVO;
00564 INT8                                gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE; 
00565 
00566 BOOLEAN AttemptToAddSubstring( STR16 zDest, STR16 zTemp, UINT32 * puiStringLength, UINT32 uiPixLimit )
00567 {
00568       UINT32 uiRequiredStringLength, uiTempStringLength;
00569 
00570       uiTempStringLength = StringPixLength( zTemp, ITEMDESC_FONT );
00571       uiRequiredStringLength = *puiStringLength + uiTempStringLength;
00572       if (zDest[0] != 0)
00573       {
00574             uiRequiredStringLength += StringPixLength( COMMA_AND_SPACE, ITEMDESC_FONT );
00575       }
00576       if (uiRequiredStringLength < uiPixLimit)
00577       {
00578             if (zDest[0] != 0)
00579             {
00580                   wcscat( zDest, COMMA_AND_SPACE );
00581             }
00582             wcscat( zDest, zTemp );
00583             *puiStringLength = uiRequiredStringLength;
00584             return( TRUE );
00585       }
00586       else
00587       {
00588             wcscat( zDest, DOTDOTDOT );
00589             return( FALSE );
00590       }
00591 }
00592 
00593 void GenerateProsString( UINT16 * zItemPros, OBJECTTYPE * pObject, UINT32 uiPixLimit )
00594 {
00595       UINT32                  uiStringLength = 0;
00596       UINT16 *          zTemp;
00597       UINT16                  usItem = pObject->usItem;
00598       UINT8                   ubWeight;
00599 
00600       zItemPros[0] = 0;
00601 
00602       ubWeight = Item[ usItem ].ubWeight;
00603       if (Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
00604       {
00605             ubWeight += Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem ].ubWeight;
00606       }
00607 
00608       if (Weapon[usItem].bAccuracy >= EXCEPTIONAL_ACCURACY )
00609       {
00610             zTemp = Message[STR_ACCURATE];
00611             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00612             {
00613                   return;                 
00614             }
00615       }
00616 
00617       if (Item[usItem].ubWeight <= EXCEPTIONAL_WEIGHT)
00618       {
00619             zTemp = Message[STR_LIGHT];
00620             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00621             {
00622                   return;                 
00623             }
00624       }
00625 
00626       if (Item[usItem].ubPerPocket >= 1) // fits in a small pocket
00627       {
00628             zTemp = Message[STR_SMALL];
00629             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00630             {
00631                   return;                 
00632             }
00633       }
00634 
00635       if ( GunRange( pObject ) >= EXCEPTIONAL_RANGE )
00636       {
00637             zTemp = Message[STR_LONG_RANGE];
00638             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00639             {
00640                   return;                 
00641             }
00642       }
00643 
00644       if (GetDamage(pObject) >= EXCEPTIONAL_DAMAGE)
00645       {
00646             zTemp = Message[STR_HIGH_DAMAGE];
00647             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00648             {
00649                   return;                 
00650             }
00651       }
00652 
00653       if (BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, gpItemDescObject ) <= EXCEPTIONAL_AP_COST)
00654       {
00655             zTemp = Message[STR_QUICK_FIRING];
00656             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00657             {
00658                   return;                 
00659             }
00660       }
00661 
00662       if (GetShotsPerBurst(pObject) >= EXCEPTIONAL_BURST_SIZE )//|| usItem == G11)
00663       {
00664             zTemp = Message[STR_FAST_BURST];
00665             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00666             {
00667                   return;                 
00668             }
00669       }
00670 
00671       if (GetMagSize(pObject) > EXCEPTIONAL_MAGAZINE)
00672       {
00673             zTemp = Message[STR_LARGE_AMMO_CAPACITY];
00674             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00675             {
00676                   return;                 
00677             }
00678       }
00679 
00680       if ( Item[usItem].bReliability >= EXCEPTIONAL_RELIABILITY )
00681       {
00682             zTemp = Message[STR_RELIABLE];
00683             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00684             {
00685                   return;                 
00686             }
00687       }
00688 
00689       if ( Item[usItem].bRepairEase >= EXCEPTIONAL_REPAIR_EASE )
00690       {
00691             zTemp = Message[STR_EASY_TO_REPAIR];
00692             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00693             {
00694                   return;                 
00695             }
00696       }
00697 
00698       if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(pObject) > 0)
00699       {
00700             zTemp = Message[STR_AUTOFIRE];
00701             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00702             {
00703                   return;                 
00704             }
00705       }
00706 
00707       if ( zItemPros[0] == 0 )
00708       {
00709             // empty string, so display "None"
00710             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemPros, Message[ STR_NONE ], &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00711             {
00712                   return;                 
00713             }
00714       }
00715 }
00716 
00717 void GenerateConsString( UINT16 * zItemCons, OBJECTTYPE * pObject, UINT32 uiPixLimit )
00718 {
00719       UINT32                  uiStringLength = 0;
00720       UINT16 *          zTemp;
00721       UINT8                   ubWeight;
00722       UINT16                  usItem = pObject->usItem;
00723 
00724       zItemCons[0] = 0;
00725 
00726       if (Weapon[usItem].bAccuracy <= BAD_ACCURACY)
00727       {
00728             zTemp = Message[STR_INACCURATE];
00729             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00730             {
00731                   return;                 
00732             }
00733       }
00734 
00735       if ( Weapon[usItem].NoSemiAuto )
00736       {
00737             zTemp = Message[STR_NO_SEMI_AUTO];
00738             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00739             {
00740                   return;                 
00741             }
00742       }
00743 
00744       // calculate the weight of the item plus ammunition but not including any attachments
00745       ubWeight = Item[ usItem ].ubWeight;
00746       if (Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN)
00747       {
00748             ubWeight += Item[ pObject->usGunAmmoItem ].ubWeight;
00749       }
00750 
00751       if (ubWeight >= BAD_WEIGHT)
00752       {
00753             zTemp = Message[STR_HEAVY];
00754             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00755             {
00756                   return;                 
00757             }
00758       }
00759 
00760       if ( GunRange( pObject ) <= BAD_RANGE)
00761       {
00762             zTemp = Message[STR_SHORT_RANGE];
00763             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00764             {
00765                   return;                 
00766             }
00767       }
00768                         
00769 
00770       if (GetDamage(pObject) <= BAD_DAMAGE)
00771       {
00772             zTemp = Message[STR_LOW_DAMAGE];
00773             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00774             {
00775                   return;                 
00776             }
00777       }
00778 
00779       if (BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, gpItemDescObject ) >= BAD_AP_COST)
00780       {
00781             zTemp = Message[STR_SLOW_FIRING];
00782             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00783             {
00784                   return;                 
00785             }
00786       }
00787 
00788       if (GetShotsPerBurst(pObject) == 0)
00789       {
00790             zTemp = Message[STR_NO_BURST];
00791             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00792             {
00793                   return;                 
00794             }
00795       }
00796 
00797       if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(pObject) == 0)
00798       {
00799             zTemp = Message[STR_NO_AUTOFIRE];
00800             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00801             {
00802                   return;                 
00803             }
00804       }
00805 
00806       if (GetMagSize(pObject) < BAD_MAGAZINE)
00807       {
00808             zTemp = Message[STR_SMALL_AMMO_CAPACITY];
00809             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00810             {
00811                   return;                 
00812             }
00813       }
00814 
00815       if ( Item[usItem].bReliability <= BAD_RELIABILITY )
00816       {
00817             zTemp = Message[STR_UNRELIABLE];
00818             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00819             {
00820                   return;                 
00821             }
00822       }
00823 
00824       if ( Item[usItem].bRepairEase <= BAD_REPAIR_EASE )
00825       {
00826             zTemp = Message[STR_HARD_TO_REPAIR];
00827             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, zTemp, &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00828             {
00829                   return;                 
00830             }
00831       }
00832 
00833 
00834       if ( zItemCons[0] == 0 )
00835       {
00836             // empty string, so display "None"
00837             if ( ! AttemptToAddSubstring( zItemCons, Message[ STR_NONE ], &uiStringLength, uiPixLimit ) )
00838             {
00839                   return;                 
00840             }
00841       }
00842 }
00843 
00844 BOOLEAN InitInvSlotInterface( INV_REGION_DESC *pRegionDesc , INV_REGION_DESC *pCamoRegion, MOUSE_CALLBACK INVMoveCallback, MOUSE_CALLBACK INVClickCallback, MOUSE_CALLBACK INVMoveCammoCallback, MOUSE_CALLBACK INVClickCammoCallback, BOOLEAN fSetHighestPrioity )
00845 {
00846       INT32 cnt;
00847   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00848       
00849 /*
00850  *  Ok i think that here the money button and window is initialized 
00851  *  so we also will initialize here coord of button
00852  *  this function is called in tactical screen when SMPanel is initialized 
00853  *  and also in StrategicScreen i think i didnt check it. 
00854  *  any questions? joker
00855  */
00856 
00857       gMoneyButtonLoc.x = (343 + INTERFACE_START_X);
00858       gMoneyButtonLoc.y = ( 11 + INV_INTERFACE_START_Y );
00859       // Load all four body type images
00860       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00861       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_large_male.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00862       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 1 ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00863 
00864       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00865       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_large_male_H.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00866       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 1 ][ 1 ] ) ) );
00867 
00868 
00869       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00870       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_normal_male.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00871       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 0 ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00872 
00873       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00874       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_normal_male_H.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00875       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 0 ][ 1 ] ) ) );
00876 
00877 
00878       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00879       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_normal_male.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00880       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 2 ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00881 
00882       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00883       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_normal_male.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00884       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 2 ][ 1 ] ) ) );
00885 
00886       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00887       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_female.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00888       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 3 ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00889 
00890       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00891       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_female_H.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00892       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 3 ][ 1 ] ) ) );
00893 
00894       // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Added two new STI's for Vehicle Inventory
00895       // Feel free to change them to more appropriate pictures, I just blanked out
00896       // the body image for now, I'm no graphics artist.
00897       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00898       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_Vehicle.sti", 
00899 VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00900       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 4 ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00901 
00902       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00903       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\inventory_figure_Vehicle_h.sti", 
00904 VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00905       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(guiBodyInvVO[ 4 ][ 1 ] ) ) );
00906 
00907       // add gold key graphic
00908       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00909       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\gold_key_button.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00910       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiGoldKeyVO ) );
00911 
00912       // Add cammo region 
00913       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSMInvCamoRegion, pCamoRegion->sX, pCamoRegion->sY, (INT16)(pCamoRegion->sX + CAMO_REGION_WIDTH ), (INT16)(pCamoRegion->sY + CAMO_REGION_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00914                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, INVMoveCammoCallback, INVClickCammoCallback ); 
00915       // Add region
00916       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSMInvCamoRegion );
00917 
00918       // Add regions for inventory slots
00919       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
00920       {
00921             // set inventory pocket coordinates from the table passed in
00922             gSMInvData[ cnt ].sX = pRegionDesc[ cnt ].sX;
00923             gSMInvData[ cnt ].sY = pRegionDesc[ cnt ].sY;
00924 
00925             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ], gSMInvData[ cnt ].sX, gSMInvData[ cnt ].sY, (INT16)(gSMInvData[ cnt ].sX + gSMInvData[ cnt ].sWidth), (INT16)(gSMInvData[ cnt ].sY + gSMInvData[ cnt ].sHeight), ( INT8 )( fSetHighestPrioity ? MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST : MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH ),
00926                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, INVMoveCallback, INVClickCallback ); 
00927             // Add region
00928             MSYS_AddRegion( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ] );
00929             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00930       }
00931       
00932       memset( gbCompatibleAmmo, 0, sizeof( gbCompatibleAmmo ) );
00933 
00934       return( TRUE );
00935 }
00936 
00937 void InitKeyRingInterface( MOUSE_CALLBACK KeyRingClickCallback )
00938 {
00939             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gKeyRingPanel, KEYRING_X, KEYRING_Y, KEYRING_X + KEYRING_WIDTH, KEYRING_Y + KEYRING_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00940                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, KeyRingClickCallback ); 
00941 
00942             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gKeyRingPanel), TacticalStr[ KEYRING_HELP_TEXT ] );
00943 
00944 }
00945 
00946 void InitMapKeyRingInterface( MOUSE_CALLBACK KeyRingClickCallback )
00947 {
00948             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gKeyRingPanel, MAP_KEYRING_X, MAP_KEYRING_Y, MAP_KEYRING_X + KEYRING_WIDTH, MAP_KEYRING_Y + KEYRING_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00949                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, KeyRingClickCallback ); 
00950 
00951             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gKeyRingPanel), TacticalStr[ KEYRING_HELP_TEXT ] );
00952 }
00953 
00954 void EnableKeyRing( BOOLEAN fEnable )
00955 {
00956       if ( fEnable )
00957       {
00958             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gKeyRingPanel );
00959       }
00960       else
00961       {
00962             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gKeyRingPanel );
00963       }
00964 }
00965 
00966 
00967 void ShutdownKeyRingInterface( void )
00968 {
00969       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gKeyRingPanel );
00970       return;
00971 }
00972 
00973 void DisableInvRegions( BOOLEAN fDisable )
00974 {
00975       INT32 cnt;
00976 
00977       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
00978       {
00979             if ( fDisable )
00980             {
00981                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ] );
00982             }
00983             else
00984             {
00985                   MSYS_EnableRegion( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ] );
00986             }
00987       }
00988 
00989       if ( fDisable )
00990       {
00991             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSMInvCamoRegion );
00992 
00993             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion );              
00994             EnableKeyRing( FALSE );
00995       }
00996       else
00997       {
00998             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gSMInvCamoRegion );
00999 
01000             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gSM_SELMERCMoneyRegion );               
01001             EnableKeyRing( TRUE );
01002       }
01003       
01004 }
01005 
01006 void ShutdownInvSlotInterface( )
01007 {
01008       UINT32            cnt;
01009 
01010       // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Added 4-0 and 4-1
01011     // to be deleted as well.
01012 
01013       // Remove all body type panels
01014       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 0 ][ 0 ] );
01015       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 2 ][ 0 ] );
01016       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 1 ][ 0 ] );
01017       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 3 ][ 0 ] );
01018       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 4 ][ 0 ] );
01019       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 0 ][ 1 ] );
01020       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 2 ][ 1 ] );
01021       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 1 ][ 1 ] );
01022       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 3 ][ 1 ] );
01023       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBodyInvVO[ 4 ][ 1 ] );
01024 
01025       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiGoldKeyVO );
01026 
01027       // Remove regions
01028       // Add regions for inventory slots
01029       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01030       {
01031             // Remove region
01032             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSMInvRegion[ cnt ] );
01033       }
01034 
01035       // Remove cammo
01036       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSMInvCamoRegion );
01037 
01038 }
01039 
01040 void RenderInvBodyPanel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01041 {
01042       // Blit body inv, based on body type
01043       INT8 bSubImageIndex = gbCompatibleApplyItem;
01044 
01045       // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Added IF Test, Else function call was
01046       // the original statement
01047       if ( (gGameExternalOptions.fVehicleInventory) && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
01048       {
01049             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBodyInvVO[4][0], 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01050       }
01051       else
01052       {
01053             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBodyInvVO[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ][ bSubImageIndex ], 0, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01054 
01055       }
01056 }
01057 
01058 void HandleRenderInvSlots( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 fDirtyLevel )
01059 {
01060       INT32                                                 cnt;
01061       static INT16                              pStr[ 150 ]; 
01062 
01063       if ( InItemDescriptionBox( ) || InItemStackPopup( ) || InKeyRingPopup( ) )
01064       {
01065 
01066       }
01067       else
01068       {
01069             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01070             {
01071                   if ( fDirtyLevel == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01072                   {
01073                         GetHelpTextForItem( pStr, &( pSoldier->inv[ cnt ] ), pSoldier );
01074 
01075                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gSMInvRegion[ cnt ]), pStr );
01076                   }
01077 
01078                   INVRenderINVPanelItem( pSoldier, (INT16)cnt, fDirtyLevel );
01079             }
01080 
01081             if ( KeyExistsInKeyRing( pSoldier, ANYKEY, NULL ) )
01082             {
01083                   // blit gold key here?
01084                   if ( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
01085                   {
01086                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiGoldKeyVO, 0, 496, KEYRING_Y + 1, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01087                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 496, KEYRING_Y + 1, 29, 23 );
01088                   }
01089                   else
01090                   {
01091                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiGoldKeyVO, 0, 217, 271, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01092                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 217, 271, 29, 23 );
01093                   }
01094             }
01095       }     
01096 }
01097 
01098 
01099 void INVRenderINVPanelItem( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sPocket, UINT8 fDirtyLevel )
01100 {
01101       INT16 sX, sY;
01102       INT16 sBarX, sBarY;
01103       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject;
01104       BOOLEAN     fOutline = FALSE;
01105       INT16       sOutlineColor = 0;
01106       UINT8       fRenderDirtyLevel;
01107       BOOLEAN fHatchItOut = FALSE;
01108 
01109 
01110       //Assign the screen
01111       guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
01112 
01113       pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ sPocket ]);
01114 
01115       sX = gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sX;
01116       sY = gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sY;
01117 
01118       if ( fDirtyLevel == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01119       {
01120             // CHECK FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH MAGAZINES
01121 
01122 /*    OLD VERSION OF GUN/AMMO MATCH HIGHLIGHTING
01123             UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES;
01124             UINT8       *pDestBuf;
01125             UINT16      usLineColor;
01126 
01127             if ( ( Item [ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN )  && ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01128             {
01129                   // CHECK
01130                   if (Weapon[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].ubCalibre == Magazine[Item[pObject->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre )
01131                   {
01132                         // IT's an OK calibre ammo, do something!
01133                         // Render Item with specific color
01134                         //fOutline = TRUE;
01135                         //sOutlineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 96, 104, 128 ) );
01136                         //sOutlineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 20, 20, 120 ) );
01137 
01138                         // Draw rectangle!
01139                         pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01140                         SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01141 
01142                         //usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 0 ) );
01143                         usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 230, 215, 196 ) );
01144                         RectangleDraw( TRUE, (sX+1), (sY+1), (sX + gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sWidth - 2 ),( sY + gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sHeight - 2 ), usLineColor, pDestBuf );
01145 
01146                         SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01147 
01148                         UnLockVideoSurface( guiSAVEBUFFER );
01149                   }
01150             }
01151 */
01152 
01153             if ( gbCompatibleAmmo[ sPocket ] )
01154             {
01155                   fOutline = TRUE;
01156                   sOutlineColor = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) );
01157             }
01158 
01159             // IF it's the second hand and this hand cannot contain anything, remove the second hand position graphic
01160 //          if (sPocket == SECONDHANDPOS && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED)
01161             if (sPocket == SECONDHANDPOS && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].twohanded )
01162             {
01163 //                if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
01164                   if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
01165                   {
01166                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiSecItemHiddenVO, 0, 217, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01167                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 217, sY, 72, 28 );
01168                   }
01169                   else
01170                   {
01171                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiMapInvSecondHandBlockout, 0, 14, 218, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01172                         RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 14, 218, 102, 24 );
01173                   }
01174             }           
01175       }
01176 
01177       // If we have a new item and we are in the right panel...
01178       if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ sPocket ] > 0 && gsCurInterfacePanel == SM_PANEL && fInterfacePanelDirty != DIRTYLEVEL2 )
01179       {
01180             fRenderDirtyLevel = DIRTYLEVEL0;
01181             //fRenderDirtyLevel = fDirtyLevel;
01182       }
01183       else
01184       {
01185             fRenderDirtyLevel = fDirtyLevel;
01186       }
01187 
01188       //Now render as normal
01189       //INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pObject, (INT16)(sX + gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sSubX), (INT16)(sY + gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sSubY), gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sWidth, gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sHeight, fDirtyLevel, &(gfSM_HandInvDispText[ sPocket ] ) );
01190       INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier, pObject, sX, sY, gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sWidth, gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sHeight, fRenderDirtyLevel, NULL, 0, fOutline, sOutlineColor );
01191 
01192       if ( gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ sPocket ] )
01193       {
01194             if ( sPocket != SECONDHANDPOS )
01195             {
01196                   // If we are in inv panel and our guy is not = cursor guy...
01197                   if ( !gfSMDisableForItems )
01198                   {
01199                         fHatchItOut = TRUE;
01200                   }
01201             }
01202       }
01203 
01204       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
01205       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
01206       {
01207             if( ShouldSoldierDisplayHatchOnItem( pSoldier->ubProfile, sPocket ) && !gbInvalidPlacementSlot[ sPocket ] )
01208             {
01209                   fHatchItOut = TRUE;
01210             }
01211       }
01212 
01213       if ( fHatchItOut )
01214       {
01215             UINT32 uiWhichBuffer = ( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) ? guiSAVEBUFFER : guiRENDERBUFFER;
01216             DrawHatchOnInventory( uiWhichBuffer, sX, sY, (UINT16)(gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sWidth-1), (UINT16)(gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sHeight-1) );
01217       }
01218 
01219       // if there's an item in there
01220       if ( pObject->usItem != NOTHING )
01221       {
01222             // Add item status bar
01223             sBarX = sX - gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sBarDx;
01224             sBarY = sY + gSMInvData[ sPocket ].sBarDy;
01225             DrawItemUIBarEx( pObject, 0, sBarX, sBarY, ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT,   Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , guiSAVEBUFFER);
01226       }
01227 
01228 }
01229 
01230 
01231 BOOLEAN CompatibleAmmoForGun( OBJECTTYPE *pTryObject, OBJECTTYPE *pTestObject )
01232 {
01233       if ( ( Item[ pTryObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01234       {
01235             // CHECK
01236             if (Weapon[ pTestObject->usItem ].ubCalibre == Magazine[Item[pTryObject->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre )
01237             {
01238                   return( TRUE );
01239             }
01240       }
01241       return( FALSE );
01242 }
01243 
01244 BOOLEAN CompatibleGunForAmmo( OBJECTTYPE *pTryObject, OBJECTTYPE *pTestObject )
01245 {
01246       if ( ( Item[ pTryObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) )
01247       {
01248             // CHECK
01249             if (Weapon[ pTryObject->usItem ].ubCalibre == Magazine[Item[pTestObject->usItem].ubClassIndex].ubCalibre )
01250             {
01251                   return( TRUE );
01252             }
01253       }
01254       return( FALSE );
01255 }
01256 
01257 BOOLEAN     CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( OBJECTTYPE *pTestObject )
01258 {
01259       UINT16 usItem = pTestObject->usItem;
01260 
01261   // ATE: If in mapscreen, return false always....
01262       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
01263   {
01264      return( FALSE );
01265   }
01266 
01267       // ATE: Would be nice to have flag here to check for these types....
01268       if ( Item[usItem].camouflagekit || usItem == ADRENALINE_BOOSTER || usItem == REGEN_BOOSTER ||
01269                    usItem == SYRINGE_3           || usItem == SYRINGE_4 || usItem == SYRINGE_5 ||
01270                    Item[usItem].alcohol  || Item[usItem].canteen || usItem == JAR_ELIXIR )
01271       {
01272             return( TRUE );
01273       }
01274       else
01275       {
01276             return( FALSE );
01277       }
01278 }
01279 
01280 
01281 
01282 BOOLEAN SoldierContainsAnyCompatibleStuff( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pTestObject )
01283 {
01284       INT32                   cnt;
01285       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject;
01286 
01287       if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) )
01288       {
01289             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01290             {
01291                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01292                   
01293                   if ( CompatibleAmmoForGun( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01294                   {
01295                         return( TRUE );
01296                   }
01297             }
01298       }
01299 
01300       if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01301       {
01302             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01303             {
01304                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01305                   
01306                   if ( CompatibleGunForAmmo( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01307                   {
01308                         return( TRUE );
01309                   }
01310             }
01311       }
01312 
01313       // ATE: Put attachment checking here.....
01314 
01315       return( FALSE );
01316 }
01317 
01318 
01319 void HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( UINT8 ubSquad, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, BOOLEAN fReset )
01320 {
01321       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01322       
01323       if ( ubSquad == NUMBER_OF_SQUADS )
01324       {
01325             return;
01326       }
01327 
01328       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; iCounter++ )
01329       {
01330             if(  Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ] != NULL )
01331             {
01332                   if ( !fReset )
01333                   {
01334                         if ( SoldierContainsAnyCompatibleStuff( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ], pObject )   )
01335                         {
01336                               // Get face and set value....
01337                               gFacesData[ Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ]->iFaceIndex ].fCompatibleItems = TRUE;
01338                         }
01339                   }
01340                   else
01341                   {
01342                         gFacesData[ Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ iCounter ]->iFaceIndex ].fCompatibleItems = FALSE;
01343                   }
01344             }
01345       }
01346 
01347 }
01348 
01349 BOOLEAN HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapScreen( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 bInvPos, BOOLEAN fOn, BOOLEAN fFromMerc   )
01350 {
01351       BOOLEAN                 fFound = FALSE;
01352       INT32                   cnt;
01353       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject, *pTestObject ;
01354       BOOLEAN                 fFoundAttachment = FALSE;
01355 
01356       if( fFromMerc == FALSE )
01357       {
01358             pTestObject = &( pInventoryPoolList[ bInvPos ].o );
01359       }
01360       else
01361       {
01362             if ( bInvPos == NO_SLOT )
01363             {
01364                   pTestObject = NULL;
01365             }
01366             else
01367             {
01368                   pTestObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01369             }
01370       }
01371 
01372       // ATE: If pTest object is NULL, test only for existence of syringes, etc...
01373       if ( pTestObject == NULL )
01374       {
01375             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01376             {
01377                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01378                   
01379                   if ( CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( pObject ) )
01380                   {
01381                         if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01382                         {
01383                               fFound = TRUE;
01384                         }
01385 
01386                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01387                         // Render Item with specific color
01388                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01389 
01390                   }
01391             }
01392 
01393 
01394             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01395             {
01396                   if ( CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( gpItemPointer ) )
01397                   {
01398                         // OK, Light up portrait as well.....
01399                         if ( fOn )
01400                         {
01401                               gbCompatibleApplyItem = TRUE;
01402                         }
01403                         else
01404                         {
01405                               gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
01406                         }
01407 
01408                         fFound = TRUE;
01409                   }
01410             }
01411 
01412             if ( fFound )
01413             {
01414                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01415                   //HandleRenderInvSlots( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01416             }
01417 
01418             return( fFound );
01419       }
01420 
01421 //    if ( !(Item[ pTestObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON) )
01422       if ( !(Item[ pTestObject->usItem ].hiddenaddon ) )
01423       {
01424             // First test attachments, which almost any type of item can have....
01425             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01426             {
01427                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01428 
01429 //                if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON )
01430                   if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].hiddenaddon  )
01431                   {
01432                         // don't consider for UI purposes
01433                         continue;
01434                   }
01435 
01436                   if ( ValidAttachment( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) ||
01437                                ValidAttachment( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01438                                ValidLaunchable( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01439                                ValidLaunchable( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) )
01440                   {
01441                         fFoundAttachment = TRUE;
01442 
01443                         if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01444                         {
01445                               fFound = TRUE;
01446                         }
01447 
01448                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01449                         // Render Item with specific color
01450                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01451                   }
01452             }
01453       }
01454 
01455       
01456       if ( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) )
01457       {
01458             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01459             {
01460                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01461                   
01462                   if ( CompatibleAmmoForGun( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01463                   {
01464                         if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01465                         {
01466                               fFound = TRUE;
01467                         }
01468 
01469                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01470                         // Render Item with specific color
01471                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01472                   }
01473             }
01474       }
01475       else if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01476       {
01477             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01478             {
01479                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01480                   
01481                   if ( CompatibleGunForAmmo( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01482                   {
01483                         if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01484                         {
01485                               fFound = TRUE;
01486                         }
01487 
01488                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01489                         // Render Item with specific color
01490                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01491 
01492                   }
01493             }
01494       }
01495 
01496 
01497       return( fFound );
01498 }
01499 
01500 BOOLEAN HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapInventory( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 bInvPos, INT32 iStartSlotNumber, BOOLEAN fOn, BOOLEAN fFromMerc   )
01501 {
01502       // CJC: ATE, needs fixing here!
01503 
01504       BOOLEAN                 fFound = FALSE;
01505       INT32                   cnt;
01506       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject, *pTestObject ;
01507       BOOLEAN                 fFoundAttachment = FALSE;
01508 
01509       if( fFromMerc == FALSE )
01510       {
01511             pTestObject = &( pInventoryPoolList[ iStartSlotNumber + bInvPos ].o);
01512       }
01513       else
01514       {
01515             if ( bInvPos == NO_SLOT )
01516             {
01517                   pTestObject = NULL;
01518             }
01519             else
01520             {
01521                   pTestObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01522             }
01523       }
01524 
01525       // First test attachments, which almost any type of item can have....
01526       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; cnt++ )
01527       {
01528             pObject = &( pInventoryPoolList[ iStartSlotNumber + cnt ].o );
01529 
01530 //          if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON )
01531             if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].hiddenaddon  )
01532             {
01533                   // don't consider for UI purposes
01534                   continue;
01535             }
01536 
01537             if ( ValidAttachment( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) ||
01538                          ValidAttachment( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01539                          ValidLaunchable( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01540                          ValidLaunchable( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) )
01541             {
01542                   fFoundAttachment = TRUE;
01543 
01544                   if ( fOn != fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] )
01545                   {
01546                         fFound = TRUE;
01547                   }
01548 
01549                   // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01550                   // Render Item with specific color
01551                   fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] = fOn;
01552             }
01553       }
01554 
01555       
01556       if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) )
01557       {
01558             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; cnt++ )
01559             {
01560                   pObject = &( pInventoryPoolList[ iStartSlotNumber + cnt ].o );
01561 
01562                   if ( CompatibleAmmoForGun( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01563                   {
01564                         if ( fOn != fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] )
01565                         {
01566                               fFound = TRUE;
01567                         }
01568 
01569                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01570                         // Render Item with specific color
01571                         fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] = fOn;
01572                   }
01573             }
01574       }
01575       else if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01576       {
01577             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; cnt++ )
01578             {
01579                   pObject = &( pInventoryPoolList[ iStartSlotNumber + cnt ].o );
01580                   
01581                   if ( CompatibleGunForAmmo( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01582                   {
01583                         if ( fOn != fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] )
01584                         {
01585                               fFound = TRUE;
01586                         }
01587 
01588                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01589                         // Render Item with specific color
01590                         fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ cnt ] = fOn;
01591 
01592                   }
01593             }
01594       }
01595 
01596 
01597       return( fFound );
01598 }
01599 
01600 
01601 BOOLEAN InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pTestObject, BOOLEAN fOn  )
01602 {
01603       BOOLEAN                 fFound = FALSE;
01604       INT32                   cnt;
01605       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject;
01606       BOOLEAN                 fFoundAttachment = FALSE;
01607 
01608       // ATE: If pTest object is NULL, test only for existence of syringes, etc...
01609       if ( pTestObject == NULL )
01610       {
01611             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01612             {
01613                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01614                   
01615                   if ( CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( pObject ) )
01616                   {
01617                         if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01618                         {
01619                               fFound = TRUE;
01620                         }
01621 
01622                         // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01623                         // Render Item with specific color
01624                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01625 
01626                   }
01627             }
01628 
01629 
01630             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01631             {
01632                   if ( CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( gpItemPointer ) )
01633                   {
01634                         // OK, Light up portrait as well.....
01635                         if ( fOn )
01636                         {
01637                               gbCompatibleApplyItem = TRUE;
01638                         }
01639                         else
01640                         {
01641                               gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
01642                         }
01643 
01644                         fFound = TRUE;
01645                   }
01646             }
01647 
01648             if ( fFound )
01649             {
01650                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01651                   //HandleRenderInvSlots( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01652             }
01653 
01654             return( fFound );
01655       }
01656 
01657       // First test attachments, which almost any type of item can have....
01658       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01659       {
01660             pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01661 
01662 //          if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON )
01663             if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].hiddenaddon  )
01664             {
01665                   // don't consider for UI purposes
01666                   continue;
01667             }
01668 
01669             if ( ValidAttachment( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) ||
01670                          ValidAttachment( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01671                          ValidLaunchable( pTestObject->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || 
01672                          ValidLaunchable( pObject->usItem, pTestObject->usItem ) )
01673             {
01674                   fFoundAttachment = TRUE;
01675 
01676                   if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01677                   {
01678                         fFound = TRUE;
01679                   }
01680 
01681                   // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01682                   // Render Item with specific color
01683                   gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01684             }
01685       }
01686 
01687       //if ( !fFoundAttachment )
01688       //{
01689             if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) )
01690             {
01691                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01692                   {
01693                         pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01694                         
01695                         if ( CompatibleAmmoForGun( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01696                         {
01697                               if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01698                               {
01699                                     fFound = TRUE;
01700                               }
01701 
01702                               // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01703                               // Render Item with specific color
01704                               gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01705                         }
01706                   }
01707             }
01708 
01709             else if( ( Item [ pTestObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO ) )
01710             {
01711                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01712                   {
01713                         pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01714                         
01715                         if ( CompatibleGunForAmmo( pObject, pTestObject ) )
01716                         {
01717                               if ( fOn != gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01718                               {
01719                                     fFound = TRUE;
01720                               }
01721 
01722                               // IT's an OK calibere ammo, do something!
01723                               // Render Item with specific color
01724                               gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = fOn;
01725 
01726                         }
01727                   }
01728             }
01729             else if ( CompatibleItemForApplyingOnMerc( pTestObject ) )
01730             {
01731                   //If we are currently NOT in the Shopkeeper interface
01732                   if( !( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE ) )
01733                   {
01734                         fFound = TRUE;
01735                         gbCompatibleApplyItem = fOn;
01736                   }
01737             }
01738       //}
01739 
01740 
01741       if ( !fFound )
01742       {
01743             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01744             {
01745                   if ( gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01746                   {
01747                         fFound = TRUE;
01748                         gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01749                   }
01750 
01751                   if ( gbCompatibleApplyItem )
01752                   {
01753                         fFound = TRUE;
01754                         gbCompatibleApplyItem = FALSE;
01755                   }
01756             }
01757       }
01758 
01759       if ( fFound )
01760       {
01761             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01762             //HandleRenderInvSlots( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01763       }
01764 
01765       return( fFound );
01766 
01767 }
01768 
01769 void ResetCompatibleItemArray( )
01770 {
01771       INT32 cnt = 0;
01772 
01773       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01774       {
01775             if ( gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01776             {
01777                   gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01778             }
01779       }
01780 }
01781 
01782 BOOLEAN HandleCompatibleAmmoUI( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bInvPos, BOOLEAN fOn )
01783 {
01784       INT32 cnt;
01785       OBJECTTYPE  *pTestObject;
01786       BOOLEAN                 fFound = FALSE;
01787 
01788       //if we are in the shopkeeper interface
01789       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
01790       {
01791             // if the inventory position is -1, this is a flag from the Shopkeeper interface screen
01792             //indicating that we are to use a different object to do the search
01793             if( bInvPos == -1 )
01794             {
01795                   if( fOn )
01796                   {
01797                         if( gpHighLightedItemObject )
01798                         {
01799                               pTestObject = gpHighLightedItemObject;
01800 //                            gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL2;
01801                         }
01802                         else
01803                               return( FALSE );
01804                   }
01805                   else
01806                   {
01807                         gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
01808 
01809                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01810                         {
01811                               if ( gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] )
01812                               {
01813                                     fFound = TRUE;
01814                                     gbCompatibleAmmo[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01815                               }
01816                         }
01817 
01818                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;
01819                         return( TRUE );
01820                   }
01821             }
01822             else
01823             {
01824                   if( fOn )
01825                   {
01826                         pTestObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01827                         gpHighLightedItemObject = pTestObject;
01828                   }
01829                   else
01830                   {
01831                         pTestObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01832                         gpHighLightedItemObject = NULL;
01833                         gubSkiDirtyLevel = SKI_DIRTY_LEVEL1;
01834                   }
01835             }
01836       }
01837       else
01838       {
01839 //          if( fOn )
01840 
01841             if ( bInvPos == NO_SLOT )
01842             {
01843                   pTestObject = NULL;
01844             }
01845             else
01846             {
01847                   pTestObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ]);
01848             }
01849                   
01850       }
01851 
01852       return( InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( pSoldier, pTestObject, fOn ) );
01853 
01854 }
01855 
01856 void GetSlotInvXY( UINT8 ubPos, INT16 *psX, INT16 *psY )
01857 {
01858       *psX = gSMInvData[ ubPos ].sX;
01859       *psY = gSMInvData[ ubPos ].sY;
01860 }
01861 
01862 void GetSlotInvHeightWidth( UINT8 ubPos, INT16 *psWidth, INT16 *psHeight )
01863 {
01864       *psWidth    = gSMInvData[ ubPos ].sWidth;
01865       *psHeight   = gSMInvData[ ubPos ].sHeight;
01866 }
01867 
01868 void HandleNewlyAddedItems( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN *fDirtyLevel )
01869 {
01870       UINT32 cnt;
01871       INT16  sX, sY;
01872       OBJECTTYPE        *pObject;
01873 
01874 
01875       // If item description up.... stop
01876       if ( gfInItemDescBox )
01877       {
01878             return;
01879       }
01880 
01881       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01882       {
01883             if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] == -2 )
01884             {
01885                   // Stop
01886                   *fDirtyLevel = DIRTYLEVEL2;
01887                   pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] = 0;
01888             }
01889 
01890             if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] > 0 )
01891             {
01892 
01893                   sX = gSMInvData[ cnt ].sX;
01894                   sY = gSMInvData[ cnt ].sY;
01895 
01896                   pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ cnt ]);
01897             
01898                   if ( pObject->usItem == NOTHING )
01899                   {
01900                         gbNewItem[ cnt ] = 0;
01901                         continue;
01902                   }
01903 
01904                   INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier, pObject, sX, sY, gSMInvData[ cnt ].sWidth, gSMInvData[ cnt ].sHeight, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, 0, TRUE, us16BPPItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ pSoldier->bNewItemCycleCount[ cnt ] ] );
01905 
01906             }
01907 
01908       }
01909 }
01910 
01911 void CheckForAnyNewlyAddedItems( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01912 {
01913       UINT32 cnt;
01914 
01915       // OK, l0ok for any new...
01916       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01917       {
01918             if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] == -1 )
01919             {
01920                   pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ]      = NEW_ITEM_CYCLES - 1;
01921             }
01922       }
01923 
01924 }
01925 
01926 void DegradeNewlyAddedItems( )
01927 {
01928       UINT32 uiTime;
01929       UINT32 cnt, cnt2;
01930       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01931 
01932       // If time done
01933       uiTime = GetJA2Clock();
01934 
01935       if ( ( uiTime - guiNewlyPlacedItemTimer ) > 100 )
01936       {
01937             guiNewlyPlacedItemTimer = uiTime;
01938 
01939             for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < NUM_TEAM_SLOTS; cnt2++ )
01940             {
01941                   // GET SOLDIER
01942                   if ( gTeamPanel[ cnt2 ].fOccupied )
01943                   {
01944                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTeamPanel[ cnt2 ].ubID ];
01945 
01946                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_SLOTS; cnt++ )
01947                         {
01948                               if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] > 0 )
01949                               {
01950                                     // Decrement all the time!
01951                                     pSoldier->bNewItemCycleCount[ cnt ]--;
01952 
01953                                     if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCycleCount[ cnt ] == 0 )
01954                                     {
01955                                           // OK, cycle down....
01956                                           pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ]--;
01957 
01958                                           if ( pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] == 0 )
01959                                           {
01960                                                 // Stop...
01961                                                 pSoldier->bNewItemCount[ cnt ] = -2;
01962                                           }
01963                                           else
01964                                           {
01965                                                 // Reset!
01966                                                 pSoldier->bNewItemCycleCount[ cnt ] = NEW_ITEM_CYCLE_COUNT;
01967                                                 continue;
01968                                           }
01969                                     }
01970                               }
01971                         }
01972                   }
01973             }
01974       }
01975 }
01976 
01977 
01978 void InitItemInterface( )
01979 {
01980       UINT32 cnt, cnt2;
01981 
01982       for ( cnt = 0, cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < 20; cnt+=3, cnt2++ )
01983       {
01984             us16BPPItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ cnt2 ] = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( ubRGBItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ cnt ], ubRGBItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ cnt + 1 ], ubRGBItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ cnt + 2] ) );
01985       }
01986 
01987 }
01988 
01989 
01990 void INVRenderItem( UINT32 uiBuffer, SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE  *pObject, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, UINT8 fDirtyLevel, UINT8 *pubHighlightCounter, UINT8 ubStatusIndex, BOOLEAN fOutline, INT16 sOutlineColor )
01991 {
01992       UINT16                                                uiStringLength;
01993       INVTYPE                                               *pItem;
01994   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
01995       UINT32                                                usHeight, usWidth;
01996       INT16                                                 sCenX, sCenY, sNewY, sNewX;
01997       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
01998       BOOLEAN                                               fLineSplit = FALSE;
01999       INT16                                                 sFontX2, sFontY2;
02000       INT16                                                 sFontX, sFontY;
02001 
02002       static INT16                              pStr[ 100 ], pStr2[ 100 ];
02003 
02004       if ( pObject->usItem == NOTHING )
02005       {
02006             return;
02007       }
02008 
02009       if ( ubStatusIndex < RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 )
02010       {
02011             pItem = &Item[ pObject->usItem ];
02012       }
02013       else
02014       {
02015             pItem = &Item[ pObject->usAttachItem[ ubStatusIndex - RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 ] ];
02016       }
02017 
02018       if ( fDirtyLevel == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
02019       {
02020             // TAKE A LOOK AT THE VIDEO OBJECT SIZE ( ONE OF TWO SIZES ) AND CENTER!
02021             GetVideoObject( &hVObject, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ) );
02022             pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ pItem->ubGraphicNum ] );
02023             usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
02024             usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
02025 
02026 
02027 
02028             // CENTER IN SLOT!
02029             // CANCEL OFFSETS!
02030             sCenX =  sX + (INT16)( abs( sWidth - (double)usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
02031             sCenY =  sY + (INT16)( abs( sHeight - (double)usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
02032 
02033             // Shadow area
02034             if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( uiBuffer, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX - 2, sCenY + 2 );
02035             
02036             BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( uiBuffer, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX, sCenY, sOutlineColor, fOutline );
02037 
02038 
02039             if ( uiBuffer == FRAME_BUFFER )
02040             {
02041                   InvalidateRegion( sX, sY, (INT16)(sX + sWidth), (INT16)(sY + sHeight ) );
02042             }
02043             else
02044             {
02045                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sX, sY, sWidth, sHeight );
02046             }
02047 
02048       }
02049 
02050       SetFont( ITEM_FONT );
02051 
02052       if ( fDirtyLevel != DIRTYLEVEL0 )
02053       {
02054 
02055             if ( ubStatusIndex < RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 )
02056             {
02057 
02058                   SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02059                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );
02060 
02061                   // FIRST DISPLAY FREE ROUNDS REMIANING
02062                   if ( pItem->usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[pObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
02063                   {
02064                         sNewY = sY + sHeight - 10;
02065                         sNewX = sX + 1;
02066 
02067                         SetFontForeground ( AmmoTypes[pObject->ubGunAmmoType].fontColour );
02068                         //switch (pObject->ubGunAmmoType)
02069                         //{
02070                         //    case AMMO_AP:
02071                         //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
02072                         //          SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTAPFORE );
02073                         //          break;
02074                         //    case AMMO_HP:
02075                         //          SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHPFORE );
02076                         //          break;
02077                         //    case AMMO_BUCKSHOT:
02078                         //          SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTBSFORE );
02079                         //          break;
02080                         //    case AMMO_HE:
02081                         //    case AMMO_GRENADE:
02082                         //          SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHEFORE );
02083                         //          break;
02084                         //    case AMMO_HEAT:
02085                         //          SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHEAPFORE );
02086                         //          break;
02087                         //    default:
02088                         //          SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );
02089                         //          break;
02090                         //}
02091       
02092 
02093                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", pObject->ubGunShotsLeft );
02094                         if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02095                         {
02096                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sNewX, sNewY, 20, 15 );
02097                         }
02098                         mprintf( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
02099                         gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02100 
02101                         SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKGRAY );
02102 
02103                         // Display 'JAMMED' if we are jammed
02104                         if ( pObject->bGunAmmoStatus < 0 )
02105                         {
02106                               SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_RED );
02107 
02108                               if ( sWidth >= ( BIG_INV_SLOT_WIDTH - 10 )  )
02109                               {
02110                                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ JAMMED_ITEM_STR ] );
02111                               }
02112                               else
02113                               {
02114                                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, TacticalStr[ SHORT_JAMMED_GUN ] );
02115                               }
02116 
02117                               VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, sWidth, sHeight , ITEM_FONT, &sNewX, &sNewY, pStr );
02118 
02119                               mprintf( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
02120                               gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02121                         }
02122                   }
02123                   else
02124                   {
02125                         if ( ubStatusIndex != RENDER_ITEM_NOSTATUS )
02126                         {
02127                               // Now display # of items
02128                               if ( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
02129                               {
02130                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY4 );
02131 
02132                                     sNewY = sY + sHeight - 10;
02133                                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", pObject->ubNumberOfObjects );
02134 
02135                                     // Get length of string
02136                                     uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEM_FONT );
02137 
02138                                     sNewX = sX + sWidth - uiStringLength - 4;
02139 
02140                                     if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02141                                     {
02142                                           RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sNewX, sNewY, 15, 15 );
02143                                     }
02144                                     mprintf( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
02145                                     gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02146                               }
02147 
02148                         }
02149                   }
02150 
02151                   if ( ItemHasAttachments( pObject ) )
02152                   {
02153                         if ( !IsGrenadeLauncherAttached( pObject ) )
02154                         {
02155                               SetFontForeground( FONT_GREEN );
02156                         }
02157                         else
02158                         {
02159                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
02160                         }
02161 
02162                         sNewY = sY;
02163                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"*" );
02164 
02165                         // Get length of string
02166                         uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEM_FONT );
02167 
02168                         sNewX = sX + sWidth - uiStringLength - 4;
02169 
02170                         if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02171                         {
02172                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sNewX, sNewY, 15, 15 );
02173                         }
02174                         mprintf( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
02175                         gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02176 
02177                   }
02178 
02179                   if ( pSoldier && pObject == &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS] ) && pSoldier->bWeaponMode != WM_NORMAL )
02180                   {
02181                         sNewY = sY + 13; // rather arbitrary
02182                         if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_BURST )
02183                         {
02184                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"BRST" );
02185                               SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02186                         }
02187                         else if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_AUTOFIRE)
02188                         {
02189                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"AUTO" );
02190                               SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02191                         }
02192                         else if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL)
02193                         {
02194                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"GL" );
02195                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
02196                         }
02197                         else if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST)
02198                         {
02199                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"GL BRST" );
02200                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
02201                         }
02202                         else if(pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO)
02203                         {
02204                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"GL AUTO" );
02205                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
02206                         }
02207 
02208                         // Get length of string
02209                         uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEM_FONT );
02210 
02211                         sNewX = sX + sWidth - uiStringLength - 4;
02212 
02213                         if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
02214                         {
02215                               RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sNewX, sNewY, 15, 15 );
02216                         }
02217                         mprintf( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
02218                         gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02219                         
02220                   }
02221 
02222 
02223 
02224             }
02225       }
02226 
02227       if ( pubHighlightCounter != NULL )
02228       {
02229             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
02230             SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTGRAY );
02231 
02232             // DO HIGHLIGHT
02233             if ( *pubHighlightCounter )
02234             {
02235                   // Set string
02236                   if ( ubStatusIndex < RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 )
02237                   {
02238                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", ShortItemNames[ pObject->usItem ] );
02239                   }
02240                   else
02241                   {
02242                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", ShortItemNames[ pObject->usAttachItem[ ubStatusIndex - RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 ] ] );
02243                   }
02244 
02245                   fLineSplit = WrapString( pStr, pStr2, WORD_WRAP_INV_WIDTH, ITEM_FONT );
02246 
02247                   VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, sWidth, sHeight , ITEM_FONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, pStr );
02248                   sFontY = sY + 1;
02249                   gprintfinvalidate( sFontX, sFontY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02250 
02251                   if ( fLineSplit )
02252                   {
02253                         VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, sWidth, sHeight , ITEM_FONT, &sFontX2, &sFontY2, pStr2 );
02254                         sFontY2 = sY + 13;
02255                         gprintfinvalidate( sFontX2, sFontY2, (UINT16 *)pStr2 );
02256                   }
02257 
02258             }
02259 
02260             if ( *pubHighlightCounter == 2 )
02261             {
02262                   mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, pStr );
02263 
02264                   if ( fLineSplit )
02265                   {
02266                         mprintf( sFontX2, sFontY2, pStr2 );
02267                   }
02268             }
02269             else if ( *pubHighlightCounter == 1 )
02270             {
02271                   *pubHighlightCounter = 0;
02272                   gprintfRestore( sFontX, sFontY, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02273 
02274                   if ( fLineSplit )
02275                   {
02276                         gprintfRestore( sFontX2, sFontY2, (UINT16 *)pStr2 );
02277                   }
02278             }
02279       }
02280 }
02281 
02282 
02283 BOOLEAN InItemDescriptionBox( )
02284 {
02285       return( gfInItemDescBox );
02286 }
02287 
02288 void CycleItemDescriptionItem( )
02289 {
02290       INT16 usOldItem;
02291 
02292       // Delete old box...
02293       DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
02294 
02295       // Make new item....
02296       usOldItem = gpItemDescSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
02297 
02298       if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
02299       {
02300             usOldItem--;
02301 
02302             while ( usOldItem > 0 && ( Item[usOldItem].usItemClass == IC_NONE || Item[usOldItem].usItemClass == 0 ))
02303             {
02304                   usOldItem--;
02305             }
02306 
02307             if ( usOldItem < 0 )
02308             {
02309                   usOldItem = MAXITEMS-1;
02310             }
02311       }
02312       else
02313       {
02314             usOldItem++;
02315 
02316             if ( usOldItem > MAXITEMS )
02317             {
02318                   usOldItem = 0;
02319             }
02320 
02321             while (usOldItem < MAXITEMS && (Item[usOldItem].usItemClass == IC_NONE || Item[usOldItem].usItemClass == 0 ))
02322             {
02323                   usOldItem++;
02324             }
02325       }
02326 
02327       CreateItem( (UINT16)usOldItem, 100, &( gpItemDescSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
02328 
02329       InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( &( gpItemDescSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), 214, (INT16)(INV_INTERFACE_START_Y + 1 ), gubItemDescStatusIndex, gpItemDescSoldier );
02330 }
02331 
02332 BOOLEAN InitItemDescriptionBox( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubPosition, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, UINT8 ubStatusIndex )
02333 {
02334       OBJECTTYPE *pObject;
02335 
02336 //DEF:
02337       //if we are in the shopkeeper screen, and we are to use the 
02338       if( guiCurrentScreen == SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN && ubPosition == 255 )
02339       {
02340             pObject = pShopKeeperItemDescObject;
02341       }
02342 
02343       //else use item from the hand position
02344       else
02345       {
02346             pObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ ubPosition ] );
02347       }
02348 
02349       return( InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( pObject, sX, sY, ubStatusIndex, pSoldier ) );
02350 }
02351 
02352 BOOLEAN InitKeyItemDescriptionBox( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubPosition, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, UINT8 ubStatusIndex )
02353 {
02354       OBJECTTYPE *pObject;
02355 
02356       AllocateObject( &pObject );
02357       CreateKeyObject( pObject, pSoldier->pKeyRing[ ubPosition ].ubNumber ,pSoldier->pKeyRing[ ubPosition ].ubKeyID );
02358 
02359       return( InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( pObject, sX, sY, ubStatusIndex, pSoldier ) );
02360 }
02361 
02362 BOOLEAN InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( OBJECTTYPE *pObject, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, UINT8 ubStatusIndex, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02363 {  
02364       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
02365       UINT8 ubString[48];
02366       INT32       cnt;
02367       INT16       pStr[10];
02368       UINT16      usX, usY;
02369       INT16       sForeColour;
02370       INT16 sProsConsIndent;
02371 
02372       //Set the current screen
02373       guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
02374 
02375       // Set X, Y
02376       gsInvDescX = sX;
02377       gsInvDescY = sY;
02378 
02379       gpItemDescObject = pObject;
02380       gubItemDescStatusIndex = ubStatusIndex;
02381       gpItemDescSoldier = pSoldier;
02382       fItemDescDelete         = FALSE;
02383 
02384       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
02385       if (guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen ==  MAP_SCREEN )
02386       {
02387             
02388             //return( FALSE );
02389 
02390     MSYS_DefineRegion( &gInvDesc, (UINT16)gsInvDescX, (UINT16)gsInvDescY ,(UINT16)(gsInvDescX + MAP_ITEMDESC_WIDTH), (UINT16)(gsInvDescY + MAP_ITEMDESC_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2,
02391                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescCallback );       
02392                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gInvDesc);
02393 
02394                   giMapInvDescButtonImage=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\itemdescdonebutton.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
02395                   
02396                   // create button
02397                   giMapInvDescButton= QuickCreateButton( giMapInvDescButtonImage, (UINT16)( gsInvDescX + 204 ), (UINT16)( gsInvDescY + 107 ),
02398                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02399                                                             ( GUI_CALLBACK )BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemDescDoneButtonCallback );
02400       
02401                   fShowDescriptionFlag = TRUE;
02402       }
02403       else
02404       {
02405        MSYS_DefineRegion( &gInvDesc, (UINT16)gsInvDescX, (UINT16)gsInvDescY ,(UINT16)(gsInvDescX + ITEMDESC_WIDTH), (UINT16)(gsInvDescY + ITEMDESC_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02406                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescCallback ); 
02407        MSYS_AddRegion( &gInvDesc);
02408 
02409 
02410       }
02411   // Add region
02412       if ( (Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN) && !Item[pObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
02413       {
02414             // Add button
02415 //    if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
02416             //if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
02417             if ( GetMagSize(gpItemDescObject) <= 99 )
02418                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d/%d", gpItemDescObject->ubGunShotsLeft, GetMagSize(gpItemDescObject));
02419             else
