02420                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", gpItemDescObject->ubGunShotsLeft );
02421 
02422             FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\infobox.sti", (STR)ubString);
02423              sForeColour = ITEMDESC_AMMO_FORE;
02424 
02425             giItemDescAmmoButtonImages    = LoadButtonImage(ubString,AmmoTypes[pObject->ubGunAmmoType].grayed,AmmoTypes[pObject->ubGunAmmoType].offNormal,-1,AmmoTypes[pObject->ubGunAmmoType].onNormal,-1 );
02426 
02427             //switch( pObject->ubGunAmmoType )
02428             //{
02429             //    case AMMO_AP:
02430             //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
02431             //     //sForeColour = ITEMDESC_FONTAPFORE;
02432             //     giItemDescAmmoButtonImages               = LoadButtonImage(ubString,8,5,-1,7,-1 );
02433             //     break;
02434             //    case AMMO_HP:
02435             //     //sForeColour = ITEMDESC_FONTHPFORE;
02436             //     
02437             //     giItemDescAmmoButtonImages               = LoadButtonImage(ubString,12,9,-1,11,-1 );
02438             //     break;
02439             //    default:
02440             //     //sForeColour = FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE;
02441             //     giItemDescAmmoButtonImages               = LoadButtonImage(ubString,4,1,-1,3,-1 );
02442             //     break;
02443 
02444             //}
02445             
02446             if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02447             {
02448                   // in mapscreen, move over a bit
02449                   giItemDescAmmoButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giItemDescAmmoButtonImages, pStr, TINYFONT1, 
02450                                                                                            sForeColour, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK,
02451                                                                                            sForeColour, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK,
02452                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02453                                                                                            (INT16)(ITEMDESC_AMMO_X + 18), (INT16)(ITEMDESC_AMMO_Y - 5), BUTTON_TOGGLE ,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02454                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemDescAmmoCallback );
02455 
02456             }
02457             else
02458             {
02459 
02460                   // not in mapscreen
02461              giItemDescAmmoButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giItemDescAmmoButtonImages, pStr, TINYFONT1, 
02462                                                                                            sForeColour, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK,
02463                                                                                            sForeColour, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK,
02464                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02465                                                                                            (INT16)(ITEMDESC_AMMO_X), (INT16)(ITEMDESC_AMMO_Y), BUTTON_TOGGLE ,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02466                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemDescAmmoCallback );
02467 
02468              //if we are being called from the 
02469             }
02470             //if we are being init from the shop keeper screen and this is a dealer item we are getting info from
02471             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
02472             {
02473                   //disable the eject button
02474                   SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giItemDescAmmoButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
02475 
02476                   DisableButton( giItemDescAmmoButton );
02477                   SetButtonFastHelpText( giItemDescAmmoButton, L"\0" );
02478             }
02479             else
02480                   SetButtonFastHelpText( giItemDescAmmoButton, Message[ STR_EJECT_AMMO ] );
02481              
02482             FindFontCenterCoordinates( (INT16)ITEMDESC_AMMO_TEXT_X, (INT16)ITEMDESC_AMMO_TEXT_Y, ITEMDESC_AMMO_TEXT_WIDTH, GetFontHeight( TINYFONT1 ), pStr, TINYFONT1, &usX, &usY);
02483       
02484             SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( giItemDescAmmoButton, (UINT8) usX, (UINT8) usY, TRUE );
02485                         
02486             gfItemAmmoDown = FALSE;
02487 
02488       }
02489 
02490       if ( ITEM_PROS_AND_CONS( gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
02491       {
02492             if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02493             {
02494                   sProsConsIndent = __max( StringPixLength( gzProsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ), StringPixLength( gzConsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ) ) + 10;
02495                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 2; cnt++ )
02496                   {
02497                         // Add region for pros/cons help text 
02498                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ], 
02499                               (INT16)(ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), 
02500                               (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iTop), 
02501                               (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iRight), 
02502                               (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iBottom), 
02503                               MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescCallback ); 
02504 
02505                         MSYS_AddRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[cnt]);
02506 
02507                         if (cnt == 0)
02508                         {
02509                               wcscpy( gzFullItemPros, gzProsLabel );
02510                               wcscat( gzFullItemPros, L" " );
02511                               // use temp variable to prevent an initial comma from being displayed
02512                               GenerateProsString( gzFullItemTemp, gpItemDescObject, 1000 );
02513                               wcscat( gzFullItemPros, gzFullItemTemp );
02514                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), gzFullItemPros );
02515                         }
02516                         else
02517                         {
02518                               wcscpy( gzFullItemCons, gzConsLabel );
02519                               wcscat( gzFullItemCons, L" " );
02520                               // use temp variable to prevent an initial comma from being displayed
02521                               GenerateConsString( gzFullItemTemp, gpItemDescObject, 1000 );
02522                               wcscat( gzFullItemCons, gzFullItemTemp );
02523                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), gzFullItemCons );
02524                         }
02525                         SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
02526                   }
02527 
02528             }
02529             else
02530             {
02531                   sProsConsIndent = __max( StringPixLength( gzProsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ), StringPixLength( gzConsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ) ) + 10;
02532                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 2; cnt++ )
02533                   {
02534                         // Add region for pros/cons help text 
02535                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ], 
02536                               (INT16)(ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), 
02537                               (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iTop), 
02538                               (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iRight), 
02539                               (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gItemDescProsConsRects[ cnt ].iBottom), 
02540                               MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescCallback ); 
02541 
02542                         MSYS_AddRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[cnt]);
02543 
02544                         if (cnt == 0)
02545                         {
02546                               wcscpy( gzFullItemPros, gzProsLabel );
02547                               wcscat( gzFullItemPros, L" " );
02548                               // use temp variable to prevent an initial comma from being displayed
02549                               GenerateProsString( gzFullItemTemp, gpItemDescObject, 1000 );
02550                               wcscat( gzFullItemPros, gzFullItemTemp );
02551                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), gzFullItemPros );
02552                         }
02553                         else
02554                         {
02555                               wcscpy( gzFullItemCons, gzConsLabel );
02556                               wcscat( gzFullItemCons, L" " );
02557                               // use temp variable to prevent an initial comma from being displayed
02558                               GenerateConsString( gzFullItemTemp, gpItemDescObject, 1000 );
02559                               wcscat( gzFullItemCons, gzFullItemTemp );
02560                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), gzFullItemCons );
02561                         }
02562                         SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gProsAndConsRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
02563                   }
02564             }
02565       }
02566 
02567       // Load graphic
02568       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02569       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\infobox.sti" );
02570       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiItemDescBox) );
02571 
02572 
02573       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02574       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\iteminfoc.STI" );
02575       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMapItemDescBox) );
02576 
02577       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02578       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\bullet.STI" );
02579       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiBullet) );
02580 
02581       if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem != MONEY  )
02582       {
02583             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
02584             {
02585                   // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
02586 //                if (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
02587                   if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02588                          MSYS_DefineRegion( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[cnt], (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX), (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY), (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sWidth), (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02589                                                  MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescAttachmentsCallback ); 
02590                   else
02591                          MSYS_DefineRegion( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[cnt], (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX), (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY), (INT16)(gsInvDescX + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDx + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sWidth), (INT16)(gsInvDescY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02592                                                  MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemDescAttachmentsCallback ); 
02593                   // Add region
02594                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[cnt]);
02595                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[cnt], 0, cnt );
02596 
02597                   if ( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
02598                   {
02599                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), ItemNames[ gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] ] );
02600                         SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
02601                   }
02602                   else
02603                   {
02604                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), Message[ STR_ATTACHMENTS ] );
02605                         SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
02606                   }
02607             }
02608       }
02609       else
02610       {
02611             memset( &gRemoveMoney, 0, sizeof( REMOVE_MONEY ) );
02612             gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount = gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount;
02613             gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining = gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount;
02614             gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving = 0;
02615 
02616             // Load graphic
02617             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02618             strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\info_bil.sti" );
02619             CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMoneyGraphicsForDescBox) );
02620 
02621             //Create buttons for the money
02622 //          if (guiCurrentScreen ==  MAP_SCREEN )
02623             if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02624             {
02625                   guiMoneyButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\Info_bil.sti", -1,1,-1,2,-1 );
02626                   for(cnt=0; cnt<MAX_ATTACHMENTS-1; cnt++)
02627                   {
02628                         guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiMoneyButtonImage, gzMoneyAmounts[cnt], BLOCKFONT2, 
02629                                                                                                  5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02630                                                                                                  5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02631                                                                                                  TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02632                                                                                                  (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].x), (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].y), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02633                                                                                                  DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMoneyButtonCallback );
02634                         MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt], 0, cnt);
02635                         if( cnt == M_1000 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 1000 )
02636                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02637                         else if( cnt == M_100 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 100 )
02638                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02639                         else if( cnt == M_10 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 10 )
02640                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02641                   }
02642                   //Create the Done button
02643                   guiMoneyDoneButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiMoneyButtonImage, -1,3,-1,4,-1 );
02644                   guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiMoneyDoneButtonImage, gzMoneyAmounts[cnt], BLOCKFONT2, 
02645                                                                                            5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02646                                                                                            5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02647                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02648                                                                                            (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].x), (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].y), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02649                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMoneyButtonCallback );
02650                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt], 0, cnt);
02651 
02652             }
02653             else
02654             {
02655                   guiMoneyButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\Info_bil.sti", -1,1,-1,2,-1 );
02656                   for(cnt=0; cnt<MAX_ATTACHMENTS-1; cnt++)
02657                   {
02658                         guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiMoneyButtonImage, gzMoneyAmounts[cnt], BLOCKFONT2, 
02659                                                                                                  5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02660                                                                                                  5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02661                                                                                                  TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02662                                                                                                  (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].x), (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].y), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02663                                                                                                  DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMoneyButtonCallback );
02664                         MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt], 0, cnt);
02665                         if( cnt == M_1000 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 1000 )
02666                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02667                         else if( cnt == M_100 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 100 )
02668                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02669                         else if( cnt == M_10 && gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount < 10 )
02670                               DisableButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
02671                   }
02672 
02673                   //Create the Done button
02674                   guiMoneyDoneButtonImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( guiMoneyButtonImage, -1,3,6,4,5 );
02675                   guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiMoneyDoneButtonImage, gzMoneyAmounts[cnt], BLOCKFONT2, 
02676                                                                                            5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02677                                                                                            5, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
02678                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02679                                                                                            (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].x), (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].y), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
02680                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnMoneyButtonCallback );
02681                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt], 0, cnt);
02682             }
02683       }
02684 
02685       
02686       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02687       
02688 
02689       gfInItemDescBox = TRUE;
02690 
02691       CHECKF( ReloadItemDesc( ) );
02692 
02693       if ( gpItemPointer )
02694       {
02695             gpAttachSoldier = gpItemPointerSoldier;
02696       }
02697       else
02698       {
02699             gpAttachSoldier = pSoldier;
02700       }
02701       // store attachments that item originally had
02702       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
02703       {
02704             gusOriginalAttachItem[ cnt ] = pObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ];
02705             gbOriginalAttachStatus[ cnt ] = pObject->bAttachStatus[ cnt ];
02706       }
02707 
02708 
02709       if ( (gpItemPointer != NULL) && (gfItemDescHelpTextOffset == FALSE) && (CheckFact( FACT_ATTACHED_ITEM_BEFORE, 0 ) == FALSE) )
02710       {
02711             // set up help text for attachments
02712             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_INV_HELPTEXT_ENTRIES; cnt++ )
02713             {
02714                   gItemDescHelpText.iXPosition[ cnt ] += gsInvDescX;
02715                   gItemDescHelpText.iYPosition[ cnt ] += gsInvDescY;
02716             }
02717 
02718 //          if ( !(Item[ pObject->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON) && ( ValidAttachment( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || ValidLaunchable( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || ValidMerge( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) ) )
02719             if ( !(Item[ pObject->usItem ].hiddenaddon ) && ( ValidAttachment( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || ValidLaunchable( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) || ValidMerge( gpItemPointer->usItem, pObject->usItem ) ) )
02720             {
02721                   SetUpFastHelpListRegions( 
02722                         gItemDescHelpText.iXPosition, 
02723                         gItemDescHelpText.iYPosition, 
02724                         gItemDescHelpText.iWidth, 
02725                         gItemDescHelpText.sString1,
02726                         NUM_INV_HELPTEXT_ENTRIES );         
02727             }
02728             else
02729             {
02730                   SetUpFastHelpListRegions( 
02731                         gItemDescHelpText.iXPosition, 
02732                         gItemDescHelpText.iYPosition, 
02733                         gItemDescHelpText.iWidth, 
02734                         gItemDescHelpText.sString2,
02735                         NUM_INV_HELPTEXT_ENTRIES );
02736             }
02737 
02738             StartShowingInterfaceFastHelpText();
02739 
02740             SetFactTrue( FACT_ATTACHED_ITEM_BEFORE );
02741             gfItemDescHelpTextOffset = TRUE;
02742       }
02743 
02744 
02745 
02746       return( TRUE );
02747 }
02748 
02749 
02750 BOOLEAN ReloadItemDesc( )
02751 {
02752       if ( !LoadTileGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ]), &guiItemGraphic ) )
02753       {
02754             return( FALSE );
02755       }
02756 
02757       //
02758       // Load name, desc
02759       //
02760 
02761       //if the player is extracting money from the players account, use a different item name and description
02762       if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount && gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
02763       {
02764             if ( !LoadItemInfo( MONEY_FOR_PLAYERS_ACCOUNT, gzItemName, gzItemDesc ) )
02765             {
02766                   return( FALSE );
02767             }
02768       }
02769       else
02770       {
02771             if ( !LoadItemInfo( gpItemDescObject->usItem, gzItemName, gzItemDesc ) )
02772             {
02773                   return( FALSE );
02774             }
02775       }
02776 
02777 /*
02778       if (Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON)
02779       {
02780             // load item pros and cons
02781             if ( !LoadItemProsAndCons( gpItemDescObject->usItem, gzItemPros, gzItemCons ) )
02782             {
02783                   return( FALSE );
02784             }
02785       }
02786       else
02787       {
02788             wcscpy( gzItemPros, L"" );
02789             wcscpy( gzItemCons, L"" );
02790       }
02791       */
02792 
02793       return( TRUE );
02794 }
02795 
02796 
02797 void ItemDescAmmoCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02798 {
02799       static BOOLEAN fRightDown = FALSE;
02800       INT16       pStr[10];
02801 
02802 /*    region gets disabled in SKI for shopkeeper boxes.  It now works normally for merc's inventory boxes!
02803       //if we are currently in the shopkeeper interface, return;
02804       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02805       {
02806             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02807             return;
02808       }
02809 */
02810 
02811       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02812       {
02813             fRightDown = TRUE;
02814             gfItemAmmoDown = TRUE;
02815             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02816       }
02817       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP && fRightDown )
02818       {
02819             fRightDown = FALSE;
02820             gfItemAmmoDown = FALSE;
02821 
02822             if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02823             {                 
02824                   if ( gpItemPointer == NULL && EmptyWeaponMagazine( gpItemDescObject, &gItemPointer ) )
02825                   {
02826                         // OK, END the description box
02827                         //fItemDescDelete = TRUE;
02828                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02829                         gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
02830                         gpItemPointerSoldier = gpItemDescSoldier;
02831 
02832                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"0" );
02833                         SpecifyButtonText( giItemDescAmmoButton, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02834 
02835                         // Set mouse
02836                         guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
02837                         gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
02838 
02839                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
02840                         MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
02841                         fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
02842                         fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
02843                   }
02844             }
02845             else
02846             {
02847                   // Set pointer to item
02848                   if ( gpItemPointer == NULL && EmptyWeaponMagazine( gpItemDescObject, &gItemPointer ) )
02849                   {
02850                         gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
02851                         gpItemPointerSoldier = gpItemDescSoldier;
02852 
02853                         // if in SKI, load item into SKI's item pointer
02854                         if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02855                         {
02856                               // pick up bullets from weapon into cursor (don't try to sell)
02857                               BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_INVENTORY, -1, FALSE );
02858                         }
02859 
02860                         // OK, END the description box
02861                         //fItemDescDelete = TRUE;
02862                         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02863 
02864                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"0" );
02865                         SpecifyButtonText( giItemDescAmmoButton, (UINT16 *)pStr );
02866 
02867                         fItemDescDelete = TRUE;
02868                   }
02869 
02870             }
02871             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02872 
02873       }
02874 
02875 }
02876 
02877 
02878 void DoAttachment( void )
02879 {
02880       if ( AttachObject( gpItemDescSoldier, gpItemDescObject, gpItemPointer ) )
02881       {
02882             if (gpItemPointer->usItem == NOTHING)
02883             {
02884                   // attachment attached, merge item consumed, etc
02885 
02886       if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
02887       {
02888         MAPEndItemPointer( );
02889       }
02890       else
02891       {
02892                         // End Item pickup
02893                         gpItemPointer = NULL;
02894                         EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE , TRUE );
02895 
02896                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion , CURSOR_NORMAL ); 
02897                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
02898 
02899                         //if we are currently in the shopkeeper interface
02900                         if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02901                         {
02902                               //Clear out the moving cursor
02903                               memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
02904 
02905                               //change the curosr back to the normal one
02906                               SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
02907                         }
02908                   }
02909             }
02910 
02911             if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem == NOTHING )
02912             {
02913                   // close desc panel panel
02914                   DeleteItemDescriptionBox();
02915             }
02916             //Dirty interface
02917             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
02918 
02919             ReloadItemDesc( );                  
02920       }
02921 
02922       // re-evaluate repairs
02923       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
02924 }
02925 
02926 void PermanantAttachmentMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 ubExitValue )
02927 {
02928       if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
02929       {
02930             DoAttachment();
02931       }
02932       // else do nothing
02933 }
02934 
02935 void ItemDescAttachmentsCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02936 {
02937       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
02938       static BOOLEAN    fRightDown = FALSE;
02939 
02940       if ( gfItemDescObjectIsAttachment )
02941       {
02942             // screen out completely
02943             return;
02944       }
02945 
02946       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02947 
02948       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02949       {
02950             // if the item being described belongs to a shopkeeper, ignore attempts to pick it up / replace it
02951             if( ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE ) && ( pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL ) )
02952             {
02953                   return;
02954             }
02955 
02956             // Try to place attachment if something is in our hand
02957             // require as many APs as to reload
02958             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
02959             {
02960                   // nb pointer could be NULL because of inventory manipulation in mapscreen from sector inv
02961                   if ( !gpItemPointerSoldier || EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, AttachmentAPCost( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ), 0, TRUE ) )
02962                   {
02963 //                      if ( (Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_INSEPARABLE) && ValidAttachment( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
02964                         if ( (Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].inseparable ) && ValidAttachment( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
02965                         {
02966                               DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( Message[ STR_PERMANENT_ATTACHMENT ], ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, PermanantAttachmentMessageBoxCallBack );
02967                               return;
02968                         }
02969 
02970                         DoAttachment();
02971                   }
02972             }
02973             else
02974             {
02975       // ATE: Make sure we have enough AP's to drop it if we pick it up!
02976                   if ( EnoughPoints( gpItemDescSoldier, ( AttachmentAPCost( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[uiItemPos], gpItemDescObject->usItem ) + AP_PICKUP_ITEM ), 0, TRUE ) )
02977                   {
02978                         // Get attachment if there is one
02979                         // The follwing function will handle if no attachment is here
02980                         if ( RemoveAttachment( gpItemDescObject, (UINT8)uiItemPos, &gItemPointer ) )
02981                         {
02982                               gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
02983                               gpItemPointerSoldier = gpItemDescSoldier;
02984 
02985       //                      if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02986                               if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02987                               {
02988                                     // Set mouse
02989                                     guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
02990                                     gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
02991 
02992                                     MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
02993                                     MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
02994                                     fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
02995                                     fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
02996                               }
02997 
02998                               //if we are currently in the shopkeeper interface
02999                               else if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
03000                               {
03001                                     // pick up attachment from item into cursor (don't try to sell)
03002                                     BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_INVENTORY, -1, FALSE );
03003                               }
03004 
03005                               //Dirty interface
03006                               fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03007 
03008                               // re-evaluate repairs
03009                               gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
03010 
03011                               UpdateItemHatches();
03012                         }
03013                   }
03014             }
03015       }
03016       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
03017       {
03018             fRightDown = TRUE;
03019       }
03020       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP && fRightDown )
03021       {
03022             static OBJECTTYPE Object2;
03023 
03024             fRightDown = FALSE;
03025 
03026             if ( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ uiItemPos ] != NOTHING )
03027             {
03028                   BOOLEAN fShopkeeperItem = FALSE;
03029 
03030                   // remember if this is a shopkeeper's item we're viewing ( pShopKeeperItemDescObject will get nuked on deletion )
03031                   if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE && pShopKeeperItemDescObject != NULL )
03032                   {
03033                         fShopkeeperItem = TRUE;
03034                   }
03035 
03036                   DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
03037 
03038                   if ( CreateItem( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ uiItemPos ], gpItemDescObject->bAttachStatus[ uiItemPos ], &Object2 ) )
03039                   {
03040                         gfItemDescObjectIsAttachment = TRUE;
03041                         InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( &Object2, gsInvDescX, gsInvDescY, 0, gpItemDescSoldier );
03042 
03043                         if ( fShopkeeperItem )
03044                         {
03045                               pShopKeeperItemDescObject = &Object2;
03046                               StartSKIDescriptionBox( );
03047                         }
03048                   }
03049             }
03050       }
03051 }
03052 
03053 void RenderItemDescriptionBox( )
03054 {
03055   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
03056       UINT32                                                usHeight, usWidth;
03057       INT16                                                 sCenX, sCenY, sStrX;
03058       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
03059       CHAR16                                                sTempString[ 128 ];
03060 
03061       UINT16                                                uiStringLength, uiRightLength;
03062       static INT16                              pStr[ 100 ];
03063       INT32                                                 cnt;
03064       FLOAT                                                 fWeight;
03065       UINT16                                                usX, usY;
03066       UINT8                                                 ubAttackAPs;
03067       BOOLEAN                                               fHatchOutAttachments = gfItemDescObjectIsAttachment; // if examining attachment, always hatch out attachment slots
03068       INT16                                                 sProsConsIndent;
03069 
03070   if( ( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) &&(gfInItemDescBox ) )
03071       {
03072       // TAKE A LOOK AT THE VIDEO OBJECT SIZE ( ONE OF TWO SIZES ) AND CENTER!
03073             GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemGraphic );
03074             pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
03075             usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
03076             usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
03077 
03078             // CENTER IN SLOT!
03079             // REMOVE OFFSETS!
03080             sCenX = MAP_ITEMDESC_ITEM_X + (INT16)( abs( ITEMDESC_ITEM_WIDTH - (double)usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
03081             sCenY = MAP_ITEMDESC_ITEM_Y + (INT16)( abs( ITEMDESC_ITEM_HEIGHT - (double)usHeight ) / 2 )- pTrav->sOffsetY;
03082 
03083             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiMapItemDescBox, 0, gsInvDescX, gsInvDescY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03084 
03085             //Display the money 'seperating' border
03086             if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
03087             {
03088                   //Render the money Boxes
03089                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiMoneyGraphicsForDescBox, 0, (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[0].x), (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[0].y), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03090             }
03091 
03092 
03093             // Display item
03094             if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiItemGraphic, 0, sCenX - 2, sCenY + 2  );
03095 
03096             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiItemGraphic, 0, sCenX, sCenY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03097             
03098 
03099             // Display ststus
03100             DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemDescObject, gubItemDescStatusIndex, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_Y, ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_WIDTH, ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_HEIGHT_MAP,   Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE, guiSAVEBUFFER );
03101 
03102             if (gpItemPointer)
03103             {
03104 //                if ( ( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON ) ||
03105                   if ( ( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].hiddenaddon  ) ||
03106 
03107                    ( !ValidItemAttachment( gpItemDescObject, gpItemPointer->usItem, FALSE ) &&         
03108                          !ValidMerge( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) && !ValidLaunchable( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) ) )
03109                   {
03110                         // hatch out the attachment panels
03111                         fHatchOutAttachments = TRUE;
03112                   }
03113             }
03114             
03115             // Display attachments
03116             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
03117             {
03118                   if ( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
03119                   {
03120                         
03121 //        if (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
03122                         if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
03123                         {
03124          sCenX = (INT16)( gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX + 5 );
03125                          sCenY = (INT16)( gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY - 1 );
03126  
03127                          INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, NULL, gpItemDescObject, sCenX, sCenY, gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sWidth, gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sHeight, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, (UINT8)(RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), FALSE, 0 );
03128 
03129                          sCenX = sCenX - gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDx;
03130                          sCenY = sCenY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDy;
03131                          DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemDescObject, (UINT8)(DRAW_ITEM_STATUS_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), sCenX, sCenY, ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , guiSAVEBUFFER );
03132 
03133                         }
03134                         else
03135                         {
03136                          sCenX = (INT16)( gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX + 5 );
03137                          sCenY = (INT16)( gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY - 1 );
03138  
03139                          INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, NULL, gpItemDescObject, sCenX, sCenY, gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sWidth, gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sHeight, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, (UINT8)(RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), FALSE, 0 );
03140 
03141                          sCenX = sCenX - gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDx;
03142                          sCenY = sCenY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDy;
03143                          DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemDescObject, (UINT8)(DRAW_ITEM_STATUS_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), sCenX, sCenY, ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , guiSAVEBUFFER );
03144 
03145 
03146                         }
03147                   }
03148 
03149                   if (fHatchOutAttachments )
03150                   {
03151                         DrawHatchOnInventory( guiSAVEBUFFER, (INT16) (gsInvDescX + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sX), (INT16) (gsInvDescY + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sY - 2), (INT16)(gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sWidth + gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sBarDx), (INT16) (gMapItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sHeight + 2) );
03152                   }
03153 
03154             }
03155 
03156             if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN || Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER )
03157             {
03158                   // display bullets for ROF
03159                   if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03160                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, MAP_BULLET_SING_X, MAP_BULLET_SING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03161 
03162                   if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject)> 0)
03163                   {
03164                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < __min(GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject),12); cnt++ )
03165                         {
03166                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, MAP_BULLET_BURST_X + cnt * (BULLET_WIDTH/2 + 1), MAP_BULLET_BURST_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03167                         }
03168                   }
03169                   else if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject) > 0 )
03170                   {
03171                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 10; cnt++ )
03172                         {
03173                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, MAP_BULLET_BURST_X + cnt * (BULLET_WIDTH/2 + 1), MAP_BULLET_BURST_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03174                         }
03175                   }
03176 
03177             }
03178 
03179             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gsInvDescX, gsInvDescY, MAP_ITEMDESC_WIDTH, MAP_ITEMDESC_HEIGHT );
03180 
03181             // Render font desc
03182             SetFont( ITEMDESC_FONT );
03183             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
03184             SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_WHITE );
03185             SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03186 
03187             // Render name
03188             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION 
03189                   mprintf( MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_X, MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, L"%s (%d)", gzItemName, gpItemDescObject->usItem );
03190             #else
03191                   mprintf( MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_X, MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, L"%s", gzItemName );
03192             #endif
03193 
03194             SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03195             SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03196 
03197             DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_START_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemDesc, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03198             
03199             if ( ITEM_PROS_AND_CONS( gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
03200             {
03201                   if ( (Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].fingerprintid ) && gpItemDescObject->ubImprintID < NO_PROFILE )
03202                   {
03203                         // add name noting imprint
03204                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s %s (%s)", AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubCalibre ], WeaponType[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubWeaponType ], gMercProfiles[ gpItemDescObject->ubImprintID ].zNickname );
03205                   }
03206                   else
03207                   {
03208                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s %s", AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubCalibre ], WeaponType[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubWeaponType ] );
03209                   }
03210 
03211                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16) MAP_ITEMDESC_CALIBER_X, (INT16) MAP_ITEMDESC_CALIBER_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_CALIBER_WIDTH, ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT, pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT, &usX, &usY);
03212                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03213 
03214                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE2 );
03215                   SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03216                   mprintf( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, gzProsLabel );
03217 
03218                   sProsConsIndent = __max( StringPixLength( gzProsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ), StringPixLength( gzConsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ) ) + 10;
03219       
03220                   GenerateProsString( gzItemPros, gpItemDescObject, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent - StringPixLength( DOTDOTDOT, ITEMDESC_FONT ) );
03221                   if (gzItemPros[0] != 0)
03222                   {
03223                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03224                         SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03225                         DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)(MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, (INT16)(ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent), 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemPros, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
03226                   }
03227 
03228                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE2 );
03229                   SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03230                   mprintf( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, gzConsLabel );
03231 
03232                   GenerateConsString( gzItemCons, gpItemDescObject, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent - StringPixLength( DOTDOTDOT, ITEMDESC_FONT ) );
03233                   if (gzItemCons[0] != 0)
03234                   {
03235                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03236                         SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03237                         DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)(MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, (INT16)(ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent), 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemCons, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03238                   }
03239             }
03240 
03241 /*
03242             DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzProsLabel, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03243             if (gzItemPros[0] != 0)
03244             {
03245                   DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemPros, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03246             }
03247 
03248             DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzConsLabel, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03249             if (gzItemCons[0] != 0)
03250             {
03251                   DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X, (INT16)MAP_ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, MAP_ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemCons, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03252             }
03253 */
03254 
03255             // Get length of string
03256             uiRightLength=35;
03257 
03258 
03259             //Pulmu: Changed weight calculation of single item in stack
03260             if( Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].usItemClass == IC_AMMO && gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 && gubItemDescStatusIndex < gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects)
03261             {
03262                   //Get weight of one item in stack.
03263                   UINT8 ubShotsLeftFirst = gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0];
03264                   UINT8 ubNumberOfObjects = gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects;
03265                   gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
03266                   gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[gubItemDescStatusIndex];
03267                   fWeight = (float)(CalculateObjectWeight( gpItemDescObject )) / 10;
03268                   gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = ubShotsLeftFirst;
03269                   gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumberOfObjects;
03270             }
03271             //Item does not exist
03272             else if( gubItemDescStatusIndex >= gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
03273             {
03274                   fWeight = (float)0.0;
03275             }
03276             else
03277             {
03278                   fWeight = (float)(CalculateObjectWeight( gpItemDescObject )) / 10;
03279             }
03280 
03281             if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ] ) // metric units not enabled
03282             {
03283                   fWeight = fWeight * 2.2f;
03284             }
03285 
03286             // Add weight of attachments here !
03287 
03288             if ( fWeight < 0.1 && gubItemDescStatusIndex < gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
03289             {
03290                   fWeight = (float)0.1;
03291             }
03292             //Pulmu end
03293 
03294             // Render, stat  name
03295             if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
03296             {  
03297                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03298                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03299                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03300                   
03301                   //LABELS
03302                   swprintf( sTempString, (wchar_t *)gWeaponStatsDesc[ 0 ], GetWeightUnitString() );
03303                   mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", sTempString );              
03304                   //mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].zDesc );
03305                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & (IC_GUN | IC_LAUNCHER ) )
03306                   {
03307                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 3 ] );
03308                   }
03309                   if ( !(Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER) && !Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
03310                   {
03311                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 4 ] );
03312                   }
03313                   mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 5 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 5 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ] );
03314                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN || Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER)
03315                   {
03316                         // equals sign
03317                         if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03318                               mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 7 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 7 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 7 ] );
03319                   }
03320                   mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 1 ] );
03321 
03322 
03323                   if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) > 0 || GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject)>0)
03324                   {
03325                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 8 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 8 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 8 ] );
03326                   }
03327 
03328                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
03329                   //Status
03330                   // This is gross, but to get the % to work out right...
03331                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d%%", gpItemDescObject->bStatus[ gubItemDescStatusIndex ] );
03332                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sValDx + 6), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03333                   wcscat( pStr, L"%%" );
03334                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03335 
03336                   // Values
03337                   if (fWeight <= (EXCEPTIONAL_WEIGHT / 10))
03338                   {
03339                         SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03340                   }
03341                   else
03342                   {
03343                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03344                   }
03345                   //Weight
03346                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%1.1f", fWeight );
03347                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx+6), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03348                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03349 
03350                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & (IC_GUN | IC_LAUNCHER) )
03351                   {
03352 
03353                         if ( GunRange( gpItemDescObject ) >= EXCEPTIONAL_RANGE)
03354                         {
03355                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03356                         }
03357                         else
03358                         {
03359                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03360                         }
03361 
03362                         //Range
03363                          swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ( GunRange( gpItemDescObject ) ) / 10 );
03364                          FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 3 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03365                          mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03366                   }
03367 
03368                   if ( !(Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER) && !Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
03369                   {
03370                         UINT8 ubImpact = GetDamage(gpItemDescObject);
03371 
03372                         if ( ubImpact  >= EXCEPTIONAL_DAMAGE)
03373                         {
03374                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03375                         }
03376                         else
03377                         {
03378                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03379                         }
03380 
03381                         //Damage
03382                    swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubImpact );
03383                    FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03384                    mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03385               }
03386 
03387                   ubAttackAPs = BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, gpItemDescObject );
03388 
03389                   if (ubAttackAPs <= EXCEPTIONAL_AP_COST)
03390                   {
03391                         SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03392                   }
03393                   else
03394                   {
03395                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03396                   }           
03397 
03398                    //Ap's
03399                   if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03400                   {
03401                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs );
03402                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 5 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 5 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 5 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03403                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03404                   }
03405 
03406                    if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) > 0)
03407                    {
03408 
03409                         if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) >= EXCEPTIONAL_BURST_SIZE )//|| gpItemDescObject->usItem == G11)
03410                         {
03411                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03412                         }
03413                         else
03414                         {
03415                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03416                         }
03417 
03418                     swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToBurst( DEFAULT_APS, gpItemDescObject ) );
03419                     FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03420                     mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03421                    }
03422                    else if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject) > 0)
03423                    {
03424 
03425                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03426 
03427                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToAutofire( DEFAULT_APS, gpItemDescObject, 3 ) );
03428                               FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 6 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03429                               mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03430                    }
03431             }
03432             else if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
03433             {
03434 
03435                   SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_WHITE );
03436                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03437 
03438                   //
03439                   // Display the total amount of money
03440                   //
03441 
03442                   // if the player is taking money from their account
03443                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
03444                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
03445                   else
03446                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount );
03447 
03448                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03449                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03450                   uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03451                   sStrX =  MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_X + ( 245 - uiStringLength );
03452                   mprintf( sStrX, MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, pStr );
03453 
03454                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03455 
03456                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03457                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03458 
03459                   //Display the 'Removing'
03460                   mprintf( gMapMoneyStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapMoneyStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_AMOUNT ] );
03461                   //Display the 'REmaining'
03462                   mprintf( gMapMoneyStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapMoneyStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_AMOUNT_2_SPLIT ] );
03463 
03464                   //Display the 'Amt removing'
03465                   mprintf( gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_REMAINING ] );
03466                   //Display the 'REmaining amount'
03467                   mprintf( gMapMoneyStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapMoneyStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_TO_SPLIT ] );
03468 
03469                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
03470 
03471                   //Display the 'Seperate text'
03472                   mprintf( (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].x), (UINT16)(gMapMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[cnt].y ), gzMoneyAmounts[4] );
03473 
03474                   // The Money Remaining
03475                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining );
03476                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03477                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03478                   uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03479                   sStrX =  gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sValDx + ( uiRightLength - uiStringLength );
03480                   mprintf( sStrX, gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03481 
03482 
03483                   // The money removing
03484                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
03485                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving );
03486                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03487                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03488                   uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03489                   sStrX =  gMapMoneyStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapMoneyStats[ 3 ].sValDx + ( uiRightLength - uiStringLength );
03490                   mprintf( sStrX, gMapMoneyStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03491 
03492                   // print label for amount
03493 
03494 //                SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTFORE1 );
03495 //                mprintf( gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMapMoneyStats[ 1 ].zDesc );
03496 
03497 
03498             }
03499             else if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
03500             {
03501                   SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_WHITE );
03502                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03503                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount );
03504                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03505                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03506                   uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03507                   sStrX =  MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_X + ( 245 - uiStringLength );
03508                   mprintf( sStrX, MAP_ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, pStr );
03509             }
03510             else
03511             {
03512                   //Labels
03513                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03514 
03515                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03516                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03517 
03518                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
03519                   {
03520                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 2 ] );
03521                   }
03522                   else
03523                   {
03524                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 1 ] );
03525                   }
03526                   swprintf( sTempString, (wchar_t *)gWeaponStatsDesc[ 0 ], GetWeightUnitString() );
03527                   mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, sTempString );
03528 
03529                   // Values
03530                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
03531 
03532 
03533                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
03534                   {
03535                         // Ammo
03536                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d/%d", gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[gubItemDescStatusIndex], Magazine[ Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize ); //Pulmu: Correct # of rounds for stacked ammo.
03537                               uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03538             //                sStrX =  gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx + ( uiRightLength - uiStringLength );
03539                               FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sValDx+6), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &sStrX, &usY);
03540                               mprintf( sStrX, gMapWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03541                   }
03542                   else
03543                   {
03544                         //Status
03545                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d%%", gpItemDescObject->bStatus[ gubItemDescStatusIndex ] );
03546                         uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03547       //                sStrX =  gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sValDx + ( uiRightLength - uiStringLength );
03548                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sValDx + 6), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &sStrX, &usY);
03549                         wcscat( pStr, L"%%" );
03550                         mprintf( sStrX, gMapWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03551                   }
03552 
03553                   //Weight
03554                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%1.1f", fWeight );
03555                   uiStringLength=StringPixLength(pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT );
03556 //                sStrX =  gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx + ( uiRightLength - uiStringLength );
03557                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx+6), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &sStrX, &usY);
03558                   mprintf( sStrX, gMapWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03559 
03560                   if ( ( InKeyRingPopup() == TRUE ) || ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_KEY ) )
03561                   {
03562                         SetFontForeground( 6 );
03563 
03564                         // build description for keys .. the sector found
03565                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sKeyDescriptionStrings[ 0 ] );
03566                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
03567                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sKeyDescriptionStrings[ 1 ] );
03568                         mprintf( gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY + GetFontHeight( BLOCKFONT ) + 2 , pStr );
03569 
03570                         
03571                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03572                         GetShortSectorString( ( INT16 ) SECTORX( KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound ), ( INT16 ) SECTORY( KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound ), sTempString  ); 
03573                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sTempString );
03574                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX ), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), 110 ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03575                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03576 
03577                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usDateFound );
03578                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX ), (INT16)(gMapWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY + GetFontHeight( BLOCKFONT ) + 2 ), 110 ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03579                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03580                   }
03581 
03582             }
03583             
03584             SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03585       }
03586       else if ( gfInItemDescBox )
03587       {
03588 
03589             // TAKE A LOOK AT THE VIDEO OBJECT SIZE ( ONE OF TWO SIZES ) AND CENTER!
03590             GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemGraphic );
03591             pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
03592             usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
03593             usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
03594 
03595             // CENTER IN SLOT!
03596             sCenX = ITEMDESC_ITEM_X + (INT16)( abs( ITEMDESC_ITEM_WIDTH - (double)usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
03597             sCenY = ITEMDESC_ITEM_Y + (INT16)( abs( ITEMDESC_ITEM_HEIGHT - (double)usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
03598 
03599             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiItemDescBox, 0, gsInvDescX, gsInvDescY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03600 
03601             if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
03602             {
03603                   //Render the money Boxes
03604                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiMoneyGraphicsForDescBox, 0, (UINT16)(gsInvDescX+gItemDescAttachmentsXY[0].sX-1), (UINT16)(gsInvDescY+gItemDescAttachmentsXY[0].sY-2), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03605             }
03606 
03607 
03608             // Display item
03609             if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiItemGraphic, 0, sCenX - 2, sCenY + 2  );
03610             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiItemGraphic, 0, sCenX, sCenY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03611 
03612             // Display status
03613             DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemDescObject, gubItemDescStatusIndex, (INT16)ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_X, (INT16)ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_Y, ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_WIDTH, ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_HEIGHT,   Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE, guiSAVEBUFFER );
03614       
03615             if (gpItemPointer)
03616             {
03617 //                if ( ( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_HIDDEN_ADDON ) ||
03618                   if ( ( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].hiddenaddon ) ||
03619 
03620                    ( !ValidItemAttachment( gpItemDescObject, gpItemPointer->usItem, FALSE ) &&         
03621                          !ValidMerge( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) && !ValidLaunchable( gpItemPointer->usItem, gpItemDescObject->usItem ) ) )
03622                   {
03623                         // hatch out the attachment panels
03624                         fHatchOutAttachments = TRUE;
03625                   }
03626             }
03627 
03628             // Display attachments
03629             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
03630             {
03631                   if ( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
03632                   {
03633         sCenX = (INT16)( gsInvDescX + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sX + 5 );
03634                         sCenY = (INT16)( gsInvDescY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sY - 1 );
03635 
03636                         INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, NULL, gpItemDescObject, sCenX, sCenY, gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sWidth, gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sHeight, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, (UINT8)(RENDER_ITEM_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), FALSE, 0 );
03637 
03638                         sCenX = sCenX - gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDx;
03639                         sCenY = sCenY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[cnt].sBarDy;
03640                         DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemDescObject, (UINT8)(DRAW_ITEM_STATUS_ATTACHMENT1 + cnt), sCenX, sCenY, ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , guiSAVEBUFFER );
03641 
03642                     SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), ItemNames[ gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] ] );
03643                     SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
03644                   }
03645                   else
03646                   {
03647                          SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), Message[ STR_ATTACHMENTS ] );
03648                          SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gItemDescAttachmentRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
03649                   }
03650                   if (fHatchOutAttachments)
03651                   {
03652                         //UINT32 uiWhichBuffer = ( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) ? guiSAVEBUFFER : guiRENDERBUFFER;
03653                         DrawHatchOnInventory( guiSAVEBUFFER, (INT16) (gsInvDescX + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sX), (INT16) (gsInvDescY + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sY - 2), (INT16)(gItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sWidth + gItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sBarDx), (INT16) (gItemDescAttachmentsXY[ cnt ].sHeight + 2) );
03654                   }
03655             }
03656 
03657             if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN || Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER )
03658             {
03659                   // display bullets for ROF
03660                   if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03661                         BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, BULLET_SING_X, BULLET_SING_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
03662 
03663                   if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) > 0)
03664                   {
03665                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < __min(GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject),12); cnt++ )
03666                         {
03667                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, BULLET_BURST_X + cnt * (BULLET_WIDTH/2 + 1), BULLET_BURST_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );                            
03668                         }
03669                   }
03670                   else if ( GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject) > 0 )
03671                   {
03672                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 10; cnt++ )
03673                         {
03674                               BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiBullet, 0, BULLET_BURST_X + cnt * (BULLET_WIDTH/2 + 1), BULLET_BURST_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );                            
03675                         }
03676                   }
03677 
03678             }
03679 
03680             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gsInvDescX, gsInvDescY, ITEMDESC_WIDTH, ITEMDESC_HEIGHT );
03681 
03682             // Render font desc
03683             SetFont( ITEMDESC_FONT );
03684             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
03685             SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_WHITE );
03686             SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03687 
03688             // Render name
03689             // SET CLIPPING RECT FOR FONTS
03690             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION 
03691                   mprintf( ITEMDESC_NAME_X, ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, L"%s (%d)", gzItemName, gpItemDescObject->usItem );
03692             #else
03693                   mprintf( ITEMDESC_NAME_X, ITEMDESC_NAME_Y, L"%s", gzItemName );
03694             #endif
03695 
03696             // Render caliber and description
03697 
03698             SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03699             SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03700             
03701             DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)ITEMDESC_DESC_START_X, (INT16)ITEMDESC_DESC_START_Y, ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH, 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemDesc, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03702 
03703             if ( ITEM_PROS_AND_CONS( gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
03704             {
03705                   if ( ( Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].fingerprintid ) && gpItemDescObject->ubImprintID < NO_PROFILE )
03706                   {
03707                         // add name noting imprint
03708                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s %s (%s)", AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubCalibre ], WeaponType[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubWeaponType ], gMercProfiles[ gpItemDescObject->ubImprintID ].zNickname );
03709                   }
03710                   else
03711                   {
03712                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s %s", AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubCalibre ], WeaponType[ Weapon[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubWeaponType ] );
03713                   }
03714 
03715                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16) ITEMDESC_CALIBER_X, (INT16) ITEMDESC_CALIBER_Y, ITEMDESC_CALIBER_WIDTH, ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT, pStr, ITEMDESC_FONT, &usX, &usY);
03716                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03717 
03718                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE2 );
03719                   SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03720                   mprintf( (INT16)ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X, (INT16)ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, gzProsLabel );
03721 
03722                   sProsConsIndent = __max( StringPixLength( gzProsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ), StringPixLength( gzConsLabel, ITEMDESC_FONT ) ) + 10;
03723 
03724                   gzItemPros[0] = 0;
03725                   GenerateProsString( gzItemPros, gpItemDescObject, ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent - StringPixLength( DOTDOTDOT, ITEMDESC_FONT ) );
03726                   if (gzItemPros[0] != 0)
03727                   {
03728                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03729                         SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03730                         DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)(ITEMDESC_PROS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), (INT16)ITEMDESC_PROS_START_Y, (INT16)(ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent), 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemPros, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
03731                   }
03732 
03733                   SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_DKWHITE2 );
03734                   SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW3 );
03735                   mprintf( (INT16)ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X, (INT16)ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, gzConsLabel );
03736 
03737                   GenerateConsString( gzItemCons, gpItemDescObject, ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent - StringPixLength( DOTDOTDOT, ITEMDESC_FONT ) );
03738                   if (gzItemCons[0] != 0)
