03739                   {
03740                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
03741                         SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
03742                         DisplayWrappedString( (INT16)(ITEMDESC_CONS_START_X + sProsConsIndent), (INT16)ITEMDESC_CONS_START_Y, (INT16)(ITEMDESC_DESC_WIDTH - sProsConsIndent), 2, ITEMDESC_FONT, FONT_BLACK,  gzItemCons, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
03743                   }
03744 
03745 
03746             }
03747 
03748 
03749             // Get length of string
03750             uiRightLength=35;
03751 
03752             // Calculate total weight of item and attachments
03753             //Pulmu: Changed weight calculation of single item in stack.
03754             if( Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].usItemClass == IC_AMMO && gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 && gubItemDescStatusIndex < gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects)
03755             {
03756                   //Get weight of one ammo clip in stack.
03757                   UINT8 ubShotsLeftFirst = gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0];
03758                   UINT8 ubNumberOfObjects = gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects;
03759                   gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
03760                   gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[gubItemDescStatusIndex];
03761                   fWeight = (float)(CalculateObjectWeight( gpItemDescObject )) / 10;
03762                   gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[0] = ubShotsLeftFirst;
03763                   gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumberOfObjects;
03764             }
03765             //Item does not exist
03766             else if( gubItemDescStatusIndex >= gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
03767             {
03768                   fWeight = (float)0.0;
03769             }
03770             else
03771             {
03772                   fWeight = (float)(CalculateObjectWeight( gpItemDescObject )) / 10;
03773             }
03774             
03775 
03776             if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ] )
03777             {
03778                   fWeight = fWeight * 2.2f;
03779             }
03780 
03781             if ( fWeight < 0.1 && gubItemDescStatusIndex < gpItemDescObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
03782             {
03783                   fWeight = (float)0.1;
03784             }
03785             //Pulmu end
03786     
03787             // Render, stat  name
03788             if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
03789             {
03790 
03791                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03792                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03793                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03794                   
03795                   //LABELS
03796                   swprintf( sTempString, (wchar_t *)gWeaponStatsDesc[ 0 ], GetWeightUnitString() );
03797                   mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, sTempString );
03798 //          mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 1 ].zDesc );
03799 //          mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStats[ 2 ].zDesc );
03800                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & (IC_GUN | IC_LAUNCHER ) )
03801                   {
03802                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 3 ] );
03803                   }
03804                   if ( !(Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER) && !Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
03805                   {
03806                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 4 ] );
03807                   }
03808                   mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 5 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 5 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ] );
03809                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN || Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER )
03810                   {
03811                         if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03812                               mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 7 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 7 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 7 ] );
03813                   }
03814                   mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 1 ] );
03815 
03816                   if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) > 0 || GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject))
03817                   {
03818                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 8 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 8 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 8 ] );
03819                   }
03820 
03821                   // Values
03822                   if (fWeight <= (EXCEPTIONAL_WEIGHT / 10))
03823                   {
03824                         SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03825                   }
03826                   else
03827                   {
03828                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03829                   }
03830 
03831                   //Status
03832                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d%%", gpItemDescObject->bGunStatus );
03833                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03834                   wcscat( pStr, L"%%" );
03835                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03836 
03837                   //Wieght
03838                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%1.1f", fWeight );
03839                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03840                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03841 
03842                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & (IC_GUN | IC_LAUNCHER) )
03843                   {
03844                         if ( GunRange( gpItemDescObject ) >= EXCEPTIONAL_RANGE)
03845                         {
03846                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03847                         }
03848                         else
03849                         {
03850                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03851                         }
03852 
03853                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr,  L"%2d", ( GunRange( gpItemDescObject ) ) / 10 );
03854                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 3 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03855                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03856                   }
03857 
03858                   if ( !(Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_LAUNCHER) && !Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].rocketlauncher )
03859                   {
03860                         UINT8 ubImpact = GetDamage(gpItemDescObject);
03861                         if ( ubImpact  >= EXCEPTIONAL_DAMAGE)
03862                         {
03863                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03864                         }
03865                         else
03866                         {
03867                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03868                         }
03869 
03870                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubImpact );
03871                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03872                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03873                   }
03874 
03875                   ubAttackAPs = BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, gpItemDescObject );
03876 
03877                   if (ubAttackAPs <= EXCEPTIONAL_AP_COST)
03878                   {
03879                         SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03880                   }
03881                   else
03882                   {
03883                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03884                   }
03885 
03886                   if ( !Weapon[gpItemDescObject->usItem].NoSemiAuto )
03887                   {
03888                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs );
03889                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 5 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 5 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 5 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH, ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03890                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03891                   }
03892 
03893                   if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject)> 0)
03894                   {
03895                         if (GetShotsPerBurst(gpItemDescObject) >= EXCEPTIONAL_BURST_SIZE )//|| gpItemDescObject->usItem == G11)
03896                         {
03897                               SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTHIGHLIGHT );
03898                         }
03899                         else
03900                         {
03901                               SetFontForeground( 5 );
03902                         }
03903 
03904                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToBurst( DEFAULT_APS, gpItemDescObject ) );
03905                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH, ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT, pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY );
03906                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03907                   }
03908                   else if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(gpItemDescObject)> 0)
03909                   {
03910                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
03911                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToBurst( DEFAULT_APS, gpItemDescObject ) );
03912                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 6 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH, ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT, pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY );
03913                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03914                   }
03915 
03916             }
03917             else if ( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
03918             {
03919                   //Labels
03920                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
03921                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
03922 
03923                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03924 
03925                   //Display the 'Seperate text'
03926 
03927                   //if the player is removing money from the players account
03928                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
03929                         mprintf( (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[4].x), (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[4].y), gzMoneyAmounts[5] );
03930                   else
03931                         mprintf( (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.x + gMoneyButtonOffsets[4].x), (UINT16)(gMoneyButtonLoc.y + gMoneyButtonOffsets[4].y), gzMoneyAmounts[4] );
03932 
03933 
03934                   // if the player is taking money from their account
03935                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
03936                   {
03937                         //Display the 'Removing'
03938                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_PLAYERS ] );
03939                         //Display the 'REmaining'
03940                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_AMOUNT_2_WITHDRAW ] );
03941                   }
03942                   else
03943                   {
03944                         //Display the 'Removing'
03945                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ 0 ] );
03946                         //Display the 'REmaining'
03947                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ 2 ] );
03948                   }
03949 
03950                   // Total Amount 
03951                   SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
03952                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", gRemoveMoney.uiTotalAmount );
03953                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03954                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03955                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(ITEMDESC_NAME_X), (INT16)(ITEMDESC_NAME_Y ), 295,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03956                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03957 
03958                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
03959                   
03960                   // if the player is taking money from their account
03961                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
03962                   {
03963                         //Display the 'Amt removing'
03964                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_BALANCE ] );
03965                         //Display the 'REmaining amount'
03966                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ MONEY_DESC_TO_WITHDRAW ] );
03967                   }
03968                   else
03969                   {
03970                         //Display the 'Amt removing'
03971                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ 1 ] );
03972                         //Display the 'REmaining amount'
03973                         mprintf( gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gMoneyStatsDesc[ 3 ] );
03974                   }
03975 
03976 
03977 
03978                   // Values
03979                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
03980 
03981                   //Display the total amount of money remaining
03982                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining );
03983                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03984                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03985                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMoneyStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), (UINT16)(ITEM_STATS_WIDTH-3),ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03986                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03987 
03988                   //Display the total amount of money removing
03989                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving );
03990                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
03991                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
03992                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gMoneyStats[ 3 ].sY + gsInvDescY), (UINT16)(ITEM_STATS_WIDTH-3) ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
03993                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
03994 
03995             }
03996             else if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
03997             {
03998                   SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_WHITE );
03999                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
04000                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, (wchar_t *)L"%ld", gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount );
04001                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
04002                   InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
04003 
04004                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(ITEMDESC_NAME_X), (INT16)(ITEMDESC_NAME_Y ), 295,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04005                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04006             }
04007             else
04008             {
04009                   //Labels
04010                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
04011                   SetFontForeground( 6 );
04012                   SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
04013 
04014 
04015                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
04016                   {
04017                         //Status
04018                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 2 ] );
04019                   }
04020                   else
04021                   {
04022                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY, L"%s", gWeaponStatsDesc[ 1 ] );
04023                   }
04024 
04025                   //Weight
04026                   swprintf( sTempString, (wchar_t *)gWeaponStatsDesc[ 0 ], GetWeightUnitString() );
04027                   mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY, sTempString );
04028 
04029                   // Values
04030                   SetFontForeground( 5 );
04031 
04032                   if ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
04033                   {
04034                         // Ammo - print amount
04035                         //Status
04036                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d/%d", gpItemDescObject->ubShotsLeft[gubItemDescStatusIndex], Magazine[ Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize );              //Pulmu: Correct # of rounds for stacked ammo
04037                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 2 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04038                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04039                   }
04040                   else
04041                   {
04042                         //Status
04043                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%2d%%", gpItemDescObject->bStatus[ gubItemDescStatusIndex ] );
04044                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 1 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04045                         wcscat( pStr, L"%%" );
04046                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04047                   }
04048 
04049                   if( ( InKeyRingPopup() == TRUE ) || ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_KEY ) )
04050                   {
04051                         SetFontForeground( 6 );
04052 
04053                         // build description for keys .. the sector found
04054                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sKeyDescriptionStrings[ 0 ] );
04055                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY, pStr );
04056                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sKeyDescriptionStrings[ 1 ] );
04057                         mprintf( gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX, gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY + GetFontHeight( BLOCKFONT ) + 2 , pStr );
04058 
04059                         
04060                         SetFontForeground( 5 );
04061                         GetShortSectorString( ( INT16 ) SECTORX( KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound ), ( INT16 ) SECTORY( KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usSectorFound ), sTempString  ); 
04062                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", sTempString );
04063                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX ), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), 110 ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04064                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04065 
04066                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", KeyTable[ gpItemDescObject->ubKeyID ].usDateFound );
04067                         FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sX + gsInvDescX ), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 4 ].sY + gsInvDescY + GetFontHeight( BLOCKFONT ) + 2 ), 110 ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04068                         mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04069                   }
04070 
04071                   
04072                   
04073                   
04074                   //Weight
04075                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%1.1f", fWeight );
04076                   FindFontRightCoordinates( (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sX + gsInvDescX + gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sValDx), (INT16)(gWeaponStats[ 0 ].sY + gsInvDescY ), ITEM_STATS_WIDTH ,ITEM_STATS_HEIGHT ,pStr, BLOCKFONT2, &usX, &usY);
04077                   mprintf( usX, usY, pStr );
04078             }
04079             
04080             SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
04081 
04082       }
04083 
04084 }
04085 
04086 void HandleItemDescriptionBox( BOOLEAN *pfDirty )
04087 {
04088       if ( fItemDescDelete )
04089       {
04090             DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
04091             fItemDescDelete = FALSE;
04092             *pfDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04093       }
04094 
04095 }
04096 
04097 
04098 void DeleteItemDescriptionBox( )
04099 {
04100       INT32 cnt, cnt2;
04101       BOOLEAN     fFound, fAllFound;
04102       UINT8 ubAPCost;
04103 
04104       if( gfInItemDescBox == FALSE )
04105       {
04106             return;
04107       }
04108 
04109 //    DEF:
04110 
04111       //Used in the shopkeeper interface
04112       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
04113       {
04114             DeleteShopKeeperItemDescBox();
04115       }
04116 
04117       // check for any AP costs
04118       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04119       {
04120             if (gpAttachSoldier)
04121             {
04122                   // check for change in attachments, starting with removed attachments
04123                   fAllFound = TRUE;
04124                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
04125                   {
04126                         if ( gusOriginalAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
04127                         {
04128                               fFound = FALSE;
04129                               for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt2++ )
04130                               {
04131                                     if ( (gusOriginalAttachItem[ cnt ] == gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt2 ]) && (gpItemDescObject->bAttachStatus[ cnt2 ] == gbOriginalAttachStatus[ cnt ]) )
04132                                     {
04133                                           fFound = TRUE;
04134                                     }
04135                               }     
04136                               if (!fFound)
04137                               {
04138                                     // charge APs
04139                                     ubAPCost = AttachmentAPCost(gusOriginalAttachItem[ cnt ],gpItemDescObject->usItem);
04140                                     fAllFound = FALSE;
04141                                     break;
04142                               }
04143                         }
04144                   }
04145 
04146                   if (fAllFound)
04147                   {
04148                         // nothing was removed; search for attachment added
04149                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
04150                         {
04151                               if ( gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
04152                               {
04153                                     fFound = FALSE;
04154                                     for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt2++ )
04155                                     {
04156                                           if ( (gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] == gusOriginalAttachItem[ cnt2 ]) && (gbOriginalAttachStatus[ cnt2 ] == gpItemDescObject->bAttachStatus[ cnt ]) )
04157                                           {
04158                                                 fFound = TRUE;
04159                                           }
04160                                     }     
04161                                     if (!fFound)
04162                                     {
04163                                           // charge APs
04164                                           ubAPCost = AttachmentAPCost(gpItemDescObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ],gpItemDescObject->usItem);
04165                                           fAllFound = FALSE;
04166                                           break;
04167                                     }
04168                               }
04169                         }
04170                   }
04171 
04172                   if (!fAllFound)
04173                   {
04174                         DeductPoints( gpAttachSoldier, ubAPCost, 0 );
04175                   }
04176             }
04177       }
04178 
04179       //Remove
04180       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiItemDescBox );
04181   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapItemDescBox );
04182       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiBullet );
04183       // Delete item graphic
04184       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiItemGraphic );
04185 
04186       gfInItemDescBox = FALSE;
04187 
04188 //    if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN  )
04189       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
04190       {
04191             UnloadButtonImage( giMapInvDescButtonImage );
04192             RemoveButton( giMapInvDescButton );
04193       }
04194 
04195       // Remove region
04196       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gInvDesc);
04197       
04198       
04199       if( gpItemDescObject->usItem != MONEY )
04200       {
04201             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
04202             {
04203                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gItemDescAttachmentRegions[cnt]);
04204             }
04205       }
04206       else
04207       {
04208             UnloadButtonImage( guiMoneyButtonImage );
04209             UnloadButtonImage( guiMoneyDoneButtonImage );
04210             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
04211             {
04212                   RemoveButton( guiMoneyButtonBtn[cnt] );
04213             }
04214       }
04215 
04216       if ( ITEM_PROS_AND_CONS( gpItemDescObject->usItem ) )
04217       {
04218             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[0] );
04219             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gProsAndConsRegions[1] );
04220       }
04221 
04222       if(( ( Item[ gpItemDescObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GUN ) && !Item[gpItemDescObject->usItem].rocketlauncher ) )
04223       {
04224             // Remove button
04225             UnloadButtonImage( giItemDescAmmoButtonImages );
04226             RemoveButton( giItemDescAmmoButton );
04227       }
04228 //    if(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
04229       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
04230       {
04231        fCharacterInfoPanelDirty=TRUE;
04232        fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04233        fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
04234        fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
04235       }
04236 
04237       if( InKeyRingPopup() == TRUE )
04238       {
04239             DeleteKeyObject(gpItemDescObject);
04240             gpItemDescObject = NULL;
04241             fShowDescriptionFlag = FALSE;
04242             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04243             return;
04244       }
04245 
04246       fShowDescriptionFlag = FALSE;
04247       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04248 
04249       if( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
04250       {
04251             //if there is no money remaining
04252             if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining == 0 && !gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
04253             {
04254                   //get rid of the money in the slot
04255                   memset( gpItemDescObject, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04256                   gpItemDescObject = NULL;
04257             }
04258       }
04259 
04260       if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
04261             gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount = FALSE;
04262 
04263       gfItemDescObjectIsAttachment = FALSE;
04264 }
04265 
04266 
04267 void InternalBeginItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, INT8 bHandPos )
04268 {
04269 //    BOOLEAN fOk;
04270 
04271       // If not null return
04272       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
04273       {
04274             return;
04275       }
04276 
04277       // Copy into cursor...
04278       memcpy( &gItemPointer, pObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04279 
04280       // Dirty interface
04281       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04282       gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
04283       gpItemPointerSoldier = pSoldier;
04284       gbItemPointerSrcSlot = bHandPos;
04285       gbItemPointerLocateGood = TRUE;
04286 
04287       CheckForDisabledForGiveItem( );
04288 
04289       EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE, TRUE );
04290 
04291       gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault = FALSE;
04292 
04293       // re-evaluate repairs
04294       gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
04295 }
04296 
04297 void BeginItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandPos )
04298 {
04299       BOOLEAN                 fOk;
04300       OBJECTTYPE  pObject;
04301 
04302       memset( &pObject, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04303 
04304       if (_KeyDown( SHIFT ))
04305       {
04306             // Remove all from soldier's slot
04307             fOk = RemoveObjectFromSlot( pSoldier, ubHandPos, &pObject );
04308       }
04309       else
04310       {
04311             GetObjFrom( &(pSoldier->inv[ubHandPos]), 0, &pObject );
04312             fOk = (pObject.ubNumberOfObjects == 1);
04313       }
04314       if (fOk)
04315       {
04316             InternalBeginItemPointer( pSoldier, &pObject, ubHandPos );
04317       }
04318 }
04319 
04320 
04321 void BeginKeyRingItemPointer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubKeyRingPosition )
04322 {
04323       BOOLEAN fOk;
04324 
04325       // If not null return
04326       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
04327       {
04328             return;
04329       }
04330 
04331       if (_KeyDown( SHIFT ))
04332       {
04333             // Remove all from soldier's slot
04334             fOk = RemoveKeysFromSlot( pSoldier, ubKeyRingPosition, pSoldier->pKeyRing[ ubKeyRingPosition ].ubNumber, &gItemPointer );
04335       }
04336       else
04337       {
04338             RemoveKeyFromSlot( pSoldier, ubKeyRingPosition, &gItemPointer );
04339             fOk = (gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects == 1);
04340       }
04341 
04342       
04343       if (fOk)
04344       {
04345             // ATE: Look if we are a BLOODIED KNIFE, and change if so, making guy scream...
04346 
04347             // Dirty interface
04348             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04349             gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
04350             gpItemPointerSoldier = pSoldier;
04351             gbItemPointerSrcSlot = ubKeyRingPosition;
04352 
04353             if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
04354             {     
04355                   guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
04356                   gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
04357 
04358                   fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
04359                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
04360                   MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
04361             }
04362       }
04363       else
04364       {
04365             //Debug mesg
04366       }
04367 
04368       
04369 
04370       gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault = FALSE;
04371 }
04372 
04373 void EndItemPointer( )
04374 {
04375       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
04376       {
04377             gpItemPointer = NULL;
04378             gbItemPointerSrcSlot = NO_SLOT;
04379             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion , CURSOR_NORMAL ); 
04380             MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
04381 
04382             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
04383             {
04384                   memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
04385                   SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
04386             }
04387             else
04388             {
04389                   EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE , TRUE );
04390             }
04391 
04392             gbItemPointerLocateGood = FALSE;
04393 
04394             // re-evaluate repairs
04395             gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
04396       }
04397 }
04398 
04399 void DrawItemFreeCursor( )
04400 {
04401       //OBJECTTYPE            *gpItemPointer;
04402       //UINT16                      usItemSnapCursor;
04403 
04404       // Get usIndex and then graphic for item
04405       guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
04406       gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
04407 
04408       MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR ); 
04409       MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
04410 }
04411 
04412 void HideItemTileCursor( )
04413 {
04414 //    RemoveTopmost( gusCurMousePos, gusItemPointer );
04415 
04416 }
04417 
04418 BOOLEAN SoldierCanSeeCatchComing( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSrcGridNo )
04419 {
04420       return( TRUE );
04421 /*-
04422       INT32                                     cnt;
04423       INT8                                      bDirection, bTargetDirection;
04424 
04425       bTargetDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, sSrcGridNo );
04426 
04427       // Look 3 directions Clockwise from what we are facing....
04428       bDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04429 
04430       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 3; cnt++ )
04431       {
04432             if ( bDirection == bTargetDirection )
04433             {
04434                   return( TRUE );
04435             }
04436 
04437             bDirection = gOneCDirection[ bDirection ];
04438       }
04439 
04440       // Look 3 directions CounterClockwise from what we are facing....
04441       bDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04442 
04443       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 3; cnt++ )
04444       {
04445             if ( bDirection == bTargetDirection )
04446             {
04447                   return( TRUE );
04448             }
04449 
04450             bDirection = gOneCCDirection[ bDirection ];
04451       }
04452 
04453       // If here, nothing good can happen!
04454       return( FALSE );
04455 -*/
04456 
04457 }
04458 
04459 void DrawItemTileCursor( )
04460 {
04461       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
04462       UINT16                                    usIndex;
04463       UINT8                                     ubSoldierID;
04464       INT16                                     sAPCost;
04465       BOOLEAN                                   fRecalc;
04466       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
04467       INT16                                     sFinalGridNo;
04468       UINT32                                    uiCursorId = CURSOR_ITEM_GOOD_THROW;
04469       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
04470       BOOLEAN                                   fGiveItem = FALSE;
04471       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
04472       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
04473       static UINT32                 uiOldCursorId = 0;
04474       static UINT16                 usOldMousePos = 0;
04475       INT16                                     sEndZ = 0;
04476       INT16                                     sDist;
04477       INT8                                      bLevel;     
04478 
04479       if (GetMouseMapPos( (INT16 *)&usMapPos) )
04480       {
04481             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04482             {
04483                   // Force mouse position to guy...
04484                   usMapPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
04485             }
04486 
04487             gusCurMousePos = usMapPos;
04488 
04489             if( gusCurMousePos != usOldMousePos )
04490             {
04491                   gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault = FALSE;
04492             }
04493 
04494             // Save old one..
04495             usOldMousePos = gusCurMousePos;
04496 
04497             // Default to turning adjacent area gridno off....
04498             gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = FALSE;
04499 
04500             // If we are over a talkable guy, set flag
04501             if ( IsValidTalkableNPCFromMouse( &ubSoldierID, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE ) )
04502             {
04503                   fGiveItem = TRUE;
04504             }
04505 
04506 
04507             // OK, if different than default, change....
04508             if ( gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault )
04509             {
04510                   fGiveItem = !fGiveItem;
04511             }
04512 
04513 
04514             // Get recalc and cursor flags
04515             fRecalc = GetMouseRecalcAndShowAPFlags( &uiCursorFlags, NULL );
04516 
04517             // OK, if we begin to move, reset the cursor...
04518             if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
04519             {
04520                   EndPhysicsTrajectoryUI( );
04521             }
04522 
04523             // Get Pyth spaces away.....
04524             sDist = PythSpacesAway( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, gusCurMousePos );
04525 
04526 
04527             // If we are here and we are not selected, select!
04528             // ATE Design discussion propably needed here...
04529             if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID != gusSelectedSoldier )
04530             {
04531                   SelectSoldier( gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
04532             }
04533 
04534             // ATE: if good for locate, locate to selected soldier....
04535             if ( gbItemPointerLocateGood )
04536             {
04537                   gbItemPointerLocateGood = FALSE;
04538                   LocateSoldier( gusSelectedSoldier, FALSE );
04539             }
04540 
04541             if ( !fGiveItem )
04542             {           
04543                   if ( UIHandleOnMerc( FALSE ) && usMapPos != gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo )
04544                   {
04545                         // We are on a guy.. check if they can catch or not....
04546                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04547                         {
04548                               // Get soldier
04549                               pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
04550 
04551                               // Are they on our team?
04552                               // ATE: Can't be an EPC
04553                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
04554                               {
04555                                     if ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_OKLIFE )
04556                                     {
04557                                           // OK, on a valid pass
04558                                           gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher = 4;
04559                                           gubUIValidCatcherID                 = (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID;
04560                                     }
04561                                     else
04562                                     {
04563                                           // Can they see the throw?
04564                                           if ( SoldierCanSeeCatchComing( pSoldier, gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo ) )
04565                                           {
04566                                                 // OK, set global that this buddy can see catch...
04567                                                 gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher = TRUE;
04568                                                 gubUIValidCatcherID                 = (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID;
04569                                           }
04570                                     }
04571                               }
04572                         }
04573                   }
04574 
04575                   // We're going to toss it!
04576                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
04577                   {
04578                         gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
04579                         gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 15;
04580                         gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
04581                   }
04582 
04583                   // If we are tossing...
04584                   if (  sDist <= 1 && gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher == 0 || gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher == 4 )
04585                   {
04586                         gsCurrentActionPoints = AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
04587                   }
04588                   else
04589                   {
04590                         gsCurrentActionPoints = AP_TOSS_ITEM;
04591                   }
04592 
04593             }
04594             else
04595             {
04596                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04597                   {
04598                         UIHandleOnMerc( FALSE );
04599 
04600                         // OK, set global that this buddy can see catch...
04601                         gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher = 2;
04602                         gubUIValidCatcherID                 = (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID;
04603 
04604                         // If this is a robot, change to say 'reload'
04605                         if ( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
04606                         {
04607                               gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher = 3;
04608                         }
04609 
04610                         if ( !( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING ) )
04611                         {
04612                               // Find adjacent gridno...
04613                               sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( gpItemPointerSoldier, gusCurMousePos, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, FALSE );
04614                               if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04615                               {
04616                                     sActionGridNo = gusCurMousePos;
04617                               }
04618                               
04619                               // Display location...
04620                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
04621                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
04622 
04623 
04624                               // Get AP cost
04625                               if ( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
04626                               {
04627                                     sAPCost = GetAPsToReloadRobot( gpItemPointerSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ] );
04628                               }
04629                               else
04630                               {
04631                                     sAPCost = GetAPsToGiveItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, sActionGridNo );
04632                               }
04633 
04634                               gsCurrentActionPoints = sAPCost;
04635                         }
04636                         
04637                         // Set value
04638                         if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
04639                         {
04640                               gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
04641                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 15;
04642                               gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
04643                         }
04644                   }
04645             }     
04646 
04647 
04648             if ( fGiveItem )
04649             {
04650                   uiCursorId = CURSOR_ITEM_GIVE;
04651             }
04652             else
04653             {
04654                   // How afar away are we?
04655                   if ( sDist <= 1 && gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher == 0 )
04656                   {
04657                         // OK, we want to drop.....
04658                         
04659                         // Write the word 'drop' on cursor...
04660                         wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_DROP ] );
04661                         gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;               
04662                   }
04663                   else
04664                   {
04665                         if ( usMapPos == gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo )
04666                         {
04667                               EndPhysicsTrajectoryUI( );
04668                         }
04669         else if ( gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher == 4 )
04670         {
04671           // ATE: Don't do if we are passing....
04672         }
04673         else
04674                         // ( sDist > PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_OKLIFE )
04675                         {
04676                               // Write the word 'drop' on cursor...
04677                               if ( gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher == 0 )
04678                               {
04679                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_THROW ] );
04680                                     gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;               
04681                               }
04682 
04683                               gfUIHandlePhysicsTrajectory = TRUE;
04684 
04685                               if ( fRecalc && usMapPos != gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo )
04686                               {
04687                                     if ( gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher )
04688                                     {
04689                                           switch( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ gubUIValidCatcherID ]->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
04690                                           {
04691                                                 case ANIM_STAND:
04692                                                       
04693                                                       sEndZ = 150;
04694                                                       break;
04695 
04696                                                 case ANIM_CROUCH:
04697 
04698                                                       sEndZ = 80;
04699                                                       break;
04700 
04701                                                 case ANIM_PRONE:
04702 
04703                                                       sEndZ = 10;
04704                                                       break;
04705                                           }
04706 
04707                                           if ( MercPtrs[ gubUIValidCatcherID ]->bLevel > 0 )
04708                                           {
04709                                                 sEndZ = 0;
04710                                           }
04711                                     }
04712 
04713                                     // Calculate chance to throw here.....
04714                                     if ( !CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough( gpItemPointerSoldier, gpItemPointer, usMapPos, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel, (INT16)( ( gsInterfaceLevel * 256 ) + sEndZ ), &sFinalGridNo, FALSE, &bLevel, TRUE ) )
04715                                     {
04716                                           gfBadThrowItemCTGH = TRUE;
04717                                     }
04718                                     else
04719                                     {
04720                                           gfBadThrowItemCTGH = FALSE;
04721                                     }
04722 
04723                                     BeginPhysicsTrajectoryUI( sFinalGridNo, bLevel, gfBadThrowItemCTGH );
04724                               }
04725                         }
04726 
04727                         if ( gfBadThrowItemCTGH )
04728                         {
04729                               uiCursorId = CURSOR_ITEM_BAD_THROW;
04730                         }
04731                   }
04732             }
04733 
04734             //Erase any cursor in viewport
04735             //MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );  
04736 
04737             // Get tile graphic fro item
04738             usIndex = GetTileGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
04739 
04740             // ONly load if different....
04741             if ( usIndex != gusItemPointer || uiOldCursorId != uiCursorId )
04742             {
04743                   // OK, Tile database gives me subregion and video object to use...
04744                   SetExternVOData( uiCursorId, gTileDatabase[ usIndex ].hTileSurface, gTileDatabase[ usIndex ].usRegionIndex );
04745                   gusItemPointer = usIndex;
04746                   uiOldCursorId = uiCursorId;
04747             }
04748 
04749 
04750             MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gViewportRegion , (UINT16)uiCursorId ); 
04751 
04752       }
04753 }
04754 
04755 
04756 BOOLEAN IsValidAmmoToReloadRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObject )
04757 {
04758       if ( !CompatibleAmmoForGun( pObject, &( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) ) )
04759       {
04760             // Build string...
04761             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ ROBOT_NEEDS_GIVEN_CALIBER_STR ], AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].ubCalibre ] );
04762 
04763             return( FALSE );
04764       }
04765 
04766       return( TRUE );
04767 }
04768 
04769 
04770 BOOLEAN HandleItemPointerClick( UINT16 usMapPos )
04771 {
04772       // Determine what to do
04773       UINT8 ubDirection;
04774       UINT8 ubSoldierID;
04775       UINT16        usItem;
04776       INT16             sAPCost;
04777       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier=NULL;
04778       UINT8             ubThrowActionCode=0;
04779       UINT32            uiThrowActionData=0;
04780       INT16             sEndZ = 0;
04781       BOOLEAN           fGiveItem = FALSE;
04782       OBJECTTYPE TempObject;
04783       INT16             sGridNo;
04784       INT16             sDist;
04785       INT16             sDistVisible;
04786 
04787 
04788       if ( SelectedGuyInBusyAnimation( ) )
04789       {
04790             return( FALSE );
04791       }
04792 
04793       if ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 )
04794       {
04795             EndUIMessage( );
04796             return( FALSE );
04797       }
04798 
04799       // Don't allow if our soldier is a # of things...
04800       if ( AM_AN_EPC( gpItemPointerSoldier ) || gpItemPointerSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || gpItemPointerSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
04801       {
04802             return( FALSE );
04803       }
04804 
04805       // This implies we have no path....
04806       if ( gsCurrentActionPoints == 0 )
04807       {
04808             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04809             return( FALSE );
04810       }
04811 
04812 
04813       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04814       {
04815             // Force mouse position to guy...
04816             usMapPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
04817 
04818             if ( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING )
04819             {
04820                   return( FALSE );
04821             }
04822 
04823       }
04824 
04825       // Check if we have APs....
04826       if ( !EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, TRUE ) )
04827       {
04828             if ( gfDontChargeAPsToPickup && gsCurrentActionPoints == AP_PICKUP_ITEM )
04829             {
04830 
04831             }
04832             else
04833             {
04834                   return( FALSE );
04835             }
04836       }
04837 
04838       // SEE IF WE ARE OVER A TALKABLE GUY!
04839       if ( IsValidTalkableNPCFromMouse( &ubSoldierID, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE ) )
04840       {
04841             fGiveItem = TRUE;
04842       }
04843 
04844       // OK, if different than default, change....
04845       if ( gfItemPointerDifferentThanDefault )
04846       {
04847             fGiveItem = !fGiveItem;
04848       }
04849 
04850 
04851       // Get Pyth spaces away.....
04852       sDist = PythSpacesAway( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, gusCurMousePos );
04853 
04854 
04855       if ( fGiveItem )
04856       {
04857             usItem = gpItemPointer->usItem;
04858 
04859             // If the target is a robot, 
04860             if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
04861             {
04862                   // Charge APs to reload robot!
04863                   sAPCost = GetAPsToReloadRobot( gpItemPointerSoldier,  MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] );
04864             }
04865             else
04866             {
04867                   // Calculate action point costs!
04868                   sAPCost = GetAPsToGiveItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, usMapPos );
04869             }
04870 
04871             // Place it back in our hands!
04872 
04873             memcpy( &TempObject, gpItemPointer, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04874 
04875             if ( gbItemPointerSrcSlot != NO_SLOT )
04876             {
04877                   PlaceObject( gpItemPointerSoldier, gbItemPointerSrcSlot, gpItemPointer );
04878                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
04879             }
04880 /*
04881             //if the user just clicked on an arms dealer
04882             if( IsMercADealer( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->ubProfile ) )
04883             {
04884                   if ( EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04885                   {
04886                         //Enter the shopkeeper interface
04887                         EnterShopKeeperInterfaceScreen( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->ubProfile );
04888 
04889                         EndItemPointer( );
04890                   }
04891 
04892                   return( TRUE );
04893             }
04894 */
04895 
04896             if ( EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04897             {
04898                   // If we are a robot, check if this is proper item to reload!
04899                   if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
04900                   {
04901                         // Check if we can reload robot....
04902                         if ( IsValidAmmoToReloadRobot( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ], &TempObject ) )
04903                         {
04904                                INT16      sActionGridNo;
04905                                UINT8      ubDirection;
04906                                INT16      sAdjustedGridNo;
04907                                     
04908                                // Walk up to him and reload!
04909                                // See if we can get there to stab 
04910                                sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( gpItemPointerSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
04911 
04912                                if ( sActionGridNo != -1 && gbItemPointerSrcSlot != NO_SLOT )
04913                                {
04914                                           // Make a temp object for ammo...
04915                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->pTempObject    = (OBJECTTYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04916                                           memcpy( gpItemPointerSoldier->pTempObject, &TempObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04917                                       
04918                                           // Remove from soldier's inv...
04919                                           RemoveObjs( &( gpItemPointerSoldier->inv[ gbItemPointerSrcSlot ] ), 1 );
04920                                           
04921                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->sPendingActionData2  = sAdjustedGridNo;
04922                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = gbItemPointerSrcSlot;
04923                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->bPendingActionData3  = ubDirection;
04924                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
04925 
04926                                           // CHECK IF WE ARE AT THIS GRIDNO NOW
04927                                           if ( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
04928                                           {
04929                                                 // SEND PENDING ACTION
04930                                                 gpItemPointerSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_RELOADROBOT;
04931 
04932                                                 // WALK UP TO DEST FIRST
04933                                                 EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( gpItemPointerSoldier, sActionGridNo, gpItemPointerSoldier->usUIMovementMode, FALSE, FALSE );
04934                                           }
04935                                           else
04936                                           {
04937                                                 EVENT_SoldierBeginReloadRobot( gpItemPointerSoldier, sAdjustedGridNo, ubDirection, gbItemPointerSrcSlot );
04938                                           }
04939 
04940                                           // OK, set UI
04941                                           SetUIBusy( gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID );
04942                                }
04943 
04944                         }
04945 
04946                         gfDontChargeAPsToPickup = FALSE;
04947                         EndItemPointer( );                        
04948                   }
04949                   else
04950                   {
04951                         //if (gbItemPointerSrcSlot != NO_SLOT )
04952                         {
04953                               // Give guy this item.....
04954                               SoldierGiveItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ], &TempObject, gbItemPointerSrcSlot );
04955 
04956                               gfDontChargeAPsToPickup = FALSE;
04957                               EndItemPointer( );
04958 
04959                               // If we are giving it to somebody not on our team....
04960                               if ( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ]->ubProfile < FIRST_RPC || MercPtrs[ubSoldierID]->ubProfile >= GASTON || RPC_RECRUITED( MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ] ) )
04961                               {
04962 
04963                               }
04964                               else
04965                               {
04966                                     SetEngagedInConvFromPCAction( gpItemPointerSoldier );
04967                               }
04968                         }
04969                   }
04970             }
04971 
04972             return( TRUE );
04973       }
04974 
04975       // CHECK IF WE ARE NOT ON THE SAME GRIDNO
04976       if ( sDist <= 1 && !( gfUIFullTargetFound && gusUIFullTargetID != gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID ) )
04977       {
04978             // Check some things here....
04979             // 1 ) are we at the exact gridno that we stand on?
04980             if ( usMapPos == gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo )
04981             {
04982                   // Drop
04983                   if ( !gfDontChargeAPsToPickup )
04984                   {
04985                         // Deduct points
04986                         DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, AP_PICKUP_ITEM, 0 );
04987                   }
04988 
04989                   SoldierDropItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, gpItemPointer );
04990             }
04991             else
04992             {
04993                   // Try to drop in an adjacent area....
04994                   // 1 ) is this not a good OK destination
04995                   // this will sound strange, but this is OK......
04996                   if ( !NewOKDestination( gpItemPointerSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel ) || FindBestPath( gpItemPointerSoldier, usMapPos, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 ) == 1 )
04997                   {
04998                         // Drop
04999                         if ( !gfDontChargeAPsToPickup )
05000                         {
05001                               // Deduct points
05002                               DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, AP_PICKUP_ITEM, 0 );
05003                         }
05004 
05005                         // Play animation....
05006                         // Don't show animation of dropping item, if we are not standing
05007 
05008 
05009 
05010                         switch ( gAnimControl[ gpItemPointerSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
05011                         {
05012                               case ANIM_STAND:
05013 
05014                                     gpItemPointerSoldier->pTempObject = (OBJECTTYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05015                                     if (gpItemPointerSoldier->pTempObject != NULL)
05016                                     {
05017                                           memcpy( gpItemPointerSoldier->pTempObject, gpItemPointer, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05018                                           gpItemPointerSoldier->sPendingActionData2 = usMapPos;
05019 
05020                                           // Turn towards.....gridno    
05021                                           EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( gpItemPointerSoldier, (INT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( usMapPos, gpItemPointerSoldier ) );                                         
05022 
05023                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( gpItemPointerSoldier, DROP_ADJACENT_OBJECT, 0 , FALSE );
05024                                     }
05025                                     break;
05026                         
05027                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
05028                               case ANIM_PRONE:
05029 
05030                                     AddItemToPool( usMapPos, gpItemPointer, 1, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
05031                                     NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
05032                                     break;
05033                         }
05034                   }
05035                   else
05036                   {
05037                         // Drop in place...
05038                         if ( !gfDontChargeAPsToPickup )
05039                         {
05040                               // Deduct points
05041                               DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, AP_PICKUP_ITEM, 0 );
05042                         }
05043 
05044                         SoldierDropItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, gpItemPointer );
05045                   }
05046             }
05047       }
05048       else
05049       {
05050             sGridNo = usMapPos;
05051 
05052             // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Commented the following If test:
05053             //if ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_OKLIFE && gfUIFullTargetFound && MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ] ) && !( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
05054             
05055             // And added this one instead:
05056             if ( ( sDist <= PASSING_ITEM_DISTANCE_OKLIFE && gfUIFullTargetFound && MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ] ) ) && !( (!gGameExternalOptions.fVehicleInventory) && (MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) ) )
05057             {
05058                   // OK, do the transfer...
05059                   {
05060                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
05061 
05062                         {
05063                               // Change to inventory....
05064                               //gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
05065                               //gbNewPanel = SM_PANEL;
05066                               //gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)pSoldier->ubID;
05067                               if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, 3, 0, TRUE ) ||
05068                                            !EnoughPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, 3, 0, TRUE ) )
05069                               {
05070                                     return( FALSE );
05071                               }
05072 
05073                               sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, gpItemPointerSoldier );
05074 
05075                               // Check LOS....
05076                               if ( !SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo,  gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
05077                               {
05078                                     return( FALSE );
05079                               }
05080 
05081                               // Charge AP values...
05082                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, 3, 0 );
05083                               DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, 3, 0 );
05084 
05085                               usItem = gpItemPointer->usItem;
05086 
05087                               // try to auto place object....
05088                               if ( AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, gpItemPointer, TRUE ) )
05089                               {
05090                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ITEM_PASSED_TO_MERC ], ShortItemNames[ usItem ], pSoldier->name );         
05091 
05092                                     // Check if it's the same now!
05093                                     if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
05094                                     {
05095                                           EndItemPointer( );
05096                                     }
05097 
05098                         // OK, make guys turn towards each other and do animation...
05099                               {
05100                                       UINT8     ubFacingDirection;
05101 
05102                                       // Get direction to face.....
05103                                       ubFacingDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier );
05104 
05105                                       // Stop merc first....
05106                                       EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
05107 
05108                                       // If we are standing only...
05109                                       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && !MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
05110                                       {
05111                                             // Turn to face, then do animation....
05112                                             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubFacingDirection );
05113                                             pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone  = TRUE;
05114                                             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = PASS_OBJECT;
05115               }
05116 
05117                                       if ( gAnimControl[ gpItemPointerSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && !MercInWater( gpItemPointerSoldier ) )
05118                                       {
05119                                             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( gpItemPointerSoldier, gOppositeDirection[ ubFacingDirection ] );
05120                                             gpItemPointerSoldier->fTurningUntilDone  = TRUE;
05121                                             gpItemPointerSoldier->usPendingAnimation = PASS_OBJECT;
05122                                       }
05123                                 }
05124       
05125                                     return( TRUE );
05126                               }
05127                               else
05128                               {
05129                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_NO_ROOM_TO_PASS_ITEM ], ShortItemNames[ usItem ], pSoldier->name );        
05130                               return( FALSE );
05131                               }
05132                         }
05133                   }
05134             }
05135             else
05136             {
05137                   // CHECK FOR VALID CTGH
05138                   if ( gfBadThrowItemCTGH )
05139                   {
05140                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_THROW_TO_DEST_STR ] );
05141                         return( FALSE );
05142                   }
05143 
05144                   // Deduct points
05145                   //DeductPoints( gpItemPointerSoldier, AP_TOSS_ITEM, 0 );
05146                   gpItemPointerSoldier->fDontChargeTurningAPs = TRUE;
05147                   // Will be dome later....     
05148 
05149                   ubThrowActionCode = NO_THROW_ACTION;
05150 
05151                   // OK, CHECK FOR VALID THROW/CATCH
05152                   // IF OVER OUR GUY...
05153                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
05154                   {
05155                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
05156 
05157                         // Kaiden: Vehicle Inventory change - Commented the following If Test:
05158                         //if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
05159                         
05160                         // And replaced it with this one:
05161                         if ( ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) ) && !( ( !gGameExternalOptions.fVehicleInventory ) &&  ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
05162                         {
05163                               // OK, on our team, 
05164 
05165                               // How's our direction?
05166                               if ( SoldierCanSeeCatchComing( pSoldier, gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo ) )
05167                               {
05168                                     // Setup as being the catch target
05169                                     ubThrowActionCode = THROW_TARGET_MERC_CATCH;
05170                                     uiThrowActionData = pSoldier->ubID;
05171 
05172                                     sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
05173 
05174                                     switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
05175                                     {
05176                                                 case ANIM_STAND:
05177                                                       
05178                                                       sEndZ = 150;
05179                                                       break;
05180 
05181                                                 case ANIM_CROUCH:
05182 
05183                                                       sEndZ = 80;
05184                                                       break;
05185 
05186                                                 case ANIM_PRONE:
05187 
05188                                                       sEndZ = 10;
05189                                                       break;
05190                                     }
05191 
05192                                     if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
05193                                     {
05194                                           sEndZ = 0;
05195                                     }
05196                                     
05197                                     // Get direction
05198                                     ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier );
05199 
05200                                     // ATE: Goto stationary...
05201                                     SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
05202 
05203                                     // Set direction to turn...
05204                                     EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
05205 
05206                               }                 
05207                         }
05208                   }
05209                   
05210 
05211                   // CHANGE DIRECTION AT LEAST
05212                   ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, gpItemPointerSoldier );
05213                   EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( gpItemPointerSoldier, ubDirection );
05214                   gpItemPointerSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
05215 
05216                   // Increment attacker count...
05217                   gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
05218                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("INcremtning ABC: Throw item to %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
05219 
05220                   
05221                   // Given our gridno, throw grenate!
05222                   CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow( gpItemPointerSoldier, sGridNo, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, (INT16)( ( gsInterfaceLevel * 256 ) + sEndZ ), gpItemPointer, 0, ubThrowActionCode, uiThrowActionData );
05223 
05224                   // OK, goto throw animation
05225                   HandleSoldierThrowItem( gpItemPointerSoldier, usMapPos );
05226             }
05227       }
05228 
05229       gfDontChargeAPsToPickup = FALSE;
05230       EndItemPointer( );
05231 
05232 
05233       return( TRUE );
05234 }
05235 
05236 BOOLEAN ItemCursorInLobRange( UINT16 usMapPos )
05237 {
05238       // Draw item depending on distance from buddy
05239       if ( GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( usMapPos, gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo ) > MIN_LOB_RANGE )
05240       {
05241             return( FALSE );
05242       }
05243       else
05244       {
05245             return( TRUE );
05246       }     
05247 }
05248 
05249 
05250 
05251 
05252 BOOLEAN InItemStackPopup( )
05253 {
05254       return( gfInItemStackPopup );
05255 }
05256 
05257 
05258 BOOLEAN InKeyRingPopup( )
05259 {
05260       return( gfInKeyRingPopup );
05261 }
05262 
05263 BOOLEAN InitItemStackPopup( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubPosition, INT16 sInvX, INT16 sInvY, INT16 sInvWidth, INT16 sInvHeight )
05264 {  
05265       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
05266       INT16                               sX, sY, sCenX, sCenY;
05267       SGPRect                             aRect;
05268       UINT8                               ubLimit;
05269   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
05270       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
05271       INT32                               cnt;
05272       UINT16                         usPopupWidth;
05273       INT16                         sItemSlotWidth, sItemSlotHeight;
05274 
05275       
05276       // Set some globals
05277       gsItemPopupInvX                           = sInvX;
05278       gsItemPopupInvY                           = sInvY;
05279       gsItemPopupInvWidth                 = sInvWidth;
05280       gsItemPopupInvHeight          = sInvHeight;
05281       
05282 
05283       gpItemPopupSoldier = pSoldier;
05284 
05285 
05286       // Determine # of items
05287       gpItemPopupObject = &(pSoldier->inv[ ubPosition ] );
05288       ubLimit = ItemSlotLimit( gpItemPopupObject->usItem, ubPosition );
05289 
05290       // Return false if #objects not >1
05291       if ( ubLimit <1 )
05292       {
05293             return( FALSE );
05294       }
05295 
05296       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
05297       {
05298     if ( ubLimit > 6 )
05299     {
05300       ubLimit = 6;
05301     }
05302   }
05303 
05304       // Load graphics
05305       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05306       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\extra_inventory.STI" );
05307       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiItemPopupBoxes) );
05308 
05309       // Get size
05310       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemPopupBoxes );
05311       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
05312       usPopupWidth = pTrav->usWidth;
05313 
05314       // Determine position, height and width of mouse region, area
05315       GetSlotInvXY( ubPosition, &sX, &sY );
05316       GetSlotInvHeightWidth( ubPosition, &sItemSlotWidth, &sItemSlotHeight );
05317 
05318       // Get Width, Height
05319       gsItemPopupWidth  = ubLimit * usPopupWidth;
05320       gsItemPopupHeight = pTrav->usHeight;
05321       gubNumItemPopups = ubLimit;
05322 
05323       // Calculate X,Y, first center
05324       sCenX = sX - ( ( gsItemPopupWidth / 2 ) + ( sItemSlotWidth / 2 ) );
05325       sCenY = sY;
05326 
05327       // Limit it to window for item desc
05328       if ( sCenX < gsItemPopupInvX )
05329       {
05330             sCenX = gsItemPopupInvX;
05331       }
05332       if ( ( sCenX + gsItemPopupWidth ) > ( gsItemPopupInvX + gsItemPopupInvWidth ) )
05333       {
05334             sCenX = gsItemPopupInvX;
05335       }
05336 
05337   // Cap it at 0....
05338   if ( sCenX < 0 )
05339   {
05340     sCenX = 0;
05341   }
05342       
05343       // Set
05344       gsItemPopupX      = sCenX;
05345       gsItemPopupY      = sCenY;
05346 
05347       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gubNumItemPopups; cnt++ )
05348       {
05349             // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
05350             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gItemPopupRegions[cnt], (INT16)(sCenX + ( cnt * usPopupWidth ) ), sCenY , (INT16)(sCenX + ( (cnt+1) * usPopupWidth ) ),(INT16)( sCenY + gsItemPopupHeight ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
05351                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemPopupRegionCallback ); 
05352             // Add region
05353             MSYS_AddRegion( &gItemPopupRegions[cnt]);
05354             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gItemPopupRegions[cnt], 0, cnt );
05355             
05356             //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
05357             SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemPopupRegions[ cnt ]), ItemNames[ pSoldier->inv[ ubPosition ].usItem ] );
05358             SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &(gItemPopupRegions[ cnt ]), HelpTextDoneCallback );
05359             gfItemPopupRegionCallbackEndFix = FALSE;
05360       }
05361 
05362 
05363       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
05364       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gItemPopupRegion, gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY ,(INT16)(gsItemPopupInvX + gsItemPopupInvWidth), (INT16)(gsItemPopupInvY + gsItemPopupInvHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
05365                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemPopupFullRegionCallback ); 
05366       // Add region
05367       MSYS_AddRegion( &gItemPopupRegion);
05368 
05369 
05370       //Disable all faces
05371       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
05372 
05373 
05374       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05375 
05376       //guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_NORENDERBUTTONS;
05377 
05378 
05379       gfInItemStackPopup = TRUE;
05380 
05381 //    if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05382       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
05383       {
