05384             EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE, FALSE );           
05385       }
05386 
05387       //Reserict mouse cursor to panel
05388       aRect.iTop = sInvY;
05389       aRect.iLeft = sInvX;
05390       aRect.iBottom = sInvY + sInvHeight;
05391       aRect.iRight = sInvX + sInvWidth;
05392 
05393       RestrictMouseCursor( &aRect );
05394 
05395       return( TRUE );
05396 }
05397 
05398 void EndItemStackPopupWithItemInHand( )
05399 {
05400       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
05401       {
05402             DeleteItemStackPopup( );            
05403       }
05404 }
05405 
05406 void RenderItemStackPopup( BOOLEAN fFullRender )
05407 {
05408   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
05409       UINT32                                                usHeight, usWidth;
05410       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
05411       UINT32                                                cnt;
05412       INT16                                                 sX, sY, sNewX, sNewY;
05413 
05414       if ( gfInItemStackPopup )
05415       {
05416 
05417             //Disable all faces
05418             SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
05419 
05420             // Shadow Area
05421             if ( fFullRender )
05422             {
05423                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY, gsItemPopupInvX + gsItemPopupInvWidth , gsItemPopupInvY + gsItemPopupInvHeight  );        
05424             }
05425 
05426       }
05427       // TAKE A LOOK AT THE VIDEO OBJECT SIZE ( ONE OF TWO SIZES ) AND CENTER!
05428       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemPopupBoxes );
05429       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
05430       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
05431       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
05432 
05433       
05434       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gubNumItemPopups; cnt++ )
05435       {
05436             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiItemPopupBoxes, 0, gsItemPopupX + ( cnt * usWidth ), gsItemPopupY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
05437 
05438             if ( cnt < gpItemPopupObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
05439             {
05440                   sX = (INT16)(gsItemPopupX + ( cnt * usWidth ) + 11);
05441                   sY = (INT16)( gsItemPopupY + 3 );
05442 
05443                   INVRenderItem( FRAME_BUFFER, NULL, gpItemPopupObject, sX, sY, 29, 23, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, (UINT8)RENDER_ITEM_NOSTATUS, FALSE, 0 );
05444 
05445                   // Do status bar here...
05446                   sNewX = (INT16)( gsItemPopupX + ( cnt * usWidth ) + 7 );
05447                   sNewY = gsItemPopupY + INV_BAR_DY + 3;
05448                   DrawItemUIBarEx( gpItemPopupObject, (UINT8)cnt, sNewX, sNewY, ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT,  Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , FRAME_BUFFER );
05449 
05450             }
05451       }
05452 
05453       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY, gsItemPopupInvWidth, gsItemPopupInvHeight );
05454       InvalidateRegion( gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY, gsItemPopupInvX + gsItemPopupInvWidth, gsItemPopupInvY + gsItemPopupInvHeight );
05455 
05456 }
05457 
05458 void HandleItemStackPopup( )
05459 {
05460 
05461 }
05462 
05463 
05464 void DeleteItemStackPopup( )
05465 {
05466       INT32             cnt;
05467 
05468       //Remove
05469       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiItemPopupBoxes );
05470 
05471       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gItemPopupRegion);
05472 
05473       
05474       gfInItemStackPopup = FALSE;
05475 
05476       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gubNumItemPopups; cnt++ )
05477       {
05478             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gItemPopupRegions[cnt]);
05479       }
05480 
05481 
05482       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05483 
05484       //guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= (~INTERFACE_NORENDERBUTTONS);
05485 
05486 //    if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05487       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
05488       {
05489             EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE, FALSE );            
05490       }
05491 
05492       FreeMouseCursor( );
05493       
05494 }
05495 
05496 
05497 BOOLEAN InitKeyRingPopup( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sInvX, INT16 sInvY, INT16 sInvWidth, INT16 sInvHeight )
05498 {  
05499       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
05500       SGPRect                 aRect;
05501   ETRLEObject     *pTrav;
05502       HVOBJECT          hVObject;
05503       INT32                   cnt;
05504       UINT16                  usPopupWidth, usPopupHeight;
05505       UINT8                   ubSlotSimilarToKeySlot = 10;
05506       INT16                   sKeyRingItemWidth = 0;
05507       INT16                   sOffSetY = 0, sOffSetX = 0;
05508 
05509       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
05510       {
05511             gsKeyRingPopupInvX                        = 0;
05512             sKeyRingItemWidth                               = MAP_KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH;
05513             sOffSetX = 40;
05514             sOffSetY = 15;
05515       }
05516       else
05517       {
05518             // Set some globals
05519             gsKeyRingPopupInvX                              = sInvX + TACTICAL_INVENTORY_KEYRING_GRAPHIC_OFFSET_X;
05520             sKeyRingItemWidth                               = KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH;
05521             sOffSetY = 8;
05522       }
05523 
05524       gsKeyRingPopupInvY                              = sInvY;
05525       gsKeyRingPopupInvWidth              = sInvWidth;
05526       gsKeyRingPopupInvHeight       = sInvHeight;
05527       
05528 
05529       gpItemPopupSoldier = pSoldier;
05530 
05531       // Load graphics
05532       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05533       strcpy( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\extra_inventory.STI" );
05534       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiItemPopupBoxes) );
05535 
05536       // Get size
05537       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemPopupBoxes );
05538       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
05539       usPopupWidth = pTrav->usWidth;
05540       usPopupHeight = pTrav->usHeight;
05541 
05542       // Determine position, height and width of mouse region, area
05543       //GetSlotInvHeightWidth( ubSlotSimilarToKeySlot, &sItemSlotWidth, &sItemSlotHeight );
05544 
05545       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBER_KEYS_ON_KEYRING; cnt++ )
05546       {
05547             // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
05548             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gKeyRingRegions[cnt], 
05549                         (INT16)( gsKeyRingPopupInvX + ( cnt % sKeyRingItemWidth * usPopupWidth ) + sOffSetX ), // top left
05550                         (INT16)( sInvY + sOffSetY +( cnt / sKeyRingItemWidth * usPopupHeight ) ), // top right
05551                         (INT16)( gsKeyRingPopupInvX + ( ( cnt % sKeyRingItemWidth ) + 1 ) * usPopupWidth + sOffSetX ), // bottom left
05552                         (INT16)( sInvY + ( (cnt / sKeyRingItemWidth + 1) * usPopupHeight ) + sOffSetY ), // bottom right
05553                         MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
05554                         MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, KeyRingSlotInvClickCallback ); 
05555             // Add region
05556             MSYS_AddRegion( &gKeyRingRegions[cnt]);
05557             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gKeyRingRegions[cnt], 0, cnt );
05558             //gfItemPopupRegionCallbackEndFix = FALSE;
05559       }
05560 
05561 
05562       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
05563       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gItemPopupRegion, sInvX, sInvY ,(INT16)(sInvX + sInvWidth), (INT16)(sInvY + sInvHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
05564                                      MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ItemPopupFullRegionCallback ); 
05565       
05566       // Add region
05567       MSYS_AddRegion( &gItemPopupRegion);
05568 
05569 
05570       //Disable all faces
05571       SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
05572 
05573 
05574       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05575 
05576       //guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_NORENDERBUTTONS;
05577 
05578 
05579 //    if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05580       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
05581       {
05582             EnableSMPanelButtons( FALSE , FALSE );          
05583       }
05584 
05585       gfInKeyRingPopup = TRUE;
05586 
05587       //Reserict mouse cursor to panel
05588       aRect.iTop = sInvY;
05589       aRect.iLeft = sInvX;
05590       aRect.iBottom = sInvY + sInvHeight;
05591       aRect.iRight = sInvX + sInvWidth;
05592 
05593       RestrictMouseCursor( &aRect );
05594 
05595       return( TRUE );
05596 }
05597 
05598 
05599 void RenderKeyRingPopup( BOOLEAN fFullRender )
05600 {
05601   ETRLEObject                                   *pTrav;
05602       UINT32                                                usHeight, usWidth;
05603       HVOBJECT                                        hVObject;
05604       UINT32                                                cnt;
05605       OBJECTTYPE                                pObject;
05606       INT16 sKeyRingItemWidth = 0;
05607       INT16 sOffSetY = 0, sOffSetX = 0;
05608 
05609       if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
05610       {
05611             sOffSetY = 8;
05612       }
05613       else
05614       {
05615             sOffSetX = 40;
05616             sOffSetY = 15;
05617       }
05618 
05619       if ( gfInKeyRingPopup )
05620       {
05621 
05622             //Disable all faces
05623             SetAllAutoFacesInactive( );
05624 
05625             // Shadow Area
05626             if ( fFullRender )
05627             {
05628                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, gsKeyRingPopupInvY, gsKeyRingPopupInvX + gsKeyRingPopupInvWidth , gsKeyRingPopupInvY + gsKeyRingPopupInvHeight );        
05629             }
05630 
05631       }
05632 
05633       memset( &pObject, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
05634 
05635       pObject.usItem = KEY_1;
05636       pObject.bStatus[ 0 ] = 100;
05637 
05638       // TAKE A LOOK AT THE VIDEO OBJECT SIZE ( ONE OF TWO SIZES ) AND CENTER!
05639       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiItemPopupBoxes );
05640       pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ 0 ] );
05641       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
05642       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
05643 
05644       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
05645       {
05646             sKeyRingItemWidth                               = MAP_KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH;
05647       }
05648       else
05649       {
05650             // Set some globals
05651             sKeyRingItemWidth                               = KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH;
05652       }
05653       
05654       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBER_KEYS_ON_KEYRING; cnt++ )
05655       {
05656             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiItemPopupBoxes, 0, (INT16)(gsKeyRingPopupInvX + ( cnt % sKeyRingItemWidth * usWidth ) + sOffSetX ), ( INT16 )( gsKeyRingPopupInvY + sOffSetY + ( cnt / sKeyRingItemWidth * usHeight ) ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
05657 
05658             // will want to draw key here.. if there is one
05659             if( ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ cnt ].ubKeyID != INVALID_KEY_NUMBER ) && ( gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ cnt ].ubNumber > 0 ) )
05660             {
05661                   pObject.ubNumberOfObjects = gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ cnt ].ubNumber;
05662 
05663                   // show 100% status for each
05664                   DrawItemUIBarEx( &pObject, 0, (INT16)( gsKeyRingPopupInvX + sOffSetX + ( cnt % sKeyRingItemWidth * usWidth ) + 7 ), ( INT16 )( gsKeyRingPopupInvY + sOffSetY + ( cnt / sKeyRingItemWidth * usHeight ) + 24 )
05665                   , ITEM_BAR_WIDTH, ITEM_BAR_HEIGHT,  Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE , FRAME_BUFFER );
05666             
05667                   // set item type
05668                   pObject.usItem = FIRST_KEY + LockTable[ gpItemPopupSoldier->pKeyRing[ cnt].ubKeyID ].usKeyItem;
05669 
05670                   // render the item
05671                   INVRenderItem( FRAME_BUFFER, NULL, &pObject, (INT16)(gsKeyRingPopupInvX + sOffSetX +( cnt % sKeyRingItemWidth * usWidth ) + 8), ( INT16 )( gsKeyRingPopupInvY + sOffSetY + ( cnt / sKeyRingItemWidth * usHeight ) ), 
05672                         ( UINT16 )( usWidth - 8 ), ( UINT16 )( usHeight - 2 ) , DIRTYLEVEL2,  NULL, 0, 0, 0 );
05673             }
05674 
05675             //BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiItemPopupBoxes, 0, (INT16)(gsKeyRingPopupInvX + ( cnt % KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH * usWidth ) ), ( INT16 )( gsKeyRingPopupInvY + ( cnt / KEY_RING_ROW_WIDTH * usHeight ) ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
05676 
05677 
05678       }
05679 
05680       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY, gsItemPopupInvWidth, gsItemPopupInvHeight );
05681       InvalidateRegion( gsKeyRingPopupInvX, gsKeyRingPopupInvY, gsKeyRingPopupInvX + gsKeyRingPopupInvWidth, gsKeyRingPopupInvY + gsKeyRingPopupInvHeight );
05682 
05683 }
05684 
05685 
05686 void DeleteKeyRingPopup( )
05687 {
05688       INT32             cnt;
05689 
05690       if( gfInKeyRingPopup == FALSE )
05691       {
05692             // done, 
05693             return;
05694       }
05695 
05696       //Remove
05697       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiItemPopupBoxes );
05698 
05699       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gItemPopupRegion);
05700 
05701       
05702       gfInKeyRingPopup = FALSE;
05703 
05704       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBER_KEYS_ON_KEYRING; cnt++ )
05705       {
05706             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gKeyRingRegions[cnt]);
05707       }
05708 
05709 
05710       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05711 
05712       //guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= (~INTERFACE_NORENDERBUTTONS);
05713 
05714 //    if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05715       if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
05716       {
05717             EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE, FALSE );            
05718       }
05719 
05720       FreeMouseCursor( );
05721 }
05722 
05723 UINT32 GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( INVTYPE *pItem )
05724 {
05725       // CHECK SUBCLASS
05726       if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 0 )
05727       {
05728             return( guiGUNSM );
05729       }
05730       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 1 )
05731       {
05732             return( guiP1ITEMS );
05733       }
05734       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 2 )
05735       {
05736             return( guiP2ITEMS );
05737       }
05738       else
05739       {
05740             return( guiP3ITEMS );
05741       }
05742 
05743 }
05744 
05745 
05746 UINT16 GetTileGraphicForItem( INVTYPE *pItem )
05747 {
05748       UINT16 usIndex;
05749 
05750       if ( pItem->ubClassIndex >= M900 )
05751             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GetTileGraphicForItem: item %d graphic %d",pItem->ubClassIndex, pItem->ubGraphicNum));
05752       // CHECK SUBCLASS
05753       if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 0 )
05754       {
05755             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( GUNS, (INT16)(pItem->ubGraphicNum+1), &usIndex );
05756       }
05757       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 1 )
05758       {
05759             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( P1ITEMS, (INT16)(pItem->ubGraphicNum+1), &usIndex );        
05760       }
05761       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 2 )
05762       {
05763             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( P2ITEMS, (INT16)(pItem->ubGraphicNum+1), &usIndex );        
05764       }
05765       else
05766       {
05767             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( P3ITEMS, (INT16)(pItem->ubGraphicNum+1), &usIndex );        
05768       }
05769 
05770       if ( pItem->ubClassIndex >= M900  )
05771             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("GetTileGraphicForItem: db index %d",usIndex));
05772       return( usIndex );
05773 }
05774 
05775 
05776 BOOLEAN LoadTileGraphicForItem( INVTYPE *pItem, UINT32 *puiVo )
05777 {
05778       CHAR8  zName[ 100 ];
05779       UINT32      uiVo;
05780       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
05781       UINT16            ubGraphic;
05782 
05783       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LoadTileGraphicForItem"));
05784 
05785       // CHECK SUBCLASS
05786       ubGraphic = pItem->ubGraphicNum;
05787 
05788       if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 0 )
05789       {
05790             // CHECK SUBCLASS
05791             //ubGraphic++;
05792 
05793             if ( ubGraphic < 10 )
05794             {
05795                   sprintf( zName, "gun0%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05796             }
05797             else
05798             {
05799                   sprintf( zName, "gun%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05800             }
05801       }
05802       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 1 )
05803       {
05804             if ( ubGraphic < 10 )
05805             {
05806                   sprintf( zName, "p1item0%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05807             }
05808             else
05809             {
05810                   sprintf( zName, "p1item%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05811             }
05812       }
05813       else if ( pItem->ubGraphicType == 2 )
05814       {
05815             if ( ubGraphic < 10 )
05816             {
05817                   sprintf( zName, "p2item0%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05818             }
05819             else
05820             {
05821                   sprintf( zName, "p2item%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05822             }
05823       }
05824       else
05825       {
05826             if ( ubGraphic < 10 )
05827             {
05828                   sprintf( zName, "p3item0%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05829             }
05830             else
05831             {
05832                   sprintf( zName, "p3item%d.sti", ubGraphic );
05833             }
05834       }
05835 
05836       //Load item
05837       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05838       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "BIGITEMS\\%s", zName );
05839       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiVo) );
05840       
05841       *puiVo = uiVo;
05842 
05843       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LoadTileGraphicForItem: done"));
05844 
05845       return( TRUE );
05846 }
05847 
05848 void ItemDescMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05849 {
05850 }
05851 
05852 void ItemDescCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05853 {
05854       static BOOLEAN fRightDown = FALSE, fLeftDown = FALSE; 
05855 
05856       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
05857       {
05858             fLeftDown = TRUE;
05859       }
05860       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
05861       {
05862             if ( fLeftDown )
05863             {
05864                   fLeftDown = FALSE;
05865 
05866                   //Only exit the screen if we are NOT in the money interface.  Only the DONE button should exit the money interface.
05867                   if( gpItemDescObject->usItem != MONEY )
05868                   {
05869                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05870                   }
05871             }
05872       }
05873       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN)
05874       {
05875             fRightDown = TRUE;
05876       }
05877       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
05878       {
05879             if ( fRightDown )
05880             {
05881                   fRightDown = FALSE;
05882 
05883                   //Only exit the screen if we are NOT in the money interface.  Only the DONE button should exit the money interface.
05884 //                if( gpItemDescObject->usItem != MONEY )
05885                   {
05886                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05887                   }
05888             }
05889       }
05890 }
05891 
05892 void ItemDescDoneButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
05893 {
05894       
05895       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05896       {
05897         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
05898       }
05899       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05900   {
05901     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
05902             {
05903       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
05904 
05905                   if( gpItemDescObject->usItem == MONEY )
05906                   {
05907                         RemoveMoney();
05908                   }
05909       
05910               DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05911             }
05912       }     
05913 
05914       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
05915       {
05916         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
05917       }
05918       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
05919   {
05920     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
05921             {
05922       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
05923               DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
05924             }
05925       }     
05926 }
05927 
05928 
05929 void ItemPopupRegionCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05930 {
05931       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
05932 
05933       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
05934 
05935       // TO ALLOW ME TO DELETE REGIONS IN CALLBACKS!
05936       if ( gfItemPopupRegionCallbackEndFix )
05937       {
05938             return;
05939       }
05940 
05941       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN)
05942       {
05943 
05944             //If one in our hand, place it
05945             if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
05946             {
05947                         if ( !PlaceObjectAtObjectIndex( gpItemPointer, gpItemPopupObject, (UINT8)uiItemPos ) )
05948                         {
05949               if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05950           {
05951             MAPEndItemPointer( );
05952           }
05953           else
05954           {
05955                                 gpItemPointer = NULL;
05956                                 MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gSMPanelRegion , CURSOR_NORMAL );     
05957                                 SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
05958 
05959                                     if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05960                                     {
05961                                           memset( &gMoveingItem, 0, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
05962                                           SetSkiCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
05963                                     }
05964           }
05965 
05966                               // re-evaluate repairs
05967                               gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
05968                         }
05969 
05970                         //Dirty interface
05971                         //fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05972                         //RenderItemStackPopup( FALSE );
05973             }
05974             else
05975             {
05976                   if ( uiItemPos < gpItemPopupObject->ubNumberOfObjects )
05977                   {
05978                         // Here, grab an item and put in cursor to swap
05979                         //RemoveObjFrom( OBJECTTYPE * pObj, UINT8 ubRemoveIndex )
05980                         GetObjFrom( gpItemPopupObject, (UINT8)uiItemPos, &gItemPointer );
05981 
05982             if ( (guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
05983         {
05984                       // pick it up
05985           InternalMAPBeginItemPointer( gpItemPopupSoldier );
05986         }
05987         else
05988         {
05989                           gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
05990                           gpItemPointerSoldier = gpItemPopupSoldier;
05991         }
05992 
05993                         //if we are in the shop keeper interface
05994                         if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
05995                         {
05996                               // pick up stacked item into cursor and try to sell it ( unless CTRL is held down )
05997                               BeginSkiItemPointer( PLAYERS_INVENTORY, -1, ( BOOLEAN )!gfKeyState[ CTRL ] );
05998 
05999                               // if we've just removed the last one there
06000                               if ( gpItemPopupObject->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
06001                               {
06002                                     // we must immediately get out of item stack popup, because the item has been deleted (memset to 0), and
06003                                     // errors like a right bringing up an item description for item 0 could happen then.  ARM.
06004                                     DeleteItemStackPopup( );
06005                               }
06006                         }
06007 
06008                         // re-evaluate repairs
06009                         gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
06010 
06011                         //Dirty interface
06012                         //RenderItemStackPopup( FALSE );
06013                         //fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06014                   }
06015             }
06016 
06017             UpdateItemHatches();
06018       }
06019       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
06020       {
06021             // Get Description....
06022             // Some global stuff here - for esc, etc
06023             //Remove
06024             gfItemPopupRegionCallbackEndFix = TRUE;
06025 
06026 
06027             DeleteItemStackPopup( );
06028 
06029             if ( !InItemDescriptionBox( ) )
06030             {
06031                   // RESTORE BACKGROUND
06032                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( gsItemPopupInvX, gsItemPopupInvY, gsItemPopupInvWidth, gsItemPopupInvHeight );
06033                   if ( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
06034                   {
06035                         MAPInternalInitItemDescriptionBox( gpItemPopupObject, (UINT8)uiItemPos, gpItemPopupSoldier );
06036                   }
06037                   else
06038                   {
06039                         InternalInitItemDescriptionBox( gpItemPopupObject, (INT16) ITEMDESC_START_X, (INT16) ITEMDESC_START_Y, (UINT8)uiItemPos, gpItemPopupSoldier );
06040                   }
06041             }
06042 
06043 
06044       }
06045 }
06046 
06047 void ItemPopupFullRegionCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
06048 {
06049       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
06050 
06051       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
06052 
06053       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
06054       {
06055             if ( InItemStackPopup( ) )
06056             {
06057                   // End stack popup and retain pointer
06058                   EndItemStackPopupWithItemInHand( );
06059             }     
06060             else if( InKeyRingPopup() )
06061             {
06062                   // end pop up with key in hand
06063                   DeleteKeyRingPopup( );
06064                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06065 
06066             }
06067       }
06068       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
06069       {
06070             if ( InItemStackPopup( ) )
06071             {
06072                   DeleteItemStackPopup( );
06073                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06074             }
06075             else
06076             {
06077                   DeleteKeyRingPopup( );
06078                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
06079             }
06080       }
06081 }
06082 
06083 #define NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS                        6
06084 
06085 typedef struct
06086 {
06087       ITEM_POOL               *pItemPool;
06088       INT16                         sX;
06089       INT16                         sY;
06090       INT16                         sWidth;
06091       INT16                         sHeight;
06092       INT8                          bScrollPage;
06093       INT32                   ubScrollAnchor;
06094       INT32                   ubTotalItems;
06095       INT32                   bCurSelect;
06096       UINT8                         bNumSlotsPerPage;
06097       UINT32                        uiPanelVo;
06098       INT32                         iUpButtonImages;
06099       INT32                         iDownButtonImages;
06100       INT32                         iAllButtonImages;
06101       INT32                         iCancelButtonImages;
06102       INT32                         iOKButtonImages;
06103       INT32                         iUpButton;
06104       INT32                         iDownButton;
06105       INT32                         iAllButton;
06106       INT32                         iOKButton;
06107       INT32                         iCancelButton;
06108       BOOLEAN                       fCanScrollUp;
06109       BOOLEAN                       fCanScrollDown;
06110       BOOLEAN                       fDirtyLevel;
06111       INT32                         iDirtyRect;
06112       BOOLEAN                       fHandled;
06113       INT16                         sGridNo;
06114       INT8                          bZLevel;
06115       INT16                         sButtomPanelStartY;
06116       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
06117       ITEM_POOL               *ItemPoolSlots[ NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS ];
06118       MOUSE_REGION      Regions[ NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS ];
06119       MOUSE_REGION      BackRegions;
06120       MOUSE_REGION      BackRegion;
06121       BOOLEAN                       *pfSelectedArray;
06122       BOOLEAN                       fAtLeastOneSelected;
06123       OBJECTTYPE        CompAmmoObject;
06124       BOOLEAN                       fAllSelected;
06125 
06126 } ITEM_PICKUP_MENU_STRUCT;
06127 
06128 #define                             ITEMPICK_UP_X                       55
06129 #define                             ITEMPICK_UP_Y                       5
06130 #define                             ITEMPICK_DOWN_X               111
06131 #define                             ITEMPICK_DOWN_Y               5
06132 #define                             ITEMPICK_ALL_X                79
06133 #define                             ITEMPICK_ALL_Y                6
06134 #define                             ITEMPICK_OK_X                       16
06135 #define                             ITEMPICK_OK_Y                       6
06136 #define                             ITEMPICK_CANCEL_X       141
06137 #define                             ITEMPICK_CANCEL_Y       6
06138 
06139 #define                             ITEMPICK_START_X_OFFSET       10
06140 #define                             ITEMPICK_START_Y_OFFSET       20
06141 
06142 #define                             ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_X                  10          
06143 #define                             ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_Y                  12          
06144 #define                             ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE 26          
06145 
06146 #define                             ITEMPICK_TEXT_X                           56                
06147 #define                             ITEMPICK_TEXT_Y                           22    
06148 #define                             ITEMPICK_TEXT_YSPACE          26
06149 #define                             ITEMPICK_TEXT_WIDTH                 109               
06150 #define                             ITEMPICK_TEXT_HEIGHT          17                
06151 
06152 
06153 
06154 
06155 ITEM_PICKUP_MENU_STRUCT             gItemPickupMenu;
06156 BOOLEAN                                                                 gfInItemPickupMenu = FALSE;
06157 
06158 void ItemPickupScrollUp( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason );
06159 void ItemPickupScrollDown( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason );
06160 void ItemPickupAll( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason );
06161 void ItemPickupOK( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason );
06162 void ItemPickupCancel( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason );
06163 void SetupPickupPage( INT8 bPage );
06164 void ItemPickMenuMouseMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
06165 void ItemPickMenuMouseClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
06166 void CalculateItemPickupMenuDimensions( );
06167 void ItemPickupBackgroundClick( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason );
06168 
06169 
06170 // STUFF FOR POPUP ITEM INFO BOX
06171 void SetItemPickupMenuDirty( BOOLEAN fDirtyLevel )
06172 {
06173       gItemPickupMenu.fDirtyLevel = fDirtyLevel;
06174 }
06175 
06176 
06177 BOOLEAN InitializeItemPickupMenu( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, ITEM_POOL *pItemPool, INT16 sScreenX, INT16 sScreenY, INT8 bZLevel )
06178 {
06179   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
06180       UINT8                               ubString[48];
06181       ITEM_POOL                     *pTempItemPool;
06182       INT32                               cnt;
06183       INT16                               sCenX, sCenY, sX, sY, sCenterYVal;
06184 
06185       gfStealing=FALSE;
06186       gpOpponent=NULL;
06187       
06188       // Erase other menus....
06189       EraseInterfaceMenus( TRUE );
06190 
06191       // Make sure menu is located if not on screen
06192       LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
06193 
06194       // memset values
06195       memset( &gItemPickupMenu, 0, sizeof( gItemPickupMenu ) );
06196 
06197       //Set item pool value
06198       gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool           = pItemPool;
06199 
06200       InterruptTime();
06201       PauseGame();
06202       LockPauseState( 18 );
06203       // Pause timers as well....
06204       PauseTime( TRUE );
06205 
06206 
06207       // Alrighty, cancel lock UI if we havn't done so already
06208       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
06209 
06210       // Change to INV panel if not there already...
06211       gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
06212       gbNewPanel = SM_PANEL;
06213       gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)pSoldier->ubID;
06214 
06215       //Determine total #
06216       cnt = 0;
06217       pTempItemPool = pItemPool;
06218       while( pTempItemPool != NULL )
06219       {
06220             if ( ItemPoolOKForDisplay( pTempItemPool, bZLevel ) )
06221             {
06222                   cnt++;
06223             }
06224 
06225             pTempItemPool = pTempItemPool->pNext;           
06226       }
06227       gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems = (UINT8)cnt;
06228 
06229       // Determine # of slots per page
06230       if ( gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
06231       {
06232             gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage = NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS;
06233       }
06234       else
06235       {
06236             gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage = gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems;
06237       }
06238 
06239       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
06240       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\itembox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
06241       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo) ) );
06242 
06243       // Memalloc selection array...
06244        gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray = (BOOLEAN *) MemAlloc(( sizeof( UINT8 ) * gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems ) );
06245       // seto to 0
06246       memset( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray, 0, ( sizeof( UINT8 ) * gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems ) );
06247 
06248       // Calcualate dimensions
06249       CalculateItemPickupMenuDimensions( );
06250 
06251       // Get XY
06252       {
06253             // First get mouse xy screen location
06254             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
06255             {
06256                   sX = gusMouseXPos;
06257                   sY = gusMouseYPos;
06258             }
06259             else
06260             {
06261                    sX = sScreenX; 
06262                    sY = sScreenY; 
06263             }
06264 
06265             // CHECK FOR LEFT/RIGHT
06266             if ( ( sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ) > SCREEN_WIDTH )
06267             {
06268                   sX = SCREEN_WIDTH - gItemPickupMenu.sWidth - ITEMPICK_START_X_OFFSET;
06269             }
06270             else
06271             {
06272                   sX = sX + ITEMPICK_START_X_OFFSET;
06273             }
06274 
06275             // Now check for top
06276             // Center in the y
06277             sCenterYVal = gItemPickupMenu.sHeight / 2;
06278 
06279             sY -= sCenterYVal;
06280 
06281             if ( sY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y )
06282             {
06283                   sY = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
06284             }
06285 
06286             // Check for bottom
06287             if ( ( sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ) > INV_INTERFACE_START_Y )
06288             {
06289                   sY = INV_INTERFACE_START_Y - gItemPickupMenu.sHeight;
06290             }
06291 
06292       }
06293 
06294       // Set some values
06295       gItemPickupMenu.sX                              = sX;
06296       gItemPickupMenu.sY                              = sY;
06297       gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect    = 0;
06298       gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier            = pSoldier;
06299       gItemPickupMenu.fHandled            = FALSE;
06300       gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo             = sGridNo;
06301       gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel             = bZLevel;
06302       gItemPickupMenu.fAtLeastOneSelected = FALSE;
06303       gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected  = FALSE;
06304 
06305       //Load images for buttons
06306       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\itembox.sti", (STR)ubString );
06307       gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages                 = LoadButtonImage( ubString, -1,5,-1,10,-1 );
06308       gItemPickupMenu.iDownButtonImages         =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 7, -1, 12, -1 );
06309       gItemPickupMenu.iAllButtonImages          =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 6, -1,11, -1 );
06310       gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButtonImages =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 8, -1, 13, -1 );
06311       gItemPickupMenu.iOKButtonImages                 =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 4, -1, 9, -1 );
06312 
06313 /* This region definition must be checked and recalculated!!!
06314  * i didnt have time for that sorry
06315  * any questions? joker
06316  */
06317 
06318       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
06319       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ), (INT16)( SCREEN_WIDTH - 108 ), (INT16)( SCREEN_HEIGHT - 133 ), (INT16)( SCREEN_WIDTH  ),(INT16)( SCREEN_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06320                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
06321       // Add region
06322       MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ) );
06323 
06324 
06325       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
06326       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegions ), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX ), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sY), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ),(INT16)( gItemPickupMenu.sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06327                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
06328       // Add region
06329       MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegions ) );
06330 
06331 
06332       // Create buttons
06333       if ( gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage == NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS && gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
06334       {
06335             gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton     = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_UP_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_UP_Y),
06336                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06337                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupScrollUp );
06338 
06339             SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 1 ] );
06340 
06341 
06342             gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton   = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_DOWN_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_DOWN_Y),
06343                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06344                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupScrollDown );
06345 
06346             SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 3 ] );
06347 
06348       }
06349 
06350 
06351       gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton     = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_OK_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_OK_Y),
06352                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06353                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupOK );
06354       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 0 ] );
06355 
06356 
06357       gItemPickupMenu.iAllButton    = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_ALL_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_ALL_Y),
06358                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06359                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupAll );
06360       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 2 ] );
06361 
06362       gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButton = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_CANCEL_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_CANCEL_Y),
06363                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06364                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupCancel );
06365       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 4 ] );
06366 
06367 
06368       DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
06369 
06370 
06371 
06372       // Create regions...
06373       sCenX = gItemPickupMenu.sX;
06374       sCenY = gItemPickupMenu.sY + ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_Y;
06375 
06376       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
06377       {
06378             // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
06379             MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]), (INT16)(sCenX ), (INT16)(sCenY + 1), (INT16)(sCenX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ),(INT16)( sCenY + ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
06380                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, ItemPickMenuMouseMoveCallback, ItemPickMenuMouseClickCallback ); 
06381             // Add region
06382             MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]) );
06383             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]), 0, cnt );
06384 
06385             sCenY += ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE;
06386       }
06387 
06388       //Save dirty rect
06389       //gItemPickupMenu.iDirtyRect = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT | BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT, NULL, gItemPickupMenu.sX, gItemPickupMenu.sY, (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ) , (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ) );
06390 
06391 
06392       SetupPickupPage( 0 );
06393 
06394       gfInItemPickupMenu = TRUE;
06395 
06396       // Ignore scrolling
06397       gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
06398 
06399       HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
06400       gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = pSoldier->ubID;
06401       ReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( );
06402       DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( TRUE );
06403 
06404       //gfSMDisableForItems = TRUE;
06405       return( TRUE );
06406 
06407 }
06408 
06409 
06410 void SetupPickupPage( INT8 bPage )
06411 {
06412       INT32 cnt, iStart, iEnd;
06413       ITEM_POOL                     *pTempItemPool;
06414   INT16           sValue;
06415       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject;
06416       static INT16 pStr[ 200 ];
06417 
06418 
06419       // Zero out page slots
06420       memset( gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots, 0, sizeof( gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots )  );
06421 
06422       // Zero page flags
06423       gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollUp        = FALSE;
06424       gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollDown  = FALSE;
06425 
06426       // Get lower bound
06427       iStart = bPage * NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS;
06428       if ( iStart > gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems )
06429       {
06430             return;
06431       }
06432 
06433       if ( bPage > 0 )
06434       {
06435             gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollUp = TRUE;
06436       }
06437 
06438 
06439       iEnd   = iStart + NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS;
06440       if ( iEnd >= gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems )
06441       {
06442             iEnd = gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems;
06443       }
06444       else
06445       {
06446             // We can go for more!
06447             gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollDown = TRUE;
06448       }
06449 
06450       // Setup slots!
06451       // These slots contain an inventory pool pointer for each slot...
06452       pTempItemPool = gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool;
06453 
06454   // ATE: Patch fix here for crash :(
06455   // Clear help text!
06456       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS; cnt++ )
06457       {
06458       SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]), L"" );
06459   }
06460 
06461       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < iEnd; )
06462       {
06463             // Move to the closest one that can be displayed....
06464             if (!gfStealing)
06465             {
06466                   while( !ItemPoolOKForDisplay( pTempItemPool, gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel ) )
06467                   {
06468                         pTempItemPool = pTempItemPool->pNext;                       
06469                   }
06470             }
06471 
06472             if ( cnt >= iStart )
06473             {
06474                   gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ cnt - iStart ] = pTempItemPool;
06475 
06476                   pObject = (gfStealing)? gpOpponent->inv+pTempItemPool->iItemIndex
06477                         :&(gWorldItems[ pTempItemPool->iItemIndex ].o );
06478 
06479               sValue = pObject->bStatus[ 0 ];
06480 
06481           // Adjust for ammo, other thingys..
06482           if( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO || Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_KEY )
06483           {
06484         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"" );
06485           }
06486       else
06487       {
06488         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d%%", sValue );
06489       }
06490 
06491       SetRegionFastHelpText( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[ cnt - iStart ]), pStr );
06492             }
06493 
06494             cnt++;
06495 
06496             pTempItemPool = pTempItemPool->pNext;                       
06497       }
06498 
06499       gItemPickupMenu.bScrollPage         = bPage;
06500       gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor      = (UINT8)iStart; 
06501 
06502       if ( gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage == NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS && gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
06503       {
06504             // Setup enabled/disabled buttons
06505             if ( gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollUp )
06506             {
06507                   EnableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton );
06508             }
06509             else
06510             {
06511                   DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton );
06512             }
06513 
06514             // Setup enabled/disabled buttons
06515             if ( gItemPickupMenu.fCanScrollDown )
06516             {
06517                   EnableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton );
06518             }
06519             else
06520             {
06521                   DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton );
06522             }
06523       }
06524       SetItemPickupMenuDirty( DIRTYLEVEL2 );
06525 
06526 }
06527 
06528 
06529 void CalculateItemPickupMenuDimensions( )
06530 {
06531       INT32             cnt;
06532       INT16             sX, sY;
06533       UINT16                  usSubRegion, usHeight, usWidth;
06534 
06535       // Build background
06536       sX = 0;
06537       sY = 0;
06538 
06539       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
06540       {
06541             if ( cnt == 0 )
06542             {
06543                   usSubRegion = 0;
06544             }
06545             else
06546             {
06547                   usSubRegion = 1;
06548             }
06549 
06550             // Add hieght of object
06551             GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, usSubRegion, &usWidth, &usHeight );      
06552 
06553             sY += usHeight;
06554 
06555       }
06556       gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY = sY;
06557 
06558       // Do end
06559       GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, 2, &usWidth, &usHeight );    
06560 
06561       sY += usHeight;
06562 
06563       // Set height, width
06564       gItemPickupMenu.sHeight                   = sY;
06565       gItemPickupMenu.sWidth                    = usWidth;
06566 
06567 }
06568 
06569 
06570 // set pick up menu dirty level
06571 void SetPickUpMenuDirtyLevel( BOOLEAN fDirtyLevel )
06572 {
06573       gItemPickupMenu.fDirtyLevel = fDirtyLevel;
06574 
06575       return;
06576 }
06577 
06578 
06579 void RenderItemPickupMenu( )
06580 {
06581       INT32             cnt;
06582       UINT16            usItemTileIndex;
06583       INT16             sX, sY, sCenX, sCenY, sFontX, sFontY, sNewX, sNewY;
06584       UINT32                  uiDestPitchBYTES;
06585       UINT8                   *pDestBuf;
06586       INT16                   pStr[ 100 ];
06587       UINT16                  usSubRegion, usHeight, usWidth;
06588       INVTYPE   *pItem;
06589       OBJECTTYPE  *pObject;
06590       UINT16                  uiStringLength;
06591 
06592 
06593       if ( !gfInItemPickupMenu )
06594       {
06595             return;
06596       }
06597 
06598 
06599       // Do everything!
06600       if ( gItemPickupMenu.fDirtyLevel == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
06601       {
06602             MarkButtonsDirty( );
06603 
06604             // Build background
06605             sX = gItemPickupMenu.sX;
06606             sY = gItemPickupMenu.sY;
06607 
06608             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
06609             {
06610                   if ( cnt == 0 )
06611                   {
06612                         usSubRegion = 0;
06613                   }
06614                   else
06615                   {
06616                         usSubRegion = 1;
06617                   }
06618 
06619                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, usSubRegion, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );        
06620 
06621                   // Add hieght of object
06622                   GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, usSubRegion, &usWidth, &usHeight );      
06623 
06624                   sY += usHeight;
06625 
06626             }
06627 
06628             // Do end
06629             if ( gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage == NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS && gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
06630             {
06631                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, 2, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );            
06632             }
06633             else
06634             {
06635                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo, 3, sX, sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );            
06636             }
06637 
06638             // Render items....
06639             sX = ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_X + gItemPickupMenu.sX;
06640             sY = ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_Y + gItemPickupMenu.sY;
06641 
06642             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
06643 
06644             SetFont( ITEMDESC_FONT );
06645             SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
06646             SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06647 
06648             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
06649             {
06650                   if ( gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ cnt ] != NULL )
06651                   {
06652                         // Get item to render
06653                         pObject = (gfStealing)? gpOpponent->inv+ gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ cnt ]->iItemIndex
06654                               :&(gWorldItems[ gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ cnt ]->iItemIndex ].o );
06655                         pItem = &( Item[ pObject->usItem ] );
06656 
06657                         usItemTileIndex = GetTileGraphicForItem( pItem );
06658                         
06659                         // Render
06660                         sX = ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_X + gItemPickupMenu.sX;
06661 
06662                         sCenX = sX;
06663                         sCenY = sY;
06664 
06665         // ATE: Adjust to basic shade.....
06666             gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface->pShadeCurrent=gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface->pShades[4];
06667 
06668                         //else
06669                         {
06670                               if ( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[  cnt + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ] )
06671                               {
06672                                     //SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );
06673                                     //SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06674                                     Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferOutline( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface, sCenX, sCenY, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].usRegionIndex, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 0 ) ), TRUE );
06675                               }
06676                               else
06677                               {
06678                                     //SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
06679                                     //SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06680                                     Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferOutline( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface, sCenX, sCenY, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].usRegionIndex, 0, FALSE );
06681                               }
06682         }
06683 
06684         // Draw text.....
06685             SetFont( ITEM_FONT );
06686                         if ( pObject->ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
06687                         {
06688                               SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY4 );
06689                               SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
06690 
06691                           sCenX = sX - 4;
06692                           sCenY = sY + 14;
06693 
06694                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%d", pObject->ubNumberOfObjects );
06695 
06696                           VarFindFontRightCoordinates( sCenX, sCenY, 42, 1 , ITEM_FONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, pStr );
06697                           mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, ITEM_FONT, sFontX, sFontY, pStr );
06698                         }
06699             SetFont( ITEMDESC_FONT );
06700 
06701 
06702         // Render attachment symbols
06703                     if ( ItemHasAttachments( pObject ) )
06704                     {
06705                           SetFontForeground( FONT_GREEN );
06706                               SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
06707 
06708                           sNewY = sCenY + 2;
06709                           swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"*" );
06710 
06711                           // Get length of string
06712                           uiStringLength=StringPixLength( pStr, ITEM_FONT );
06713 
06714                           sNewX = sCenX + 43 - uiStringLength - 4;
06715 
06716                         mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, ITEMDESC_FONT, sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
06717                           //gprintfinvalidate( sNewX, sNewY, pStr );
06718                     }
06719 
06720                         if ( gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect == ( cnt + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ) )
06721                         {
06722                               //SetFontForeground( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06723                               //if ( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[  cnt + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ] )
06724                               //{
06725                               //    SetFontForeground( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW );
06726                               //    SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06727                               //}
06728                               //else
06729                               //{
06730                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
06731                                     SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
06732                               //}
06733                               // Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferOutline( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface, sCenX, sCenY, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].usRegionIndex, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 0, 0 ) ), TRUE );
06734                               // Blt8BPPDataTo16BPPBufferOutline( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].hTileSurface, sCenX, sCenY, gTileDatabase[ usItemTileIndex ].usRegionIndex, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 0, 0 ) ), TRUE );
06735                         }
06736                         else
06737                         {
06738                               SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
06739                               SetFontShadow( ITEMDESC_FONTSHADOW2 );
06740                         }
06741 
06742                         // Render name
06743                         sCenX = ITEMPICK_TEXT_X + gItemPickupMenu.sX;
06744                         sCenY = ITEMPICK_TEXT_Y + gItemPickupMenu.sY + ( ITEMPICK_TEXT_YSPACE * (INT16)cnt );
06745 
06746                         // If we are money...
06747                         if ( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
06748                         {
06749                               INT16       pStr2[20];
06750                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr2, L"%ld", pObject->uiMoneyAmount );
06751                               InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr2 );
06752                               InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr2 );
06753 
06754                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s (%ls)", ItemNames[ pObject->usItem ], pStr2 );
06755                         }
06756                         else
06757                         {
06758                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s", ShortItemNames[ pObject->usItem ] );
06759                         }
06760                         VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sCenX, sCenY, ITEMPICK_TEXT_WIDTH, 1 , ITEMDESC_FONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, pStr );
06761                         mprintf_buffer( pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, ITEMDESC_FONT, sFontX, sFontY, pStr );
06762 
06763                         sY += ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE;
06764                   }
06765             }
06766 
06767             SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
06768 
06769 
06770             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
06771 
06772             InvalidateRegion( gItemPickupMenu.sX, gItemPickupMenu.sY, gItemPickupMenu.sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth, gItemPickupMenu.sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight );
06773 
06774             gItemPickupMenu.fDirtyLevel = 0;
06775 
06776       }
06777 }
06778 
06779 
06780 void RemoveItemPickupMenu( )
06781 {
06782       INT32 cnt;
06783 
06784       if ( gfInItemPickupMenu )
06785       {
06786             gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
06787 
06788             HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
06789 
06790             UnLockPauseState();
06791             UnPauseGame();
06792             // UnPause timers as well....
06793             PauseTime( FALSE );
06794 
06795             // Unfreese guy!
06796             gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier->fPauseAllAnimation = FALSE;
06797 
06798             // Remove graphics!
06799             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo );
06800 
06801             // Remove buttons
06802             if ( gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage == NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS && gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
06803             {
06804                   RemoveButton( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton );
06805                   RemoveButton( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton );
06806             }
06807             RemoveButton( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButton );
06808             RemoveButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
06809             RemoveButton( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButton );
06810 
06811             // Remove button images
06812             UnloadButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages );
06813             UnloadButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButtonImages );
06814             UnloadButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButtonImages );
06815             UnloadButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButtonImages );
06816             UnloadButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButtonImages );
06817 
06818             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegions ) );
06819             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ) );
06820 
06821             // Remove regions
06822             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
06823             {
06824                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]));
06825             }
06826 
06827             // Remove register rect
06828             if ( gItemPickupMenu.iDirtyRect != -1 )
06829             {
06830                   //FreeBackgroundRect( gItemPickupMenu.iDirtyRect );
06831             }
06832 
06833             // Free selection list...
06834             MemFree( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray );
06835             gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray = NULL;
06836 
06837 
06838             // Set cursor back to normal mode...
06839             guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;     
06840 
06841             // Rerender world
06842             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
06843 
06844             gfInItemPickupMenu = FALSE;
06845 
06846             //gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
06847             //EnableButtonsForInItemBox( TRUE );
06848             EnableSMPanelButtons( TRUE , TRUE );
06849             gfSMDisableForItems = FALSE;
06850 
06851             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06852 
06853             // Turn off Ignore scrolling
06854             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
06855                   DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( FALSE );
06856             gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = gpSMCurrentMerc->ubID;
06857 
06858       }
06859 }
06860 
06861 
06862 void ItemPickupScrollUp( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
06863 {
06864       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06865       {
06866             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06867       }
06868       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06869       {
06870             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06871             SetupPickupPage( (UINT8)( gItemPickupMenu.bScrollPage - 1 ) );
06872       }
06873       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06874       {
06875             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06876       }
06877       
06878 }
06879 
06880 
06881 void ItemPickupScrollDown( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
06882 {
06883       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06884       {
06885             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06886       }
06887       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06888       {
06889             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06890             SetupPickupPage( (UINT8)( gItemPickupMenu.bScrollPage + 1 ) );
06891       }
06892       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06893       {
06894             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06895       }
06896 }
06897 
06898 void ItemPickupAll( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
06899 {
06900       INT32 cnt;
06901 
06902 
06903       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06904       {
06905             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06906       }
06907       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06908       {
06909             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06910 
06911             gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected = !gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected;
06912 
06913 
06914             // OK, pickup item....
06915             //gItemPickupMenu.fHandled = TRUE;
06916             // Tell our soldier to pickup this item!
06917             //SoldierGetItemFromWorld( gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier, ITEM_PICKUP_ACTION_ALL, gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo, gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel, NULL );
06918             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems; cnt++ )
06919             {
06920                   gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[ cnt ] = gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected;
06921             }
06922 
06923             if ( gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected )
06924             {
06925                   EnableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
06926             }
06927             else
06928             {
06929                   DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
06930             }
06931 
06932       }
06933       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06934       {
06935             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06936       }
06937 }
06938 
06939 
06940 void ItemPickupOK( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
06941 {
06942       INT32 cnt = 0;
06943       UINT16 usLastItem;
06944 
06945       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06946       {
06947             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06948       }
06949       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06950       {
06951             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06952 
06953             // OK, pickup item....
06954             gItemPickupMenu.fHandled = TRUE;
06955 
06956             if (gfStealing)   //jackaians modif
06957             {
06958                   usLastItem=gpOpponent->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
06959                   SoldierStealItemFromSoldier( gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier,gpOpponent,gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool, ITEM_PICKUP_SELECTION, gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo, gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel, gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray );
06960                   DeletePool(gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool);
06961                   if ((gpOpponent->inv[HANDPOS].usItem == NOTHING ) && (usLastItem!=NOTHING))
06962                         ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( gpOpponent, usLastItem, NOTHING );
06963             }
06964             else
06965             {
06966                   // Tell our soldier to pickup this item!
06967                   SoldierGetItemFromWorld( gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier, ITEM_PICKUP_SELECTION, gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo, gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel, gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray );
06968             }
06969       }
06970       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06971       {
06972             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06973       }
06974 }
06975 
06976 void ItemPickupCancel( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
06977 {
06978       INT32 cnt = 0;
06979 
06980       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
06981       {
06982             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
06983             if (gfStealing)         //jackaians modif
06984             {
06985                   DeletePool(gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool);
06986             }
06987       }
06988       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
06989       {
06990             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06991 
06992             // OK, pickup item....
06993             gItemPickupMenu.fHandled = TRUE;
06994       }
06995       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
06996       {
06997             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
06998       }
06999 }
07000 
07001 
07002 void ItemPickMenuMouseMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07003 {
07004       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
07005       ITEM_POOL                     *pTempItemPool;
07006       INT32                               bPos;
07007       static                              BOOLEAN     bChecked = FALSE;
07008 
07009       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07010 
07011 
07012       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
07013       {
07014             bPos = ( uiItemPos + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor );
07015 
07016             if ( bPos < gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems )
07017             {
07018                   // Set current selected guy....
07019                   gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect = bPos;
07020 
07021                   if ( !bChecked )
07022                   {
07023                         // Show compatible ammo...
07024                         pTempItemPool = gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect - gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ];
07025 
07026                         memcpy( &(gItemPickupMenu.CompAmmoObject), &( gWorldItems[ pTempItemPool->iItemIndex ].o ), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) ); 
07027 
07028                         // Turn off first...
07029                         HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
07030                         InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, &( gItemPickupMenu.CompAmmoObject ), TRUE );
07031 
07032                         HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8)CurrentSquad( ), &(gWorldItems[ pTempItemPool->iItemIndex ].o ), FALSE );
07033 
07034                         SetItemPickupMenuDirty( DIRTYLEVEL2 );
07035 
07036                         bChecked = TRUE;
07037                   }
07038             }
07039       }
07040       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
07041       {
07042             gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect = 255;
07043 
07044             InternalHandleCompatibleAmmoUI( gpSMCurrentMerc, &( gItemPickupMenu.CompAmmoObject ), FALSE );
07045             HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
07046 
07047             SetItemPickupMenuDirty( DIRTYLEVEL2 );
07048 
07049             bChecked = FALSE;
07050       }
07051 
07052 
07053 }
07054 
07055 
07056 void ItemPickupBackgroundClick( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07057 {
07058       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
07059       {
07060             // OK, goto team panel....
07061             ToggleTacticalPanels();
07062       }
07063 }
07064 
07065 
07066 
07067 void ItemPickMenuMouseClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
07068 {
07069       INT32                         uiItemPos;
07070       UINT8                               cnt;
07071       BOOLEAN                             fEnable = FALSE;
07072 
07073       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
07074 
07075 
07076       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
07077       {
07078             if ( uiItemPos + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor < gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems )
07079             {
07080                   // Toggle selection... ONLY IF LEGAL!!
07081                   gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[ uiItemPos + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ] = !gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[  uiItemPos + gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ];
07082 
07083                   // OK, pickup item....
07084                   //gItemPickupMenu.fHandled = TRUE;
07085 
07086                   //pTempItemPool = gItemPickupMenu.ItemPoolSlots[ gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect - gItemPickupMenu.ubScrollAnchor ];
07087 
07088                   // Tell our soldier to pickup this item!
07089                   //SoldierGetItemFromWorld( gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier, pTempItemPool->iItemIndex, gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo, gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel );
07090             }
07091 
07092             // Loop through all and set /unset OK
07093             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems; cnt++ )
07094             {
07095                   if ( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray[ cnt ] )
07096                   {
07097                         fEnable = TRUE;
07098                         break;
07099                   }
07100             }
07101 
07102             if ( fEnable )
07103             {
07104                   EnableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
07105             }
07106             else
07107             {
07108                   DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
07109             }
07110       }
07111       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
07112       {
07113 
07114       }
07115 }
07116 
07117 BOOLEAN HandleItemPickupMenu( )
07118 {
07119 
07120       if ( !gfInItemPickupMenu )
07121       {
07122             return( FALSE );
07123       }
07124 
07125       if ( gItemPickupMenu.fHandled )
07126       {
07127             RemoveItemPickupMenu( );
07128       }
07129 
07130       return( gItemPickupMenu.fHandled );
07131 }
07132 
07133 
07134 void BtnMoneyButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
07135 {
07136       INT8  i;
07137       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
07138       {
07139             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
07140             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
07141       }
07142       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
07143       {
07144             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
07145             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
07146       }
07147       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
07148       {
07149             UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
07150 
07151             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
07152 
07153             switch( ubButton )
07154             {
07155                   case M_1000:
07156                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining >= 1000 )
07157                         {
07158                               //if the player is removing money from their account, and they are removing more then $20,000
07159                               if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount &&  ( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving + 1000 ) > MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT )
07160                               {
07161                                     if( guiCurrentScreen == SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN )
07162                                           DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzMoneyWithdrawMessageText[ MONEY_TEXT_WITHDRAW_MORE_THEN_MAXIMUM ], SHOPKEEPER_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
07163                                     else
07164                                           DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzMoneyWithdrawMessageText[ MONEY_TEXT_WITHDRAW_MORE_THEN_MAXIMUM ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
07165                                     return;
07166                               }
07167 
07168                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining -= 1000;
07169                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving += 1000;
07170                         }
07171                         break;
07172                   case M_100:
07173                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining >= 100 )
07174                         {
07175                               //if the player is removing money from their account, and they are removing more then $20,000
07176                               if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount &&  ( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving + 100 ) > MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT )
07177                               {
07178                                     DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzMoneyWithdrawMessageText[ MONEY_TEXT_WITHDRAW_MORE_THEN_MAXIMUM ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
07179                                     return;
07180                               }
07181 
07182                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining -= 100;
07183                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving += 100;
07184                         }
07185                         break;
07186                   case M_10:
07187                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining >= 10 )
07188                         {
07189                               //if the player is removing money from their account, and they are removing more then $20,000
07190                               if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount &&  ( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving + 10 ) > MAX_MONEY_PER_SLOT )
07191                               {
07192                                     DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzMoneyWithdrawMessageText[ MONEY_TEXT_WITHDRAW_MORE_THEN_MAXIMUM ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
07193                                     return;
07194                               }
07195 
07196                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining -= 10;
07197                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving += 10;
07198                         }
07199                         break;
07200                   case M_DONE:
07201                   {
07202                         RemoveMoney();
07203 
07204                         DeleteItemDescriptionBox( );
07205                   }
07206                   break;
07207             }
07208             if( ubButton != M_DONE )
07209             {
07210                   RenderItemDescriptionBox( );
07211                   for( i=0; i<MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++ )
07212                   {
07213                         MarkAButtonDirty( guiMoneyButtonBtn[ i ] );
07214                   }
07215             }
07216 
07217             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
07218       }
07219 
07220 
07221       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
07222       {
07223             UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
07224 
07225             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
07226 
07227 
07228             switch( ubButton )
07229             {
07230                   case M_1000:
07231                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving >= 1000 )
07232                         {
07233                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining += 1000;
07234                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving -= 1000;
07235                         }
07236                         break;
07237                   case M_100:
07238                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving >= 100 )
07239                         {
07240                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining += 100;
07241                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving -= 100;
07242                         }
07243                         break;
07244                   case M_10:
07245                         if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving >= 10 )
07246                         {
07247                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining += 10;
07248                               gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving -= 10;
07249                         }
07250                         break;
07251             }
07252 
07253             RenderItemDescriptionBox( );
07254             for( i=0; i<MAX_ATTACHMENTS; i++ )
07255             {
07256                   MarkAButtonDirty( guiMoneyButtonBtn[ i ] );
07257             }
07258 
07259             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
07260       }
07261 } 
07262 
07263 void RemoveMoney()
07264 {
07265       if( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving != 0 )
07266       {
07267             //if we are in the shop keeper interface
