07268             if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
07269             {
07270                   INVENTORY_IN_SLOT InvSlot;
07271 
07272                   memset( &InvSlot, 0, sizeof(INVENTORY_IN_SLOT) );
07273 
07274                   InvSlot.fActive = TRUE;
07275                   InvSlot.sItemIndex = MONEY;
07276                   InvSlot.bSlotIdInOtherLocation = -1;
07277 
07278                   //Remove the money from the money in the pocket
07279                   gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount = gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining;
07280 
07281                         //Create an item to get the money that is being removed
07282                   CreateItem( MONEY, 0, &InvSlot.ItemObject );
07283 
07284                   //Set the amount thast is being removed
07285                   InvSlot.ItemObject.uiMoneyAmount = gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving;
07286                   InvSlot.ubIdOfMercWhoOwnsTheItem = gpItemDescSoldier->ubProfile;
07287 
07288                   //if we are removing money from the players account
07289                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
07290                   {
07291                         gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount = gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving;
07292 
07293                         //take the money from the player
07294                         AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_TO_MERC, gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , -(INT32)( gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount ) );
07295                   }
07296 
07297                   memcpy( &gMoveingItem, &InvSlot, sizeof( INVENTORY_IN_SLOT ) );
07298 
07299                   memcpy( &gItemPointer, &InvSlot.ItemObject, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
07300                   gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
07301                   gpItemPointerSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
07302 
07303                   // Set mouse
07304                   SetSkiCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07305 
07306                   //Restrict the cursor to the proper area
07307                   RestrictSkiMouseCursor();
07308             }
07309             else
07310             {
07311                   CreateMoney( gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving, &gItemPointer );
07312                   gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
07313                   //Asign the soldier to be the currently selected soldier
07314                   gpItemPointerSoldier = gpItemDescSoldier;
07315 
07316                   //Remove the money from the money in the pocket
07317                   //if we are removing money from the players account
07318                   if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
07319                   {
07320                         gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount = gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemoving;
07321 
07322                         //take the money from the player
07323                         AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_TO_MERC, gpSMCurrentMerc->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , -(INT32)( gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount ) );
07324                   }
07325                   else
07326                         gpItemDescObject->uiMoneyAmount = gRemoveMoney.uiMoneyRemaining;
07327 
07328 
07329 
07330                   if( guiCurrentItemDescriptionScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
07331                   {
07332                         // Set mouse
07333                         guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
07334                         gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
07335 
07336                         MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
07337                         MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( EXTERN_CURSOR );
07338                         fMapInventoryItem=TRUE;
07339                         fTeamPanelDirty=TRUE;
07340                   }
07341 
07342             }
07343       }
07344 
07345 //    if( gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount )
07346 //          gfAddingMoneyToMercFromPlayersAccount = FALSE;
07347 }
07348 
07349 
07350 BOOLEAN AttemptToApplyCamo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usItemIndex )
07351 {
07352       return( FALSE );
07353 }
07354 
07355 
07356 
07357 
07358 void GetHelpTextForItem( INT16 * pzStr, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07359 {
07360       INT16 pStr[ 250 ]; 
07361       UINT16      usItem = pObject->usItem;
07362       INT32 cnt = 0;
07363       INT32 iNumAttachments = 0;
07364 
07365       if( pSoldier != NULL )
07366       {
07367             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
07368             {
07369                   swprintf((wchar_t *) pStr, L"" );
07370                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pzStr, L"%s", pStr );
07371                   return;
07372             }
07373       }
07374 
07375       if ( usItem != NOTHING )
07376       {
07377             // Retrieve the status of the items
07378             // Find the minimum status value - not just the first one
07379             INT16 sValue = pObject->bStatus[ 0 ];
07380 
07381             for(INT16 i = 1; i < pObject->ubNumberOfObjects; i++)
07382             {
07383                   if(pObject->bStatus[ i ] < sValue)
07384                   {
07385                         sValue = pObject->bStatus[ i ];
07386                   }
07387             }
07388 
07389             //get item weight
07390             FLOAT fWeight = (float)(CalculateObjectWeight( pObject )) / 10;
07391 
07392             if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ] ) // metric units not enabled
07393             {
07394                   fWeight = fWeight * 2.2f;
07395             }
07396 
07397             if ( fWeight < 0.1 )
07398             {
07399                   fWeight = 0.1f;
07400             }
07401 
07402 
07403             if ( Item[usItem].usItemClass != IC_AMMO || !gGameExternalOptions.fAmmoDynamicWeight ) //Madd: quick fix to display total stack weight
07404                   fWeight *= pObject->ubNumberOfObjects;
07405 
07406             switch( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass )
07407             {
07408             case MONEY:
07409                   //Money
07410                   {     
07411                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%ld", pObject->uiMoneyAmount );
07412                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr );
07413                         InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr );
07414                   }
07415                   break;
07416 
07417             case IC_MONEY:
07418                   // alternate money like silver or gold
07419                   //if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_MONEY )
07420                   { 
07421                         INT16       pStr2[20];
07422                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr2, L"%ld", pObject->uiMoneyAmount );
07423                         InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pStr2 );
07424                         InsertDollarSignInToString( pStr2 );
07425 
07426                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s (%ls)", ItemNames[ usItem ], pStr2 );
07427                   }
07428                   break;
07429 
07430             case IC_GUN:
07431                   {
07432                         //Calculate AP's
07433                         INT16 apStr[20];
07434                         INT16 apStr2[20];
07435                         UINT8 ubAttackAPs = BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, pObject );
07436 
07437                         if ( Weapon[ usItem ].NoSemiAuto )
07438                         {
07439                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr, L"-" );
07440                         }
07441                         else
07442                         {
07443                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr, L"%d", ubAttackAPs );
07444                         }
07445 
07446                         if (GetShotsPerBurst(pObject) > 0)
07447                         {
07448                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr2, L" / %d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToBurst( DEFAULT_APS, pObject ) );
07449                               wcscat( apStr, apStr2 );
07450                         }
07451                         else
07452                         {
07453                               wcscat( apStr, L" / -" );
07454                         }
07455 
07456                         if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(pObject) > 0)
07457                         {
07458                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr2, L" / %d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToAutofire( DEFAULT_APS, pObject, 3 ) );
07459                               wcscat( apStr, apStr2 );
07460                         }
07461                         else
07462                         {
07463                               wcscat( apStr, L" / -" );
07464                         }
07465 
07466                         //Info for weapons
07467                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s (%s) [%d%%]\n%s %d\n%s %d\n%s %d (%d)\n%s %s\n%s %1.1f %s", 
07468                               ItemNames[ usItem ], 
07469                               AmmoCaliber[ Weapon[ usItem ].ubCalibre ], 
07470                               sValue, 
07471                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 9 ],        //Accuracy String
07472                               Weapon[ usItem ].bAccuracy,
07473                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 11 ],       //Damage String
07474                               GetDamage(pObject), 
07475                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 10 ],       //Range String
07476                               gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_WEAPON_RANGE_IN_TILES ] ? GunRange( pObject )/10 : GunRange( pObject ),                  //Modified Range
07477                               gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_WEAPON_RANGE_IN_TILES ] ? Weapon[ usItem ].usRange/10 : Weapon[ usItem ].usRange,  //Gun Range 
07478                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ],        //AP String
07479                               apStr,                                    //AP's
07480                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07481                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07482                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07483                               );
07484                   }
07485                   break;
07486 
07487             case IC_LAUNCHER:
07488                   {
07489                         //Calculate AP's
07490                         INT16 apStr[20];
07491                         INT16 apStr2[20];
07492                         UINT8 ubAttackAPs = BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, pObject );
07493 
07494                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr, L"%d", ubAttackAPs );
07495 
07496                         if (GetShotsPerBurst(pObject) > 0)
07497                         {
07498                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr2, L" / %d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToBurst( DEFAULT_APS, pObject ) );
07499                               wcscat( apStr, apStr2 );
07500                         }
07501                         else
07502                         {
07503                               wcscat( apStr, L" / -" );
07504                         }
07505 
07506                         if (GetAutofireShotsPerFiveAPs(pObject) > 0)
07507                         {
07508                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)apStr2, L" / %d", ubAttackAPs + CalcAPsToAutofire( DEFAULT_APS, pObject, 3 ) );
07509                               wcscat( apStr, apStr2 );
07510                         }
07511                         else
07512                         {
07513                               wcscat( apStr, L" / -" );
07514                         }
07515 
07516                         //Info for weapons
07517                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d%%]\n%s %d\n%s %d\n%s %d (%d)\n%s %s\n%s %1.1f %s", 
07518                               ItemNames[ usItem ], 
07519                               sValue, 
07520                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 9 ],        //Accuracy String
07521                               Weapon[ usItem ].bAccuracy,
07522                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 11 ],       //Damage String
07523                               GetDamage(pObject), 
07524                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 10 ],       //Range String
07525                               gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_WEAPON_RANGE_IN_TILES ] ? GunRange( pObject )/10 : GunRange( pObject ),                  //Modified Range
07526                               gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_WEAPON_RANGE_IN_TILES ] ? Weapon[ usItem ].usRange/10 : Weapon[ usItem ].usRange,  //Gun Range 
07527                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ],        //AP String
07528                               apStr,                                    //AP's
07529                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07530                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07531                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07532                               );
07533                   }
07534                   break;
07535 
07536             case IC_BLADE:
07537             case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
07538             case IC_PUNCH:
07539                   {
07540                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d%%]\n%s %d\n%s %d\n%s %1.1f %s", 
07541                               ItemNames[ usItem ], 
07542                               sValue, 
07543                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 11 ],                         //Damage String
07544                               GetDamage(pObject),                             //Melee damage
07545                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ],                          //AP String
07546                               BaseAPsToShootOrStab( DEFAULT_APS, DEFAULT_AIMSKILL, pObject ), //AP's
07547                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],                         //Weight String
07548                               fWeight,                                              //Weight
07549                               GetWeightUnitString()                           //Weight units
07550                               );
07551                   }
07552                   break;
07553 
07554             case IC_AMMO:
07555                   {
07556                         // The next is for ammunition which gets the measurement 'rnds'         
07557                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d rnds]\n%s %1.1f %s",                      
07558                               ItemNames[ usItem ],          //Item long name
07559                               pObject->ubShotsLeft[0],      //Shots left
07560                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07561                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07562                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07563                               );
07564 
07565                         //Lal: do not delete, commented out for next version
07566                         //swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s %s %s %d [%d rnds]\n%s %1.1f %s",                       
07567                         //    AmmoCaliber[ Magazine[ Item[usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre ],               //Ammo calibre
07568                         //    AmmoTypes[Magazine[ Item[usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubAmmoType].ammoName,   //Ammo type
07569                         //    MagNames[Magazine[ Item[usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubMagType],                    //Magazine type
07570                         //    Magazine[ Item[usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize,                                    //Magazine capacity
07571                         //    pObject->ubShotsLeft[0],      //Shots left
07572                         //    gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07573                         //    fWeight,                            //Weight
07574                         //    GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07575                         //    );
07576                   }
07577                   break;
07578 
07579             case IC_GRENADE:
07580             case IC_BOMB:
07581                   // explosives           
07582                   {
07583                         UINT16 explDamage = (UINT16)( Explosive[Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex].ubDamage + ( (double) Explosive[Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex].ubDamage / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubExplosivesDamageMultiplier );
07584                         UINT16 explStunDamage = (UINT16)( Explosive[Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex].ubStunDamage + ( (double) Explosive[Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex].ubStunDamage / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubExplosivesDamageMultiplier );
07585 
07586                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d%%]\n%s %d\n%s %d\n%s %1.1f %s", 
07587                               ItemNames[ usItem ], 
07588                               sValue, 
07589                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 11 ],       //Damage String
07590                               explDamage, 
07591                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 13 ],       //Stun Damage String
07592                               explStunDamage,                     //Stun Damage
07593                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07594                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07595                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07596                               );
07597                   }
07598                   break;
07599 
07600             case IC_ARMOUR:
07601                   {
07602                         //Armor
07603                         INT32 iProtection = EffectiveArmour( pObject );
07604 
07605                         switch( Armour[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubArmourClass )
07606                         {
07607                         case( ARMOURCLASS_HELMET ):
07608                               iProtection = 15 * iProtection / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_HELMET_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
07609                               break;
07610 
07611                         case( ARMOURCLASS_VEST ):
07612                               iProtection = 65 * iProtection / ( Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_VEST_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection + Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
07613                               break;
07614 
07615                         case( ARMOURCLASS_LEGGINGS ):
07616                               iProtection = 25 * iProtection / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
07617                               break;
07618 
07619                         case( ARMOURCLASS_PLATE ):
07620                               iProtection = 65 * iProtection / ( Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
07621                               break;
07622                         }
07623 
07624                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d %%]\n%s %d%% (%d/%d)\n%s %d%%\n%s %1.1f %s",                      
07625                               ItemNames[ usItem ],          //Item long name
07626                               sValue,                                   //Item condition
07627                               pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 4 ],   //Protection string
07628                               iProtection,                        //Protection rating in % based on best armor
07629                               Armour[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection, //Protection (raw data)
07630                               Armour[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection * sValue / 100,
07631                               pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 3 ],   //Camo string
07632                               GetCamoBonus(pObject)+GetUrbanCamoBonus(pObject)+GetDesertCamoBonus(pObject)+GetSnowCamoBonus(pObject),     //Camo bonus
07633                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight string
07634                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07635                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07636                               );
07637                   }
07638                   break;
07639 
07640 
07641             case IC_MISC:
07642             case IC_MEDKIT:
07643             case IC_KIT:
07644             case IC_FACE:
07645             default:
07646                   {
07647                         // The final, and typical case, is that of an item with a percent status
07648                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s [%d%%]\n%s %1.1f %s", 
07649                               ItemNames[ usItem ],          //Item long name
07650                               sValue,                                   //Item condition
07651                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
07652                               fWeight,                            //Weight
07653                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
07654                               );
07655                   }
07656                   break;
07657             }
07658 
07659 
07660             // Fingerprint ID (Soldier Name)
07661             if ( ( Item[pObject->usItem].fingerprintid ) && pObject->ubImprintID < NO_PROFILE )
07662             {
07663                   INT16       pStr2[20];
07664                   swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr2, L" [%s]", gMercProfiles[ pObject->ubImprintID ].zNickname );
07665                   wcscat( pStr, pStr2 );
07666             }
07667 
07668 
07669             // Add attachment string....
07670             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; cnt++ )
07671             {
07672                   if ( pObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] != NOTHING )
07673                   {     
07674                         iNumAttachments++;
07675 
07676                         if ( iNumAttachments == 1 )
07677                         {
07678                               wcscat( pStr, L"\n[" );
07679                         }
07680                         else
07681                         {
07682                               wcscat( pStr, L", " );
07683                         }
07684 
07685                         wcscat( pStr, ItemNames[ pObject->usAttachItem[ cnt ] ] );
07686                   }
07687             }
07688 
07689             if ( iNumAttachments > 0 )
07690             {
07691                   wcscat( pStr, pMessageStrings[ MSG_END_ATTACHMENT_LIST ] );
07692             }
07693 
07694       }
07695       else
07696       {
07697             swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"" );         
07698       }
07699 
07700       // Copy over...
07701       swprintf( (wchar_t *)pzStr, L"%s", pStr );
07702 }
07703 
07704 
07705 
07706 
07707 
07708 
07709 UINT8 GetPrefferedItemSlotGraphicNum( UINT16 usItem )
07710 {
07711       // Check for small item...
07712       if ( Item[usItem].ubPerPocket >= 1 )
07713       {
07714             // Small
07715             return( 2 );
07716       }
07717 
07718       // Now it could be large or armour, check class...
07719       if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR )
07720       {
07721             return( 1 );
07722       }
07723 
07724       // OK, it's a big one...
07725       return( 0 );
07726 }
07727 
07728 
07729 void CancelItemPointer( )
07730 {
07731       // ATE: If we have an item pointer end it!
07732       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07733       {
07734             if ( gbItemPointerSrcSlot != NO_SLOT )
07735             {
07736                   // Place it back in our hands!
07737                   PlaceObject( gpItemPointerSoldier, gbItemPointerSrcSlot, gpItemPointer );
07738 
07739       // ATE: This could potnetially swap!
07740       // Make sure # of items is 0, if not, auto place somewhere else...
07741       if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
07742       {
07743                         if ( !AutoPlaceObject( gpItemPointerSoldier, gpItemPointer, FALSE ) )
07744         {
07745           // Alright, place of the friggen ground!
07746                       AddItemToPool( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, gpItemPointer, 1, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
07747                       NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
07748         }
07749       }
07750             }
07751             else
07752             {
07753                   // We drop it here.....
07754                   AddItemToPool( gpItemPointerSoldier->sGridNo, gpItemPointer, 1, gpItemPointerSoldier->bLevel, 0 , -1 );
07755                   NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
07756             }
07757             EndItemPointer( );
07758       }
07759 }     
07760 
07761 
07762 typedef struct 
07763 {
07764       OBJECTTYPE  ItemPointerInfo;
07765       UINT8                   ubSoldierID;
07766       UINT8                   ubInvSlot;
07767       BOOLEAN                 fCursorActive;
07768       INT8                    bPadding[5];
07769 
07770 } ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO;
07771 
07772 
07773 BOOLEAN LoadItemCursorFromSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
07774 {
07775       UINT32      uiLoadSize=0;
07776       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
07777       ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO         SaveStruct;
07778 
07779       // Load structure
07780       uiLoadSize = sizeof( ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO );
07781       FileRead( hFile, &SaveStruct, uiLoadSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
07782       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiLoadSize )
07783       {
07784             return( FALSE );
07785       }
07786 
07787       // Now set things up.....
07788       // Copy object
07789       memcpy( &gItemPointer, &(SaveStruct.ItemPointerInfo), sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
07790       
07791       // Copy soldier ID
07792       if ( SaveStruct.ubSoldierID == NOBODY )
07793       {
07794             gpItemPointerSoldier = NULL;
07795       }
07796       else
07797       {
07798             gpItemPointerSoldier = MercPtrs[ SaveStruct.ubSoldierID ];
07799       }
07800 
07801       // Inv slot
07802       gbItemPointerSrcSlot = SaveStruct.ubInvSlot;
07803 
07804       // Boolean
07805       if ( SaveStruct.fCursorActive )
07806       {
07807             gpItemPointer = &( gItemPointer );
07808             ReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( );
07809       }
07810       else
07811       {
07812             gpItemPointer = NULL;
07813       }
07814 
07815       return( TRUE );
07816 }
07817 
07818 BOOLEAN SaveItemCursorToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
07819 {
07820       UINT32      uiSaveSize=0;
07821       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
07822 
07823       ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO         SaveStruct;
07824 
07825       // Setup structure;
07826       memset( &SaveStruct, 0, sizeof( ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO ) );
07827       memcpy( &(SaveStruct.ItemPointerInfo), &gItemPointer, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
07828 
07829       // Soldier
07830       if ( gpItemPointerSoldier != NULL )
07831       {
07832             SaveStruct.ubSoldierID = gpItemPointerSoldier->ubID;
07833       }
07834       else
07835       {
07836             SaveStruct.ubSoldierID = NOBODY;
07837       }
07838 
07839       // INv slot
07840       SaveStruct.ubInvSlot = gbItemPointerSrcSlot;
07841 
07842       // Boolean
07843       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
07844       {
07845             SaveStruct.fCursorActive = TRUE;
07846       }
07847       else
07848       {
07849             SaveStruct.fCursorActive = FALSE;
07850       }
07851 
07852       // save locations of watched points
07853       uiSaveSize = sizeof( ITEM_CURSOR_SAVE_INFO );
07854       FileWrite( hFile, &SaveStruct, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
07855       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
07856       {
07857             return( FALSE );
07858       }
07859 
07860       // All done...
07861 
07862       return( TRUE );
07863 }
07864 
07865 
07866 
07867 void UpdateItemHatches()
07868 {
07869       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
07870 
07871   if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
07872   {
07873             if ( fShowInventoryFlag && bSelectedInfoChar >= 0 )
07874             {
07875                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
07876             }
07877       }
07878       else
07879       {
07880             pSoldier = gpSMCurrentMerc;
07881       }
07882 
07883       if ( pSoldier != NULL )
07884       {
07885             ReevaluateItemHatches( pSoldier, ( BOOLEAN ) ( gpItemPointer == NULL ) );
07886       }
07887 }
07888 
07889 /**
07890  * jackaians: copied from InitializeItemPickupMenu
07891  */
07892 BOOLEAN InitializeStealItemPickupMenu( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent, ITEM_POOL *pItemPool, UINT8 ubCount)
07893 {
07894   VOBJECT_DESC          VObjectDesc;
07895       UINT8             ubString[48];
07896       INT16             sCenX, sCenY, sX, sY, sCenterYVal;
07897       INT8 bZLevel      =pOpponent->bLevel;
07898       INT16 sGridNo     =pOpponent->sGridNo;
07899       INT32             cnt;
07900       gpOpponent        =pOpponent;
07901       gfStealing        =TRUE;
07902  
07903       // Erase other menus....
07904       EraseInterfaceMenus( TRUE );
07905 
07906       // Make sure menu is located if not on screen
07907       LocateSoldier( pOpponent->ubID, FALSE );
07908 
07909       // memset values
07910       memset( &gItemPickupMenu, 0, sizeof( gItemPickupMenu ) );
07911 
07912       //Set item pool value
07913       gItemPickupMenu.pItemPool     = pItemPool;
07914 
07915       InterruptTime();
07916       PauseGame();
07917       LockPauseState( 18 );
07918       // Pause timers as well....
07919       PauseTime( TRUE );
07920 
07921       // Alrighty, cancel lock UI if we havn't done so already
07922       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
07923 
07924       // Change to INV panel if not there already...
07925       gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
07926       gbNewPanel = SM_PANEL;
07927       gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)pSoldier->ubID;
07928 
07929       gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems = ubCount;
07930 
07931       // Determine # of slots per page
07932       if ( gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
07933       {
07934             gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage = NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS;
07935       }
07936       else
07937       {
07938             gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage = gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems;
07939       }
07940 
07941       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
07942       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\itembox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
07943       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &(gItemPickupMenu.uiPanelVo) ) );
07944 
07945       // Memalloc selection array...
07946        gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray = (BOOLEAN *)MemAlloc(( sizeof( UINT8 ) * gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems ) );
07947       // seto to 0
07948       memset( gItemPickupMenu.pfSelectedArray, 0, ( sizeof( UINT8 ) * gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems ) );
07949 
07950       // Calcualate dimensions
07951       CalculateItemPickupMenuDimensions( );
07952 
07953       // Get XY
07954       {
07955             // First get mouse xy screen location
07956             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
07957             {
07958                   sX = gusMouseXPos;
07959                   sY = gusMouseYPos;
07960             }
07961             else
07962             {
07963                    sX = 0; 
07964                    sY = 0; 
07965             }
07966 
07967             // CHECK FOR LEFT/RIGHT
07968             // WANNE 2
07969             if ( ( sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ) > SCREEN_WIDTH )
07970             {
07971                   sX = SCREEN_WIDTH - gItemPickupMenu.sWidth - ITEMPICK_START_X_OFFSET;
07972             }
07973             else
07974             {
07975                   sX = sX + ITEMPICK_START_X_OFFSET;
07976             }
07977 
07978             // Now check for top
07979             // Center in the y
07980             sCenterYVal = gItemPickupMenu.sHeight / 2;
07981 
07982             sY -= sCenterYVal;
07983 
07984             if ( sY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y )
07985             {
07986                   sY = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
07987             }
07988 
07989             // Check for bottom
07990             // WANNE 2
07991             if ( ( sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ) > (SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_HEIGHT) )
07992             {
07993                   sY = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - INV_INTERFACE_HEIGHT) - gItemPickupMenu.sHeight;
07994             }
07995 
07996       }
07997 
07998       // Set some values
07999       gItemPickupMenu.sX                        = sX;
08000       gItemPickupMenu.sY                        = sY;
08001       gItemPickupMenu.bCurSelect          = 0;
08002       gItemPickupMenu.pSoldier            = pSoldier;
08003       gItemPickupMenu.fHandled            = FALSE;
08004       gItemPickupMenu.sGridNo             = sGridNo;
08005       gItemPickupMenu.bZLevel             = bZLevel;
08006       gItemPickupMenu.fAtLeastOneSelected = FALSE;
08007       gItemPickupMenu.fAllSelected  = FALSE;
08008 
08009       //Load images for buttons
08010       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\itembox.sti", (STR)ubString );
08011       gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages                 = LoadButtonImage( ubString, -1,5,-1,10,-1 );
08012       gItemPickupMenu.iDownButtonImages         =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 7, -1, 12, -1 );
08013       gItemPickupMenu.iAllButtonImages          =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 6, -1,11, -1 );
08014       gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButtonImages       =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 8, -1, 13, -1 );
08015       gItemPickupMenu.iOKButtonImages                 =     UseLoadedButtonImage( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, -1, 4, -1, 9, -1 );
08016 
08017 
08018       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
08019       /*MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ), (INT16)( 532 ), (INT16)( 367 ), (INT16)( 640 ),(INT16)( 480 ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08020                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); */
08021 
08022       // WANNE 2
08023       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
08024       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ), (INT16)( iScreenWidthOffset + 532 ), (INT16)( iScreenHeightOffset + 367 ), (INT16)( SCREEN_WIDTH ),(INT16)( SCREEN_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08025                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
08026 
08027       // Add region
08028       MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegion ) );
08029 
08030 
08031       // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
08032       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegions ), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX ), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sY), (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ),(INT16)( gItemPickupMenu.sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08033                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
08034       // Add region
08035       MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.BackRegions ) );
08036 
08037 
08038       // Create buttons
08039       if ( gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage == NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS && gItemPickupMenu.ubTotalItems > NUM_PICKUP_SLOTS )
08040       {
08041             gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton     = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_UP_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_UP_Y),
08042                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08043                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupScrollUp );
08044 
08045             SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iUpButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 1 ] );
08046 
08047 
08048             gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton   = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_DOWN_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_DOWN_Y),
08049                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08050                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupScrollDown );
08051 
08052             SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iDownButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 3 ] );
08053 
08054       }
08055 
08056 
08057       gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton     = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_OK_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_OK_Y),
08058                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08059                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupOK );
08060       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 0 ] );
08061 
08062 
08063       gItemPickupMenu.iAllButton    = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_ALL_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_ALL_Y),
08064                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08065                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupAll );
08066       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iAllButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 2 ] );
08067 
08068       gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButton = QuickCreateButton( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButtonImages, (INT16)(sX + ITEMPICK_CANCEL_X), (INT16)(sY + gItemPickupMenu.sButtomPanelStartY + ITEMPICK_CANCEL_Y),
08069                                                              BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08070                                                              DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)ItemPickupCancel );
08071       SetButtonFastHelpText( gItemPickupMenu.iCancelButton, ItemPickupHelpPopup[ 4 ] );
08072 
08073 
08074       DisableButton( gItemPickupMenu.iOKButton );
08075 
08076 
08077 
08078       // Create regions...
08079       sCenX = gItemPickupMenu.sX;
08080       sCenY = gItemPickupMenu.sY + ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_Y;
08081 
08082       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gItemPickupMenu.bNumSlotsPerPage; cnt++ )
08083       {
08084             // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
08085             MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]), (INT16)(sCenX ), (INT16)(sCenY + 1), (INT16)(sCenX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ),(INT16)( sCenY + ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
08086                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, ItemPickMenuMouseMoveCallback, ItemPickMenuMouseClickCallback ); 
08087             // Add region
08088             MSYS_AddRegion( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]) );
08089             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &(gItemPickupMenu.Regions[cnt]), 0, cnt );
08090 
08091             sCenY += ITEMPICK_GRAPHIC_YSPACE;
08092       }
08093 
08094       //Save dirty rect
08095       //gItemPickupMenu.iDirtyRect = RegisterBackgroundRect( BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT | BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT, NULL, gItemPickupMenu.sX, gItemPickupMenu.sY, (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sX + gItemPickupMenu.sWidth ) , (INT16)(gItemPickupMenu.sY + gItemPickupMenu.sHeight ) );
08096 
08097 
08098       SetupPickupPage(0);
08099       gfInItemPickupMenu = TRUE;
08100 
08101       // Ignore scrolling
08102       gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
08103 
08104       HandleAnyMercInSquadHasCompatibleStuff( (INT8) CurrentSquad( ), NULL, TRUE );
08105       gubSelectSMPanelToMerc = pSoldier->ubID;
08106       ReEvaluateDisabledINVPanelButtons( );
08107       DisableTacticalTeamPanelButtons( TRUE );
08108 
08109       //gfSMDisableForItems = TRUE;
08110       return( TRUE );
08111 
08112 }
08113 void DeletePool(ITEM_POOL *pItemPool)
08114 {
08115       ITEM_POOL *pItemPoolToDelete;
08116       while(pItemPool!=NULL)
08117       {
08118             pItemPoolToDelete=pItemPool;
08119             pItemPool=pItemPool->pNext;
08120             MemFree(pItemPoolToDelete);
08121       }
08122 }
Generated on Sat Sep 9 13:48:21 2006 for Build by  1.4.7
